80 using VirusPtr = std::shared_ptr< Virus< TSeq > >;

82 template<typename TSeq>
83 using ToolPtr = std::shared_ptr< Tool< TSeq > >;

85 template<typename TSeq>
86 using ToolFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Tool<TSeq>&,Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;

89 using MixerFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,VirusPtr<TSeq>,Model<TSeq>*)>;

92 using MutFun = std::function<bool(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
93 
94 template<typename TSeq>
95 using PostRecoveryFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
96

98 using VirusFun = std::function<epiworld_double(Agent<TSeq>*,Virus<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

101 using UpdateFun = std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)>;

107 struct Action;

110 using ActionFun = std::function<void(Action<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;

128 using EntityToAgentFun = std::function<void(Entity<TSeq>&,Model<TSeq>*)>;
129 
135 template<typename TSeq>
136 struct Action {
137  Agent<TSeq> * agent;
138  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus;
139  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool;
140  Entity<TSeq> * entity;
141  epiworld_fast_int new_status;
142  epiworld_fast_int queue;
143  ActionFun<TSeq> call;
144  int idx_agent;
145  int idx_object;
146 public:
163  Action(
164  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
165  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
166  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
167  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
168  epiworld_fast_int new_status_,
169  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
170  ActionFun<TSeq> call_,
171  int idx_agent_,
172  int idx_object_
173  ) : agent(agent_), virus(virus_), tool(tool_), entity(entity_),
174  new_status(new_status_),
175  queue(queue_), call(call_), idx_agent(idx_agent_), idx_object(idx_object_) {
176  return;
177  };
178 };

215 
216 #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
217  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE() \
218  printf_epiworld("[epiworld-debug] DEBUGGING ON (compiled with EPI_DEBUG defined)\n");
219  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect) \
220  for (auto & v : vect) \
221  if (static_cast<double>(v) < 0.0) \
222  throw std::logic_error("A negative value not allowed.");
223 
224  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num) \
225  double _epi_debug_sum = 0.0; \
226  for (auto & v : vect) \
227  { \
228  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<double>(v);\
229  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<double>(num)) \
230  throw std::logic_error("[epiworld-debug] The sum of elements not reached."); \
231  }
232 
233  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num) \
234  int _epi_debug_sum = 0; \
235  for (auto & v : vect) \
236  { \
237  _epi_debug_sum += static_cast<int>(v);\
238  if (_epi_debug_sum > static_cast<int>(num)) \
239  throw std::logic_error("[epiworld-debug] The sum of elements not reached."); \
240  }
241 
242  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b) \
243  if (a.size() != b.size()) \
244  throw std::length_error("[epiworld-debug] The vectors do not match size."); \
245  for (size_t _i = 0u; _i < a.size(); ++_i) \
246  if (a[_i] != b[_i]) \
247  throw std::logic_error("[epiworld-debug] The vectors do not match.");
248 
249 
250 #else
251  #define EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
252  #define EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(vect)
253  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_DBL(vect, num)
254  #define EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(vect, num)
255  #define EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(a, b)
256 #endif
257 
258 #endif

286 #define EPI_NEW_TOOL(fname,tseq) inline epiworld_double \
287 (fname)(\
288  epiworld::Tool< tseq > & t, \
289  epiworld::Agent< tseq > * p, \
290  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus< tseq >> v, \
291  epiworld::Model< tseq > * m\
292  )

299  epiworld::ToolFun<tseq> funname = \
300  [](epiworld::Tool<tseq> & t, \
301  epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, \
302  std::shared_ptr<epiworld::Virus<tseq>> v, \
303  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> epiworld_double
304 
309 #define EPI_PARAMS(i) m->operator()(i)

316  (funname)(\

324  epiworld::Virus<tseq> & v, \
325  epiworld::Model<tseq> * m) -> void

351  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> epiworld_double

353 #define EPI_RUNIF() m->runif()
354 
355 #define EPIWORLD_RUN(a) \
356  if (a.get_verbose()) \
357  { \
358  printf_epiworld("Running the model...\n");\
359  } \
360  for (epiworld_fast_uint niter = 0; niter < a.get_ndays(); ++niter)
361 
362 #define EPI_TOKENPASTE(a,b) a ## b
363 #define MPAR(num) *(m->EPI_TOKENPASTE(p,num))
364

366  (funname)(epiworld::Agent<tseq> * p, epiworld::Model<tseq> * m)

410 template<typename TSeq>
411 class Model;
412 
413 template<typename TSeq>
414 class Agent;
415 
416 // Relevant for anything using vecHasher function ------------------------------
421 template <typename T>
422 struct vecHasher {
423  std::size_t operator()(std::vector< T > const& dat) const noexcept {
424 
425  std::hash< T > hasher;
426  std::size_t hash = hasher(dat[0u]);
427 
428  // ^ makes bitwise XOR
429  // 0x9e3779b9 is a 32 bit constant (comes from the golden ratio)
430  // << is a shift operator, something like lhs * 2^(rhs)
431  if (dat.size() > 1u)
432  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
433  hash ^= hasher(dat[i]) + 0x9e3779b9 + (hash<<6) + (hash>>2);
434 
435  return hash;
436 
437  }
438 };
439 
440 template<typename Ta = epiworld_double, typename Tb = epiworld_fast_uint>
441 using MapVec_type = std::unordered_map< std::vector< Ta >, Tb, vecHasher<Ta>>;
442 
455 template<typename TSeq = int>
456 inline TSeq default_sequence();
457 
458 // Making it 'static' so that we don't have problems when including the
459 // header. This is important during the linkage, e.g., in R.
460 // See https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/storage_duration#Linkage
461 static int _n_sequences_created = 0;
462 
463 template<>
464 inline bool default_sequence() {
465 
466  if (_n_sequences_created == 2)
467  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
468 
469  return _n_sequences_created++ ? false : true;
470 }
471 
472 template<>
473 inline int default_sequence() {
474  return _n_sequences_created++;
475 }
476 
477 template<>
478 inline epiworld_double default_sequence() {
479  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(_n_sequences_created++);
480 }
481 
482 template<>
483 inline std::vector<bool> default_sequence() {
484 
485  if (_n_sequences_created == 2)
486  throw std::logic_error("Maximum number of sequence created.");
487 
488  return {_n_sequences_created++ ? false : true};
489 }
490 
491 template<>
492 inline std::vector<int> default_sequence() {
493  return {_n_sequences_created++};
494 }
495 
496 template<>
497 inline std::vector<epiworld_double> default_sequence() {
498  return {static_cast<epiworld_double>(_n_sequences_created++)};
499 }
501 
510 template<typename Ta>
511 inline bool IN(const Ta & a, const std::vector< Ta > & b) noexcept
512 {
513  for (const auto & i : b)
514  if (a == i)
515  return true;
516 
517  return false;
518 }
519 
533 template<typename TSeq>
534 inline int roulette(
535  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & probs,
536  Model<TSeq> * m
537  )
538 {
539 
540  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
541  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
542  std::vector< int > certain_infection;
543  certain_infection.reserve(probs.size());
544 
545  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
546  {
547  p_none *= (1.0 - probs[p]);
548 
549  if (probs[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
550  certain_infection.push_back(p);
551 
552  }
553 
554  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
555  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
556  // uniformly
557  if (certain_infection.size() > 0)
558  return certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
559 
560  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
561  std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p(probs.size());
562  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
563  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
564  {
565  probs_only_p[p] = probs[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - probs[p]));
566  p_none_or_single += probs_only_p[p];
567  }
568 
569  // Step 3: Roulette
570  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
571  if (r < cumsum)
572  return -1;
573 
574  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < probs.size(); ++p)
575  {
576  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
577  cumsum += probs_only_p[p]/(p_none_or_single);
578  if (r < cumsum)
579  return static_cast<int>(p);
580 
581  }
582 
583  return static_cast<int>(probs.size() - 1u);
584 
585 }
586 
587 template<typename TSeq>
588 inline int roulette(
589  epiworld_fast_uint nelements,
590  Model<TSeq> * m
591  )
592 {
593 
594  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
595  if (nelements > m->array_double_tmp.size())
596  throw std::logic_error("Trying to sample from more data than there is in roulette!");
597  #endif
598 
599  // Step 1: Computing the prob on none
600  epiworld_double p_none = 1.0;
601  epiworld_fast_uint ncertain = 0u;
602  // std::vector< int > certain_infection;
603  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
604  {
605  p_none *= (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]);
606 
607  if (m->array_double_tmp[p] > (1 - 1e-100))
608  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + ncertain++] = p;
609  // certain_infection.push_back(p);
610 
611  }
612 
613  epiworld_double r = m->runif();
614  // If there are one or more probs that go close to 1, sample
615  // uniformly
616  if (ncertain > 0u)
617  return m->array_double_tmp[nelements + std::floor(ncertain * r)]; // certain_infection[std::floor(r * certain_infection.size())];
618 
619  // Step 2: Calculating the prob of none or single
620  // std::vector< epiworld_double > probs_only_p;
621  epiworld_double p_none_or_single = p_none;
622  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
623  {
624  m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p] =
625  m->array_double_tmp[p] * (p_none / (1.0 - m->array_double_tmp[p]));
626  p_none_or_single += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p];
627  }
628 
629  // Step 3: Roulette
630  epiworld_double cumsum = p_none/p_none_or_single;
631  if (r < cumsum)
632  return -1;
633 
634  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < nelements; ++p)
635  {
636  // If it yield here, then bingo, the individual will acquire the disease
637  cumsum += m->array_double_tmp[nelements + p]/(p_none_or_single);
638  if (r < cumsum)
639  return static_cast<int>(p);
640 
641  }
642 
643  return static_cast<int>(nelements - 1u);
644 
645 }
646 
647 #endif
648 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
650 
651  End of -include/epiworld/misc.hpp-
652 
655 
656 
657 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
659 
660  Start of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
661 
664 
665 
666 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
667 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_HPP
668 
669 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
670 #define EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH 80
671 #endif
672 
676 class Progress {
677 private:
678  int width; ///< Total width size (number of bars)
679  int n; ///< Total number of iterations
680  epiworld_double step_size; ///< Size of the step
681  int last_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
682  int cur_loc; ///< Last location of the bar
683  int i; ///< Current iteration step
684 
685 public:
686  Progress() {};
687  Progress(int n_, int width_);
688  ~Progress() {};
689 
690  void start();
691  void next();
692  void end();
693 
694 };
695 
696 inline Progress::Progress(int n_, int width_) {
697 
698 
699  width = std::max(7, width_ - 7);
700  n = n_;
701  step_size = static_cast<epiworld_double>(width)/static_cast<epiworld_double>(n);
702  last_loc = 0;
703  i = 0;
704 
705 }
706 
707 inline void Progress::start()
708 {
709  for (int j = 0; j < (width); ++j)
710  {
711  printf_epiworld("_");
712  }
713  printf_epiworld("\n");
714 }
715 
716 inline void Progress::next() {
717 
718  if (i == 0)
719  start();
720 
721  cur_loc = std::floor((++i) * step_size);
722 
723 
724  for (int j = 0; j < (cur_loc - last_loc); ++j)
725  {
726  printf_epiworld("|");
727  }
728  if (i >= n)
729  end();
730 
731  last_loc = cur_loc;
732 
733 }
734 
735 inline void Progress::end() {
736 
737  printf_epiworld(" done.\n");
738 
739 }
740 
741 #endif
742 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
744 
745  End of -include/epiworld/progress.hpp-
746

866 
875 template<typename TData>
876 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
877  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_now,
878  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_obs,
879  epiworld_double epsilon,
880  LFMCMC<TData>* m
881 );
882 
888 template<typename TData>
889 class LFMCMC {
890 private:
891 
892  // Random number sampling
893  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine =
894  std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
895 
896  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
897  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
898 
899  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
900  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
901 
902  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
903  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
904 
905  // Process data
906  TData * observed_data;
907 
908  // Information about the size of the problem
909  size_t n_samples;
910  size_t n_statistics;
911  size_t n_parameters;
912 
913  epiworld_double epsilon;
914 
915  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_now;
916  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_prev;
917  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init;
918 
919  std::vector< epiworld_double > observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
920 
921  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_params; ///< Sampled Parameters
922  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_stats; ///< Sampled statistics
923  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_stats_prob; ///< Sampled statistics
924  std::vector< bool > sampled_accepted; ///< Indicator of accepted statistics
925 
926  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution (accepted samples)
927  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution (accepted samples)
928  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_params_prob; ///< Posterior probability
929 
930  std::vector< epiworld_double > drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif())
931  std::vector< TData > * sampled_data = nullptr;
932 
933  // Functions
934  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> simulation_fun;
935  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> summary_fun;
936  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
937  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
938 
939  // Misc
940  std::vector< std::string > names_parameters;
941  std::vector< std::string > names_statistics;
942 
943  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_start;
944  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_end;
945 
946  // std::chrono::milliseconds
947  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> time_elapsed =
948  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
949 
950  inline void get_elapsed(
951  std::string unit,
952  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
953  std::string * unit_abbr,
954  bool print
955  );
956 
957  void chrono_start();
958  void chrono_end();
959 
960 public:
961 
962  void run(
963  std::vector< epiworld_double > param_init,
964  size_t n_samples_,
965  epiworld_double epsilon_
966  );
967 
968  LFMCMC() {};
969  LFMCMC(TData & observed_data_) : observed_data(&observed_data_) {};
970  ~LFMCMC() {};
971 
972  void set_observed_data(TData & observed_data_) {observed_data = &observed_data_;};
973  void set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun);
974  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
975  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);
976  void set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun);
977 
984  void set_rand_engine(std::mt19937 & eng);
985  std::mt19937 * get_rand_endgine();
986  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
987  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
988  epiworld_double runif();
989  epiworld_double rnorm();
990  epiworld_double rgamma();
991  epiworld_double runif(epiworld_double lb, epiworld_double ub);
992  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
993  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
995 
996  // Accessing parameters of the function
997  size_t get_n_samples() const {return n_samples;};
998  size_t get_n_statistics() const {return n_statistics;};
999  size_t get_n_parameters() const {return n_parameters;};
1000  epiworld_double get_epsilon() const {return epsilon;};
1001 
1002  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_now() {return params_now;};
1003  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_prev() {return params_prev;};
1004  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_init() {return params_init;};
1005  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_statistics_obs() {return observed_stats;};
1006  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_statistics_hist() {return sampled_stats;};
1007  const std::vector< bool > & get_statistics_accepted() {return sampled_accepted;};
1008  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_posterior_lf_prob() {return accepted_params_prob;};
1009  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_drawn_prob() {return drawn_prob;};
1010  std::vector< TData > * get_sampled_data() {return sampled_data;};
1011 
1012  void set_par_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1013  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1014 
1015  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_params_mean();
1016  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_stats_mean();
1017 
1018  void print() ;
1019 
1020 };
1021 
1022 #endif
1023 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1025 
1026  End of -include/epiworld//math/lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
1027

1042 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_MEAT_HPP
1043

1046 
1047  Start of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
1048 
1051 
1052 
1053 #ifndef EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1054 #define EPIWORLD_LFMCMC_BONES_HPP
1055 
1056 #ifndef epiworld_double
1057  #define epiworld_double float
1058 #endif
1059 
1060 
1061 template<typename TData>
1062 class LFMCMC;
1063 
1064 template<typename TData>
1065 using LFMCMCSimFun = std::function<TData(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1066 
1067 template<typename TData>
1068 using LFMCMCSummaryFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const TData&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1069 
1070 template<typename TData>
1071 using LFMCMCProposalFun = std::function<void(std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1072 
1073 template<typename TData>
1074 using LFMCMCKernelFun = std::function<epiworld_double(const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,const std::vector< epiworld_double >&,epiworld_double,LFMCMC<TData>*)>;
1075 
1083 template<typename TData>
1084 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
1085  std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_now,
1086  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_prev,
1087  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1088 );
1089 
1102 template<typename TData>
1103 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
1104  epiworld_double scale,
1105  epiworld_double lb = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::min(),
1106  epiworld_double ub = std::numeric_limits<epiworld_double>::max()
1107 );
1108 
1120 template<typename TData>
1121 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
1122  std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_now,
1123  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_prev,
1124  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1125 );
1126 
1137 template<typename TData>
1138 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
1139  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_now,
1140  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_obs,
1141  epiworld_double epsilon,
1142  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1143 );
1144 
1153 template<typename TData>
1154 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
1155  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_now,
1156  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_obs,
1157  epiworld_double epsilon,
1158  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1159 );
1160 
1166 template<typename TData>
1167 class LFMCMC {
1168 private:
1169 
1170  // Random number sampling
1171  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine =
1172  std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
1173 
1174  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
1175  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
1176 
1177  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
1178  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
1179 
1180  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
1181  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
1182 
1183  // Process data
1184  TData * observed_data;
1185 
1186  // Information about the size of the problem
1187  size_t n_samples;
1188  size_t n_statistics;
1189  size_t n_parameters;
1190 
1191  epiworld_double epsilon;
1192 
1193  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_now;
1194  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_prev;
1195  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init;
1196 
1197  std::vector< epiworld_double > observed_stats; ///< Observed statistics
1198 
1199  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_params; ///< Sampled Parameters
1200  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_stats; ///< Sampled statistics
1201  std::vector< epiworld_double > sampled_stats_prob; ///< Sampled statistics
1202  std::vector< bool > sampled_accepted; ///< Indicator of accepted statistics
1203 
1204  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_params; ///< Posterior distribution (accepted samples)
1205  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_stats; ///< Posterior distribution (accepted samples)
1206  std::vector< epiworld_double > accepted_params_prob; ///< Posterior probability
1207 
1208  std::vector< epiworld_double > drawn_prob; ///< Drawn probabilities (runif())
1209  std::vector< TData > * sampled_data = nullptr;
1210 
1211  // Functions
1212  LFMCMCSimFun<TData> simulation_fun;
1213  LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> summary_fun;
1214  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> proposal_fun = proposal_fun_normal<TData>;
1215  LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> kernel_fun = kernel_fun_uniform<TData>;
1216 
1217  // Misc
1218  std::vector< std::string > names_parameters;
1219  std::vector< std::string > names_statistics;
1220 
1221  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_start;
1222  std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::steady_clock> time_end;
1223 
1224  // std::chrono::milliseconds
1225  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro> time_elapsed =
1226  std::chrono::duration<epiworld_double,std::micro>::zero();
1227 
1228  inline void get_elapsed(
1229  std::string unit,
1230  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
1231  std::string * unit_abbr,
1232  bool print
1233  );
1234 
1235  void chrono_start();
1236  void chrono_end();
1237 
1238 public:
1239 
1240  void run(
1241  std::vector< epiworld_double > param_init,
1242  size_t n_samples_,
1243  epiworld_double epsilon_
1244  );
1245 
1246  LFMCMC() {};
1247  LFMCMC(TData & observed_data_) : observed_data(&observed_data_) {};
1248  ~LFMCMC() {};
1249 
1250  void set_observed_data(TData & observed_data_) {observed_data = &observed_data_;};
1251  void set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun);
1252  void set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun);
1253  void set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun);
1254  void set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun);
1255 
1262  void set_rand_engine(std::mt19937 & eng);
1263  std::mt19937 * get_rand_endgine();
1264  void seed(epiworld_fast_uint s);
1265  void set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1266  epiworld_double runif();
1267  epiworld_double rnorm();
1268  epiworld_double rgamma();
1269  epiworld_double runif(epiworld_double lb, epiworld_double ub);
1270  epiworld_double rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd);
1271  epiworld_double rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta);
1273 
1274  // Accessing parameters of the function
1275  size_t get_n_samples() const {return n_samples;};
1276  size_t get_n_statistics() const {return n_statistics;};
1277  size_t get_n_parameters() const {return n_parameters;};
1278  epiworld_double get_epsilon() const {return epsilon;};
1279 
1280  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_now() {return params_now;};
1281  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_prev() {return params_prev;};
1282  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_params_init() {return params_init;};
1283  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_statistics_obs() {return observed_stats;};
1284  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_statistics_hist() {return sampled_stats;};
1285  const std::vector< bool > & get_statistics_accepted() {return sampled_accepted;};
1286  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_posterior_lf_prob() {return accepted_params_prob;};
1287  const std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_drawn_prob() {return drawn_prob;};
1288  std::vector< TData > * get_sampled_data() {return sampled_data;};
1289 
1290  void set_par_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1291  void set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names);
1292 
1293  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_params_mean();
1294  std::vector< epiworld_double > get_stats_mean();
1295 
1296  void print() ;
1297 
1298 };
1299 
1300 #endif
1301 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1303 
1304  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-bones.hpp-
1305 
1308 
1309 
1310 
1318 template<typename TData>
1319 inline void proposal_fun_normal(
1320  std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_now,
1321  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_prev,
1322  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1323 ) {
1324 
1325  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_parameters(); ++p)
1326  params_now[p] = params_prev[p] + m->rnorm();
1327 
1328  return;
1329 }
1330 
1343 template<typename TData>
1344 inline LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> make_proposal_norm_reflective(
1345  epiworld_double scale,
1346  epiworld_double lb,
1347  epiworld_double ub
1348 ) {
1349 
1350  LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun =
1351  [scale,lb,ub](
1352  std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_now,
1353  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_prev,
1354  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1355  ) {
1356 
1357  // Making the proposal
1358  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_parameters(); ++p)
1359  params_now[p] = params_prev[p] + m->rnorm() * scale;
1360 
1361  // Checking boundaries
1362  epiworld_double d = ub - lb;
1363  int odd;
1364  epiworld_double d_above, d_below;
1365  for (auto & p : params_now)
1366  {
1367 
1368  // Correcting if parameter goes above the upper bound
1369  if (p > ub)
1370  {
1371  d_above = p - ub;
1372  odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_above / d)) % 2;
1373  d_above = d_above - std::floor(d_above / d) * d;
1374 
1375  p = (lb + d_above) * odd +
1376  (ub - d_above) * (1 - odd);
1377 
1378  // Correcting if parameter goes below upper bound
1379  } else if (p < lb)
1380  {
1381  d_below = lb - p;
1382  int odd = static_cast<int>(std::floor(d_below / d)) % 2;
1383  d_below = d_below - std::floor(d_below / d) * d;
1384 
1385  p = (ub - d_below) * odd +
1386  (lb + d_below) * (1 - odd);
1387  }
1388 
1389  }
1390 
1391  return;
1392 
1393  };
1394 
1395  return fun;
1396 }
1397 
1409 template<typename TData>
1410 inline void proposal_fun_unif(
1411  std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_now,
1412  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& params_prev,
1413  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1414 ) {
1415 
1416  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_parameters(); ++p)
1417  params_now[p] = (params_prev[p] + m->runif(-1.0, 1.0));
1418 
1419  return;
1420 }
1421 
1432 template<typename TData>
1433 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_uniform(
1434  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_now,
1435  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_obs,
1436  epiworld_double epsilon,
1437  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1438 ) {
1439 
1440  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
1441  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_parameters(); ++p)
1442  ans += std::pow(stats_obs[p] - stats_now[p], 2.0);
1443 
1444  return std::sqrt(ans) < epsilon ? 1.0 : 0.0;
1445 
1446 }
1447 
1448 #define sqrt2pi() 2.5066282746310002416
1449 
1458 template<typename TData>
1459 inline epiworld_double kernel_fun_gaussian(
1460  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_now,
1461  const std::vector< epiworld_double >& stats_obs,
1462  epiworld_double epsilon,
1463  LFMCMC<TData>* m
1464 ) {
1465 
1466  epiworld_double ans = 0.0;
1467  for (size_t p = 0u; p < m->get_n_parameters(); ++p)
1468  ans += std::pow(stats_obs[p] - stats_now[p], 2.0);
1469 
1470  return std::exp(
1471  -.5 * (ans/std::pow(1 + std::pow(epsilon, 2.0)/3.0, 2.0))
1472  ) / sqrt2pi() ;
1473 
1474 }
1475 
1476 
1477 template<typename TData>
1478 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_proposal_fun(LFMCMCProposalFun<TData> fun)
1479 {
1480  proposal_fun = fun;
1481 }
1482 
1483 template<typename TData>
1484 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_simulation_fun(LFMCMCSimFun<TData> fun)
1485 {
1486  simulation_fun = fun;
1487 }
1488 
1489 template<typename TData>
1490 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_summary_fun(LFMCMCSummaryFun<TData> fun)
1491 {
1492  summary_fun = fun;
1493 }
1494 
1495 template<typename TData>
1496 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_kernel_fun(LFMCMCKernelFun<TData> fun)
1497 {
1498  kernel_fun = fun;
1499 }
1500 
1501 
1502 template<typename TData>
1503 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::run(
1504  std::vector< epiworld_double > params_init_,
1505  size_t n_samples_,
1506  epiworld_double epsilon_
1507  )
1508 {
1509 
1510  // Starting timing
1511  chrono_start();
1512 
1513  // Setting the baseline parameters of the model
1514  n_samples = n_samples_;
1515  epsilon = epsilon_;
1516  params_init = params_init_;
1517  n_parameters = params_init_.size();
1518 
1519  params_now.resize(n_parameters);
1520  params_prev.resize(n_parameters);
1521 
1522  if (sampled_data != nullptr)
1523  sampled_data->resize(n_samples);
1524 
1525  params_prev = params_init;
1526  params_now = params_init;
1527 
1528  // Computing the baseline sufficient statistics
1529  summary_fun(observed_stats, *observed_data, this);
1530  n_statistics = observed_stats.size();
1531 
1532  // Reserving size
1533  drawn_prob.resize(n_samples);
1534  sampled_accepted.resize(n_samples, false);
1535  sampled_stats.resize(n_samples * n_statistics);
1536  sampled_stats_prob.resize(n_samples);
1537 
1538  accepted_params.resize(n_samples * n_parameters);
1539  accepted_stats.resize(n_samples * n_statistics);
1540  accepted_params_prob.resize(n_samples);
1541 
1542  TData data_i = simulation_fun(params_init, this);
1543 
1544  std::vector< epiworld_double > proposed_stats_i;
1545  summary_fun(proposed_stats_i, data_i, this);
1546  accepted_params_prob[0u] = kernel_fun(proposed_stats_i, observed_stats, epsilon, this);
1547 
1548  // Recording statistics
1549  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_statistics; ++i)
1550  sampled_stats[i] = proposed_stats_i[i];
1551 
1552  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1553  accepted_params[k] = proposed_stats_i[k];
1554 
1555  for (size_t i = 1u; i < n_samples; ++i)
1556  {
1557  // Step 1: Generate a proposal and store it in params_now
1558  proposal_fun(params_now, params_prev, this);
1559 
1560  // Step 2: Using params_now, simulate data
1561  TData data_i = simulation_fun(params_now, this);
1562 
1563  // Are we storing the data?
1564  if (sampled_data != nullptr)
1565  sampled_data->operator[](i) = data_i;
1566 
1567  // Step 3: Generate the summary statistics of the data
1568  summary_fun(proposed_stats_i, data_i, this);
1569 
1570  // Step 4: Compute the hastings ratio using the kernel function
1571  epiworld_double hr = kernel_fun(proposed_stats_i, observed_stats, epsilon, this);
1572  sampled_stats_prob[i] = hr;
1573 
1574  // Storing data
1575  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1576  sampled_stats[i * n_statistics + k] = proposed_stats_i[k];
1577 
1578  // Running Hastings ratio
1579  epiworld_double r = runif();
1580  drawn_prob[i] = r;
1581 
1582  // Step 5: Update if likely
1583  if (r < std::min(static_cast<epiworld_double>(1.0), hr / accepted_params_prob[i - 1u]))
1584  {
1585  accepted_params_prob[i] = hr;
1586  sampled_accepted[i] = true;
1587 
1588  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1589  accepted_stats[i * n_statistics + k] =
1590  proposed_stats_i[k];
1591 
1592  params_prev = params_now;
1593 
1594  } else
1595  {
1596 
1597  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1598  accepted_stats[i * n_statistics + k] =
1599  accepted_stats[(i - 1) * n_statistics + k];
1600 
1601  accepted_params_prob[i] = accepted_params_prob[i - 1u];
1602  }
1603 
1604 
1605  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_parameters; ++k)
1606  accepted_params[i * n_parameters + k] = params_prev[k];
1607 
1608  }
1609 
1610  // End timing
1611  chrono_end();
1612 
1613 }
1614 
1615 
1616 template<typename TData>
1617 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif()
1618 {
1619  return runifd->operator()(*engine);
1620 }
1621 
1622 template<typename TData>
1623 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::runif(
1624  epiworld_double lb,
1625  epiworld_double ub
1626 )
1627 {
1628  return runifd->operator()(*engine) * (ub - lb) + lb;
1629 }
1630 
1631 template<typename TData>
1632 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm()
1633 {
1634  return rnormd->operator()(*engine);
1635 }
1636 
1637 template<typename TData>
1638 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rnorm(
1639  epiworld_double mean,
1640  epiworld_double sd
1641  )
1642 {
1643  return (rnormd->operator()(*engine)) * sd + mean;
1644 }
1645 
1646 template<typename TData>
1647 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma()
1648 {
1649  return rgammad->operator()(*engine);
1650 }
1651 
1652 template<typename TData>
1653 inline epiworld_double LFMCMC<TData>::rgamma(
1654  epiworld_double alpha,
1655  epiworld_double beta
1656  )
1657 {
1658 
1659  auto old_param = rgammad->param();
1660 
1661  rgammad->param(std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta));
1662 
1663  epiworld_double ans = rgammad->operator()(*engine);
1664 
1665  rgammad->param(old_param);
1666 
1667  return ans;
1668 
1669 }
1670 
1671 template<typename TData>
1672 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::seed(epiworld_fast_uint s) {
1673 
1674  this->engine->seed(s);
1675 
1676 }
1677 
1678 template<typename TData>
1679 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_engine(std::mt19937 & eng)
1680 {
1681  engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >(eng);
1682 }
1683 
1684 template<typename TData>
1685 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
1686 {
1687  rgammad = std::make_shared<std::gamma_distribution<>>(alpha,beta);
1688 }
1689 
1690 template<typename TData>
1691 inline std::mt19937 * LFMCMC<TData>::get_rand_endgine()
1692 {
1693  return engine.get();
1694 }
1695 
1696 // Step 1: Simulate data
1697 
1698 // Step 2: Compute the sufficient statistics
1699 
1700 // Step 3: Compute the hastings-ratio
1701 
1702 // Step 4: Accept/reject, and go back to step 1
1703 
1704 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
1705  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
1706  time_end - time_start).count(); \
1707  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
1708 
1709 template<typename TData>
1710 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::get_elapsed(
1711  std::string unit,
1712  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
1713  std::string * unit_abbr,
1714  bool print
1715 ) {
1716 
1717  // Preparing the result
1718  epiworld_double elapsed;
1719  std::string abbr_unit;
1720 
1721  // Figuring out the length
1722  if (unit == "auto")
1723  {
1724 
1725  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
1726  static_cast<int>(floor(time_elapsed.count()))
1727  ).length();
1728 
1729  if (tlength <= 1)
1730  unit = "nanoseconds";
1731  else if (tlength <= 3)
1732  unit = "microseconds";
1733  else if (tlength <= 6)
1734  unit = "milliseconds";
1735  else if (tlength <= 8)
1736  unit = "seconds";
1737  else if (tlength <= 9)
1738  unit = "minutes";
1739  else
1740  unit = "hours";
1741 
1742  }
1743 
1744  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
1745  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
1746  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
1747  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
1748  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
1749  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
1750  else
1751  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
1752 
1753 
1754  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
1755  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
1756  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
1757  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
1758 
1759  if (!print)
1760  return;
1761 
1762  printf_epiworld("Elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
1763 }
1764 
1765 #undef DURCAST
1766 
1767 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1769 
1770  Start of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
1771 
1774 
1775 
1776 #ifndef LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
1777 #define LFMCMC_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
1778 
1779 template<typename TData>
1780 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::print()
1781 {
1782  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_params(n_parameters * 3, 0.0);
1783  std::vector< epiworld_double > summ_stats(n_statistics * 3, 0.0);
1784 
1785  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_parameters; ++k)
1786  {
1787 
1788  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
1789  std::vector< epiworld_double > par_i(n_samples);
1790  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_samples; ++i)
1791  {
1792  par_i[i] = accepted_params[i * n_parameters + k];
1793  summ_params[k * 3] += par_i[i]/n_samples;
1794  }
1795 
1796  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
1797  std::sort(par_i.begin(), par_i.end());
1798 
1799  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u] =
1800  par_i[std::floor(.025 * static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_samples))];
1801  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u] =
1802  par_i[std::floor(.975 * static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_samples))];
1803 
1804  }
1805 
1806  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1807  {
1808 
1809  // Retrieving the relevant parameter
1810  std::vector< epiworld_double > stat_k(n_samples);
1811  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_samples; ++i)
1812  {
1813  stat_k[i] = accepted_stats[i * n_statistics + k];
1814  summ_stats[k * 3] += stat_k[i]/n_samples;
1815  }
1816 
1817  // Computing the 95% Credible interval
1818  std::sort(stat_k.begin(), stat_k.end());
1819 
1820  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u] =
1821  stat_k[std::floor(.025 * static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_samples))];
1822  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u] =
1823  stat_k[std::floor(.975 * static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_samples))];
1824 
1825  }
1826 
1827  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
1828  printf_epiworld("LIKELIHOOD-FREE MARKOV CHAIN MONTE CARLO\n\n");
1829 
1830  printf_epiworld("N Samples : %ld\n", n_samples);
1831 
1832  std::string abbr;
1833  epiworld_double elapsed;
1834  get_elapsed("auto", &elapsed, &abbr, false);
1835  printf_epiworld("Elapsed t : %.2f%s\n\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
1836 
1838  // PARAMETERS
1840  printf_epiworld("Parameters:\n");
1841 
1842  // Figuring out format
1843  std::string fmt_params;
1844 
1845  int nchar_par_num = 0;
1846  for (auto & n : summ_params)
1847  {
1848 
1849  int tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(n)));
1850  if (nchar_par_num < tmp_nchar)
1851  nchar_par_num = tmp_nchar;
1852  }
1853  nchar_par_num += 5; // 1 for neg padd, 2 for decimals, 1 the decimal point, and one b/c log(<10) < 1.
1854  std::string charlen = std::to_string(nchar_par_num);
1855 
1856  if (names_parameters.size() != 0u)
1857  {
1858  int nchar_par = 0;
1859  for (auto & n : names_parameters)
1860  {
1861  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
1862  if (nchar_par < tmp_nchar)
1863  nchar_par = tmp_nchar;
1864  }
1865 
1866  fmt_params = std::string(" -%-") +
1867  std::to_string(nchar_par) +
1868  std::string("s : % ") + charlen +
1869  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
1870  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
1871  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") +
1872  charlen + std::string(".2f)\n");
1873 
1874  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_parameters; ++k)
1875  {
1876  printf_epiworld(
1877  fmt_params.c_str(),
1878  names_parameters[k].c_str(),
1879  summ_params[k * 3],
1880  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
1881  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
1882  params_init[k]
1883  );
1884  }
1885 
1886 
1887  } else {
1888 
1889  fmt_params = std::string(" [%-2ld]: % ") + charlen +
1890  std::string(".2f [% ") + charlen +
1891  std::string(".2f, % ") + charlen +
1892  std::string(".2f] (initial : % ") + charlen +
1893  std::string(".2f)\n");
1894 
1895  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_parameters; ++k)
1896  {
1897 
1898  printf_epiworld(
1899  fmt_params.c_str(),
1900  k,
1901  summ_params[k * 3],
1902  summ_params[k * 3 + 1u],
1903  summ_params[k * 3 + 2u],
1904  params_init[k]
1905  );
1906  }
1907 
1908  }
1909 
1911  // Statistics
1913  printf_epiworld("\nStatistics:\n");
1914  int nchar = 0;
1915  for (auto & s : summ_stats)
1916  {
1917  int tmp_nchar = std::floor(std::log10(std::abs(s)));
1918  if (nchar < tmp_nchar)
1919  nchar = tmp_nchar;
1920  }
1921 
1922  nchar += 5; // See above
1923 
1924  std::string nchar_char = std::to_string(nchar);
1925 
1926  // Figuring out format
1927  std::string fmt_stats;
1928  if (names_statistics.size() != 0u)
1929  {
1930  int nchar_stats = 0;
1931  for (auto & n : names_statistics)
1932  {
1933  int tmp_nchar = n.length();
1934  if (nchar_stats < tmp_nchar)
1935  nchar_stats = tmp_nchar;
1936  }
1937 
1938  fmt_stats = std::string(" -%-") +
1939  std::to_string(nchar_stats) +
1940  std::string("s : % ") + nchar_char +
1941  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
1942  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
1943  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
1944  std::string(".2f)\n");
1945 
1946  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1947  {
1948  printf_epiworld(
1949  fmt_stats.c_str(),
1950  names_statistics[k].c_str(),
1951  summ_stats[k * 3],
1952  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
1953  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
1954  observed_stats[k]
1955  );
1956  }
1957 
1958 
1959  } else {
1960 
1961  fmt_stats = std::string(" [%-2ld] : % ") +
1962  nchar_char +
1963  std::string(".2f [% ") + nchar_char +
1964  std::string(".2f, % ") + nchar_char +
1965  std::string(".2f] (Observed: % ") + nchar_char +
1966  std::string(".2f)\n");
1967 
1968  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
1969  {
1970  printf_epiworld(
1971  fmt_stats.c_str(),
1972  k,
1973  summ_stats[k * 3],
1974  summ_stats[k * 3 + 1u],
1975  summ_stats[k * 3 + 2u],
1976  observed_stats[k]
1977  );
1978  }
1979 
1980  }
1981 
1982  printf_epiworld("___________________________________________\n\n");
1983 }
1984 
1985 #endif
1986 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1988 
1989  End of -include/epiworld//math//lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat-print.hpp-
1990 
1993 
1994 
1995 
1996 template<typename TData>
1997 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_start() {
1998  time_start = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
1999 }
2000 
2001 template<typename TData>
2002 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::chrono_end() {
2003  time_end = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2004  time_elapsed += (time_end - time_start);
2005 }
2006 
2007 template<typename TData>
2008 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_par_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
2009 {
2010 
2011  if (names.size() != n_parameters)
2012  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of parameters in the model.");
2013 
2014  names_parameters = names;
2015 
2016 }
2017 template<typename TData>
2018 inline void LFMCMC<TData>::set_stats_names(std::vector< std::string > names)
2019 {
2020 
2021  if (names.size() != n_statistics)
2022  throw std::length_error("The number of names to add differs from the number of statistics in the model.");
2023 
2024  names_statistics = names;
2025 
2026 }
2027 
2028 template<typename TData>
2029 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_params_mean()
2030 {
2031  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->n_parameters, 0.0);
2032 
2033  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_parameters; ++k)
2034  {
2035  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_samples; ++i)
2036  res[k] += (this->accepted_params[k + n_parameters * i])/
2037  static_cast< epiworld_double >(n_samples);
2038  }
2039 
2040  return res;
2041 
2042 }
2043 
2044 template<typename TData>
2045 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > LFMCMC<TData>::get_stats_mean()
2046 {
2047  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(this->n_statistics, 0.0);
2048 
2049  for (size_t k = 0u; k < n_statistics; ++k)
2050  {
2051  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_samples; ++i)
2052  res[k] += (this->accepted_stats[k + n_statistics * i])/
2053  static_cast< epiworld_double >(n_samples);
2054  }
2055 
2056  return res;
2057 
2058 }
2059 
2060 #endif
2061 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2063 
2064  End of -include/epiworld//math/lfmcmc/lfmcmc-meat.hpp-
2065

2071 #endif
2072 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2074

2076

2082 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2084 
2085  Start of -include/epiworld/userdata-bones.hpp-
2086 
2089 
2090 
2091 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
2092 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_BONES_HPP
2093 
2094 template<typename TSeq>
2095 class Model;
2096 
2097 template<typename TSeq>
2098 class DataBase;
2099 
2105 template<typename TSeq>
2106 class UserData
2107 {
2108  friend class Model<TSeq>;
2109  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
2110 
2111 private:
2112  Model<TSeq> * model;
2113 
2114  std::vector< std::string > data_names;
2115  std::vector< int > data_dates;
2116  std::vector< epiworld_double > data_data;
2117 
2118  epiworld_fast_uint k = 0u;
2119  epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u;
2120 
2121  int last_day = -1;
2122 
2123 public:
2124 
2125  UserData() = delete;
2126  UserData(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m) {};
2127 
2134  UserData(std::vector< std::string > names);
2135 
2143  void add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x);
2144  void add(
2145  epiworld_fast_uint j,
2146  epiworld_double x
2147  );
2149 
2158  epiworld_double & operator()(
2159  epiworld_fast_uint i,
2160  epiworld_fast_uint j
2161  );
2162 
2163  epiworld_double & operator()(
2164  epiworld_fast_uint i,
2165  std::string name
2166  );
2168 
2169  std::vector< std::string > & get_names();
2170 
2171  std::vector< int > & get_dates();
2172 
2173  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_data();
2174 
2175  void get_all(
2176  std::vector< std::string > * names = nullptr,
2177  std::vector< int > * date = nullptr,
2178  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data = nullptr
2179  );
2180 
2181  epiworld_fast_uint nrow() const;
2182  epiworld_fast_uint ncol() const;
2183 
2184  void write(std::string fn);
2185  void print() const;
2186 
2187 };
2188 
2189 #endif
2190 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2192 
2193  End of -include/epiworld/userdata-bones.hpp-
2194 
2197 
2198 
2199 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2201 
2202  Start of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
2203 
2206 
2207 
2208 #ifndef EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
2209 #define EPIWORLD_USERDATA_MEAT_HPP
2210 
2211 template<typename TSeq>
2212 class UserData;
2213 
2214 template<typename TSeq>
2215 inline UserData<TSeq>::UserData(std::vector< std::string > names)
2216 {
2217 
2218  k = names.size();
2219  data_names = names;
2220 
2221 }
2222 
2223 template<typename TSeq>
2224 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(std::vector<epiworld_double> x)
2225 {
2226 
2227  if (x.size() != k)
2228  throw std::out_of_range(
2229  "The size of -x-, " + std::to_string(x.size()) + ", does not match " +
2230  "the number of elements registered (" + std::to_string(k));
2231 
2232  for (auto & i : x)
2233  data_data.push_back(i);
2234 
2235  data_dates.push_back(model->today());
2236 
2237  n++;
2238  last_day = model->today();
2239 
2240 }
2241 
2242 template<typename TSeq>
2243 inline void UserData<TSeq>::add(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x)
2244 {
2245 
2246  // Starting with a new day?
2247  if (static_cast<int>(model->today()) != last_day)
2248  {
2249 
2250  std::vector< epiworld_double > tmp(k, 0.0);
2251 
2252  tmp[j] = x;
2253 
2254  add(tmp);
2255 
2256  }
2257  else
2258  {
2259 
2260  this->operator()(n - 1, j) = x;
2261 
2262  }
2263 
2264 }
2265 
2266 template<typename TSeq>
2267 inline std::vector< std::string > & UserData<TSeq>::get_names()
2268 {
2269  return data_names;
2270 }
2271 
2272 template<typename TSeq>
2273 inline std::vector< int > & UserData<TSeq>::get_dates()
2274 {
2275  return data_dates;
2276 }
2277 
2278 template<typename TSeq>
2279 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & UserData<TSeq>::get_data()
2280 {
2281  return data_data;
2282 }
2283 
2284 template<typename TSeq>
2285 inline void UserData<TSeq>::get_all(
2286  std::vector< std::string > * names,
2287  std::vector< int > * dates,
2288  std::vector< epiworld_double > * data
2289 )
2290 {
2291 
2292  if (names != nullptr)
2293  names = &this->data_names;
2294 
2295  if (dates != nullptr)
2296  dates = &this->data_dates;
2297 
2298  if (data != nullptr)
2299  data = &this->data_data;
2300 
2301 }
2302 
2303 template<typename TSeq>
2304 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
2305  epiworld_fast_uint i,
2306  epiworld_fast_uint j
2307 )
2308 {
2309 
2310  if (j >= k)
2311  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than k - 1.");
2312 
2313  if (i >= n)
2314  throw std::out_of_range("j cannot be greater than n - 1.");
2315 
2316  return data_data[k * i + j];
2317 
2318 }
2319 
2320 template<typename TSeq>
2321 inline epiworld_double & UserData<TSeq>::operator()(
2322  epiworld_fast_uint i,
2323  std::string name
2324 )
2325 {
2326  int loc = -1;
2327  for (epiworld_fast_uint l = 0u; l < k; ++l)
2328  {
2329 
2330  if (name == data_names[l])
2331  {
2332 
2333  loc = l;
2334  break;
2335 
2336  }
2337 
2338  }
2339 
2340  if (loc < 0)
2341  throw std::range_error(
2342  "The variable \"" + name + "\" is not present " +
2343  "in the user UserData database."
2344  );
2345 
2346  return operator()(i, static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(loc));
2347 
2348 }
2349 
2350 template<typename TSeq>
2351 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::nrow() const
2352 {
2353  return n;
2354 }
2355 
2356 template<typename TSeq>
2357 inline epiworld_fast_uint UserData<TSeq>::ncol() const
2358 {
2359  return k;
2360 }
2361 
2362 template<typename TSeq>
2363 inline void UserData<TSeq>::write(std::string fn)
2364 {
2365  std::ofstream file_ud(fn, std::ios_base::out);
2366 
2367  // File header
2368  file_ud << "\"date\"";
2369  for (auto & cn : data_names)
2370  file_ud << " \"" + cn + "\"";
2371  file_ud << "\n";
2372 
2373  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
2374  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
2375  {
2376  file_ud << data_dates[i];
2377 
2378  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
2379  file_ud << " " << data_data[ndata++];
2380 
2381  file_ud << "\n";
2382  }
2383 
2384  return;
2385 }
2386 
2387 template<typename TSeq>
2388 inline void UserData<TSeq>::print() const
2389 {
2390  // File header
2391  printf_epiworld("Total records: %i\n", n);
2392  printf_epiworld("date");
2393 
2394  for (auto & cn : data_names)
2395  {
2396 
2397  printf_epiworld(" %s", cn.c_str());
2398 
2399  }
2400 
2401  printf_epiworld("\n");
2402 
2403  epiworld_fast_uint ndata = 0u;
2404 
2405  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
2406  {
2407 
2408  printf_epiworld("%i", data_dates[i]);
2409 
2410  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 0u; j < k; ++j)
2411  {
2412 
2413  printf_epiworld(" %.2f", data_data[ndata++]);
2414 
2415  }
2416 
2417  printf_epiworld("\n");
2418 
2419  }
2420 
2421  return;
2422 }
2423 
2424 #endif
2425 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2427 
2428  End of -include/epiworld/userdata-meat.hpp-
2429 
2432 
2433 
2434 
2435 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2437 
2438  Start of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
2439 
2442 
2443 
2444 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
2445 #define EPIWORLD_SEQ_PROCESSING_HPP
2446 
2454 template<typename TSeq>
2455 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher(const TSeq & x);
2456 
2457 template<>
2458 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<int>>(const std::vector<int> & x) {
2459  return x;
2460 }
2461 
2462 template<>
2463 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<std::vector<bool>>(const std::vector<bool> & x) {
2464  std::vector<int> ans(x.size());
2465  size_t j = 0;
2466  for (const auto & i : x)
2467  ans[j++] = i? 1 : 0;
2468  return ans;
2469 }
2470 
2471 template<>
2472 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<int>(const int & x) {
2473  return {x};
2474 }
2475 
2476 template<>
2477 inline std::vector<int> default_seq_hasher<bool>(const bool & x) {
2478  return {x ? 1 : 0};
2479 }
2480 
2488 template<typename TSeq = int>
2489 inline std::string default_seq_writer(const TSeq & seq);
2490 
2491 template<>
2492 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<int>>(
2493  const std::vector<int> & seq
2494 ) {
2495 
2496  std::string out = "";
2497  for (const auto & s : seq)
2498  out = out + std::to_string(s);
2499 
2500  return out;
2501 
2502 }
2503 
2504 template<>
2505 inline std::string default_seq_writer<std::vector<bool>>(
2506  const std::vector<bool> & seq
2507 ) {
2508 
2509  std::string out = "";
2510  for (const auto & s : seq)
2511  out = out + (s ? "1" : "0");
2512 
2513  return out;
2514 
2515 }
2516 
2517 template<>
2518 inline std::string default_seq_writer<bool>(
2519  const bool & seq
2520 ) {
2521 
2522  return seq ? "1" : "0";
2523 
2524 }
2525 
2526 template<>
2527 inline std::string default_seq_writer<int>(
2528  const int & seq
2529 ) {
2530 
2531  return std::to_string(seq);
2532 
2533 }
2534 
2535 
2536 
2537 #endif
2538 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2540 
2541  End of -include/epiworld/seq_processing.hpp-
2542 
2545 
2546 
2547 
2548 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2550 
2551  Start of -include/epiworld/database-bones.hpp-
2552 
2555 
2556 
2557 #ifndef EPIWORLD_DATABASE_BONES_HPP
2558 #define EPIWORLD_DATABASE_BONES_HPP
2559 
2560 template<typename TSeq>
2561 class Model;
2562 
2563 template<typename TSeq>
2564 class Virus;
2565 
2566 template<typename TSeq>
2567 class UserData;
2568 
2569 template<typename TSeq>
2570 inline void default_add_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2571 
2572 template<typename TSeq>
2573 inline void default_add_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2574 
2575 template<typename TSeq>
2576 inline void default_rm_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2577 
2578 template<typename TSeq>
2579 inline void default_rm_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2580 
2586 template<typename TSeq>
2587 class DataBase {
2588  friend class Model<TSeq>;
2589  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2590  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2591  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2592  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
2593 private:
2594  Model<TSeq> * model;
2595 
2596  // Variants information
2597  MapVec_type<int,int> variant_id; ///< The squence is the key
2598  std::vector< std::string > variant_name;
2599  std::vector< TSeq> variant_sequence;
2600  std::vector< int > variant_origin_date;
2601  std::vector< int > variant_parent_id;
2602 
2603  MapVec_type<int,int> tool_id; ///< The squence is the key
2604  std::vector< std::string > tool_name;
2605  std::vector< TSeq> tool_sequence;
2606  std::vector< int > tool_origin_date;
2607 
2608  std::function<std::vector<int>(const TSeq&)> seq_hasher = default_seq_hasher<TSeq>;
2609  std::function<std::string(const TSeq &)> seq_writer = default_seq_writer<TSeq>;
2610 
2611  // {Variant 1: {Status 1, Status 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
2612  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_variant;
2613 
2614  // {Variant 1: {Status 1, Status 2, etc.}, Variant 2: {...}, ...}
2615  std::vector< std::vector<int> > today_tool;
2616 
2617  // {Susceptible, Infected, etc.}
2618  std::vector< int > today_total;
2619 
2620  // Totals
2621  int today_total_nvariants_active = 0;
2622 
2623  int sampling_freq = 1;
2624 
2625  // Variants history
2626  std::vector< int > hist_variant_date;
2627  std::vector< int > hist_variant_id;
2628  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_variant_status;
2629  std::vector< int > hist_variant_counts;
2630 
2631  // Tools history
2632  std::vector< int > hist_tool_date;
2633  std::vector< int > hist_tool_id;
2634  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_tool_status;
2635  std::vector< int > hist_tool_counts;
2636 
2637  // Overall hist
2638  std::vector< int > hist_total_date;
2639  std::vector< int > hist_total_nvariants_active;
2640  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > hist_total_status;
2641  std::vector< int > hist_total_counts;
2642  std::vector< int > hist_transition_matrix;
2643 
2644  // Transmission network
2645  std::vector< int > transmission_date; ///< Date of the transmission event
2646  std::vector< int > transmission_source; ///< Id of the source
2647  std::vector< int > transmission_target; ///< Id of the target
2648  std::vector< int > transmission_variant; ///< Id of the variant
2649  std::vector< int > transmission_source_exposure_date; ///< Date when the source acquired the variant
2650 
2651  std::vector< int > transition_matrix;
2652 
2653  UserData<TSeq> user_data;
2654 
2655  void update_state(
2656  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
2657  epiworld_fast_uint new_status,
2658  bool undo = false
2659  );
2660 
2661  void update_virus(
2662  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
2663  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
2664  epiworld_fast_uint new_status
2665  );
2666 
2667  void update_tool(
2668  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
2669  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
2670  epiworld_fast_uint new_status
2671  );
2672 
2673  void record_transition(epiworld_fast_uint from, epiworld_fast_uint to, bool undo);
2674 
2675 public:
2676 
2677 
2678  DataBase() = delete;
2679  DataBase(Model<TSeq> & m) : model(&m), user_data(m) {};
2680 
2689  void record_variant(Virus<TSeq> & v);
2690  void record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t);
2691  void set_seq_hasher(std::function<std::vector<int>(TSeq)> fun);
2692  void set_model(Model<TSeq> & m);
2693  Model<TSeq> * get_model();
2694  void record();
2695 
2696  const std::vector< TSeq > & get_sequence() const;
2697  const std::vector< int > & get_nexposed() const;
2698  size_t size() const;
2699 
2713  int get_today_total(std::string what) const;
2714  int get_today_total(epiworld_fast_uint what) const;
2715  void get_today_total(
2716  std::vector< std::string > * status = nullptr,
2717  std::vector< int > * counts = nullptr
2718  ) const;
2719 
2720  void get_today_variant(
2721  std::vector< std::string > & status,
2722  std::vector< int > & id,
2723  std::vector< int > & counts
2724  ) const;
2725 
2726  void get_hist_total(
2727  std::vector< int > * date,
2728  std::vector< std::string > * status,
2729  std::vector< int > * counts
2730  ) const;
2731 
2732  void get_hist_variant(
2733  std::vector< int > & date,
2734  std::vector< int > & id,
2735  std::vector< std::string > & status,
2736  std::vector< int > & counts
2737  ) const;
2739 
2740  void write_data(
2741  std::string fn_variant_info,
2742  std::string fn_variant_hist,
2743  std::string fn_tool_info,
2744  std::string fn_tool_hist,
2745  std::string fn_total_hist,
2746  std::string fn_transmission,
2747  std::string fn_transition,
2748  std::string fn_reproductive_number
2749  ) const;
2750 
2751  void record_transmission(int i, int j, int variant, int i_expo_date);
2752 
2753  size_t get_n_variants() const;
2754  size_t get_n_tools() const;
2755 
2756  void reset();
2757 
2758 
2759  void set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names);
2760  void add_user_data(std::vector< epiworld_double > x);
2761  void add_user_data(epiworld_fast_uint j, epiworld_double x);
2762  UserData<TSeq> & get_user_data();
2763 
2764 
2775  MapVec_type<int,int> reproductive_number() const;
2776 
2777  void reproductive_number(
2778  std::string fn
2779  ) const;
2781 
2787  std::vector< epiworld_double > transition_probability(
2788  bool print = true
2789  ) const;
2790 
2791 };
2792

2794 #endif
2795 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2797 
2798  End of -include/epiworld/database-bones.hpp-
2799 
2802 
2803 
2804 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2806 
2807  Start of -include/epiworld/database-meat.hpp-
2808 
2811 
2812 
2813 #ifndef EPIWORLD_DATABASE_MEAT_HPP
2814 #define EPIWORLD_DATABASE_MEAT_HPP
2815 
2816 template<typename TSeq>
2817 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::set_model(Model<TSeq> & m)
2818 {
2819  model = &m;
2820  user_data.model = &m;
2821 
2822  reset();
2823 
2824  // Initializing the counts
2825  today_total.resize(m.nstatus);
2826  std::fill(today_total.begin(), today_total.end(), 0);
2827  for (auto & p : *m.get_agents())
2828  ++today_total[p.get_status()];
2829 
2830  transition_matrix.resize(m.nstatus * m.nstatus);
2831  std::fill(transition_matrix.begin(), transition_matrix.end(), 0);
2832  for (size_t s = 0u; s < m.nstatus; ++s)
2833  transition_matrix[s + s*m.nstatus] = today_total[s];
2834 
2835 
2836  return;
2837 
2838 }
2839 
2840 template<typename TSeq>
2841 inline Model<TSeq> * DataBase<TSeq>::get_model() {
2842  return model;
2843 }
2844 
2845 template<typename TSeq>
2846 inline const std::vector< TSeq > & DataBase<TSeq>::get_sequence() const {
2847  return variant_sequence;
2848 }
2849 
2850 template<typename TSeq>
2851 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record()
2852 {
2853 
2855  // DEBUGGING BLOCK
2857  EPI_DEBUG_SUM_INT(today_total, model->size())
2858  EPI_DEBUG_ALL_NON_NEGATIVE(today_total)
2859 
2860  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
2861  // Checking whether the sums correspond
2862  std::vector< int > _today_total_cp(today_total.size(), 0);
2863  for (auto & p : model->population)
2864  _today_total_cp[p.get_status()]++;
2865 
2866  EPI_DEBUG_VECTOR_MATCH_INT(_today_total_cp, today_total)
2867  #endif
2869 
2870  // Only store every now and then
2871  if ((model->today() % sampling_freq) == 0)
2872  {
2873 
2874  // Recording variant's history
2875  for (auto & p : variant_id)
2876  {
2877 
2878  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstatus; ++s)
2879  {
2880 
2881  hist_variant_date.push_back(model->today());
2882  hist_variant_id.push_back(p.second);
2883  hist_variant_status.push_back(s);
2884  hist_variant_counts.push_back(today_variant[p.second][s]);
2885 
2886  }
2887 
2888  }
2889 
2890  // Recording tool's history
2891  for (auto & p : tool_id)
2892  {
2893 
2894  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstatus; ++s)
2895  {
2896 
2897  hist_tool_date.push_back(model->today());
2898  hist_tool_id.push_back(p.second);
2899  hist_tool_status.push_back(s);
2900  hist_tool_counts.push_back(today_tool[p.second][s]);
2901 
2902  }
2903 
2904  }
2905 
2906  // Recording the overall history
2907  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->nstatus; ++s)
2908  {
2909  hist_total_date.push_back(model->today());
2910  hist_total_nvariants_active.push_back(today_total_nvariants_active);
2911  hist_total_status.push_back(s);
2912  hist_total_counts.push_back(today_total[s]);
2913  }
2914 
2915  for (auto cell : transition_matrix)
2916  hist_transition_matrix.push_back(cell);
2917 
2918  // Now the diagonal must reflect the state
2919  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < model->nstatus; ++s_i)
2920  {
2921  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < model->nstatus; ++s_j)
2922  {
2923  if ((s_i != s_j) && (transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstatus] > 0))
2924  {
2925  transition_matrix[s_j + s_j * model->nstatus] +=
2926  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstatus];
2927 
2928  transition_matrix[s_i + s_j * model->nstatus] = 0;
2929  }
2930 
2931  }
2932 
2933  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
2934  if (transition_matrix[s_i + s_i * model->nstatus] !=
2935  today_total[s_i])
2936  throw std::logic_error(
2937  "The diagonal of the updated transition Matrix should match the daily totals"
2938  );
2939  #endif
2940  }
2941 
2942 
2943  }
2944 
2945 }
2946 
2947 template<typename TSeq>
2948 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_variant(Virus<TSeq> & v)
2949 {
2950 
2951  // Updating registry
2952  std::vector< int > hash = seq_hasher(*v.get_sequence());
2953  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = v.get_id();
2954  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
2955  if (variant_id.find(hash) == variant_id.end())
2956  {
2957 
2958  new_id = variant_id.size();
2959  variant_id[hash] = new_id;
2960  variant_name.push_back(v.get_name());
2961  variant_sequence.push_back(*v.get_sequence());
2962  variant_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
2963 
2964  variant_parent_id.push_back(old_id);
2965 
2966  today_variant.push_back({});
2967  today_variant[new_id].resize(model->nstatus, 0);
2968 
2969  // Updating the variant
2970  v.set_id(new_id);
2971  v.set_date(model->today());
2972 
2973  today_total_nvariants_active++;
2974 
2975  } else {
2976 
2977  // Finding the id
2978  new_id = variant_id[hash];
2979 
2980  // Reflecting the change
2981  v.set_id(new_id);
2982  v.set_date(variant_origin_date[new_id]);
2983 
2984  }
2985 
2986  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
2987  if (v.get_agent() != nullptr)
2988  {
2989  // Correcting math
2990  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_status = v.get_agent()->get_status();
2991  today_variant[old_id][tmp_status]--;
2992  today_variant[new_id][tmp_status]++;
2993 
2994  }
2995 
2996  return;
2997 }
2998 
2999 template<typename TSeq>
3000 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_tool(Tool<TSeq> & t)
3001 {
3002 
3003  // Updating registry
3004  std::vector< int > hash = seq_hasher(*t.get_sequence());
3005  epiworld_fast_uint old_id = t.get_id();
3006  epiworld_fast_uint new_id;
3007  if (tool_id.find(hash) == tool_id.end())
3008  {
3009 
3010  new_id = tool_id.size();
3011  tool_id[hash] = new_id;
3012  tool_name.push_back(t.get_name());
3013  tool_sequence.push_back(*t.get_sequence());
3014  tool_origin_date.push_back(model->today());
3015 
3016  today_tool.push_back({});
3017  today_tool[new_id].resize(model->nstatus, 0);
3018 
3019  // Updating the tool
3020  t.set_id(new_id);
3021  t.set_date(model->today());
3022 
3023  } else {
3024 
3025  // Finding the id
3026  new_id = tool_id[hash];
3027 
3028  // Reflecting the change
3029  t.set_id(new_id);
3030  t.set_date(tool_origin_date[new_id]);
3031 
3032  }
3033 
3034  // Moving statistics (only if we are affecting an individual)
3035  if (t.get_agent() != nullptr)
3036  {
3037  // Correcting math
3038  epiworld_fast_uint tmp_status = t.get_agent()->get_status();
3039  today_tool[old_id][tmp_status]--;
3040  today_tool[new_id][tmp_status]++;
3041 
3042  }
3043 
3044  return;
3045 }
3046 
3047 template<typename TSeq>
3048 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::size() const
3049 {
3050  return variant_id.size();
3051 }
3052 
3053 template<typename TSeq>
3054 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_state(
3055  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
3056  epiworld_fast_uint new_status,
3057  bool undo
3058 ) {
3059 
3060  if (undo)
3061  {
3062 
3063  today_total[prev_status]++;
3064  today_total[new_status]--;
3065 
3066  } else {
3067 
3068  today_total[prev_status]--;
3069  today_total[new_status]++;
3070 
3071  }
3072 
3073  record_transition(prev_status, new_status, undo);
3074 
3075  return;
3076 }
3077 
3078 template<typename TSeq>
3079 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_virus(
3080  epiworld_fast_uint virus_id,
3081  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
3082  epiworld_fast_uint new_status
3083 ) {
3084 
3085  today_variant[virus_id][prev_status]--;
3086  today_variant[virus_id][new_status]++;
3087 
3088  return;
3089 
3090 }
3091 
3092 template<typename TSeq>
3093 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::update_tool(
3094  epiworld_fast_uint tool_id,
3095  epiworld_fast_uint prev_status,
3096  epiworld_fast_uint new_status
3097 ) {
3098 
3099 
3100  today_tool[tool_id][prev_status]--;
3101  today_tool[tool_id][new_status]++;
3102 
3103  return;
3104 
3105 }
3106 
3107 template<typename TSeq>
3108 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transition(
3109  epiworld_fast_uint from,
3110  epiworld_fast_uint to,
3111  bool undo
3112 ) {
3113 
3114  if (undo)
3115  {
3116 
3117  transition_matrix[to * model->nstatus + from]--;
3118  transition_matrix[from * model->nstatus + from]++;
3119 
3120  } else {
3121 
3122  transition_matrix[to * model->nstatus + from]++;
3123  transition_matrix[from * model->nstatus + from]--;
3124 
3125  }
3126 
3127  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
3128  if (transition_matrix[from * model->nstatus + from] < 0)
3129  throw std::logic_error("An entry in transition matrix is negative.");
3130  #endif
3131 
3132 }
3133 
3134 template<typename TSeq>
3135 inline int DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
3136  std::string what
3137 ) const
3138 {
3139 
3140  for (auto i = 0u; i < model->status_labels.size(); ++i)
3141  {
3142  if (model->status_labels[i] == what)
3143  return today_total[i];
3144  }
3145 
3146  throw std::range_error("The value '" + what + "' is not in the model.");
3147 
3148 }
3149 
3150 template<typename TSeq>
3151 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_total(
3152  std::vector< std::string > * status,
3153  std::vector< int > * counts
3154 ) const
3155 {
3156  if (status != nullptr)
3157  (*status) = model->status_labels;
3158 
3159  if (counts != nullptr)
3160  *counts = today_total;
3161 
3162 }
3163 
3164 template<typename TSeq>
3165 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_today_variant(
3166  std::vector< std::string > & status,
3167  std::vector< int > & id,
3168  std::vector< int > & counts
3169  ) const
3170 {
3171 
3172  status.resize(today_variant.size(), "");
3173  id.resize(today_variant.size(), 0);
3174  counts.resize(today_variant.size(),0);
3175 
3176  int n = 0u;
3177  for (epiworld_fast_uint v = 0u; v < today_variant.size(); ++v)
3178  for (epiworld_fast_uint s = 0u; s < model->status_labels.size(); ++s)
3179  {
3180  status[n] = model->status_labels[s];
3181  id[n] = static_cast<int>(v);
3182  counts[n++] = today_variant[v][s];
3183 
3184  }
3185 
3186 }
3187 
3188 template<typename TSeq>
3189 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_total(
3190  std::vector< int > * date,
3191  std::vector< std::string > * status,
3192  std::vector< int > * counts
3193 ) const
3194 {
3195 
3196  if (date != nullptr)
3197  *date = hist_total_date;
3198 
3199  if (status != nullptr)
3200  {
3201  status->resize(hist_total_status.size(), "");
3202  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_total_status.size(); ++i)
3203  status->operator[](i) = model->status_labels[hist_total_status[i]];
3204  }
3205 
3206  if (counts != nullptr)
3207  *counts = hist_total_counts;
3208 
3209  return;
3210 
3211 }
3212 
3213 template<typename TSeq>
3214 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::get_hist_variant(
3215  std::vector< int > & date,
3216  std::vector< int > & id,
3217  std::vector< std::string > & status,
3218  std::vector< int > & counts
3219 ) const {
3220 
3221  date = hist_variant_date;
3222  std::vector< std::string > labels;
3223  labels = model->status_labels;
3224 
3225  id = hist_variant_id;
3226  status.resize(hist_variant_status.size(), "");
3227  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < hist_variant_status.size(); ++i)
3228  status[i] = labels[hist_variant_status[i]];
3229 
3230  counts = hist_variant_counts;
3231 
3232  return;
3233 
3234 }
3235 
3236 template<typename TSeq>
3237 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::write_data(
3238  std::string fn_variant_info,
3239  std::string fn_variant_hist,
3240  std::string fn_tool_info,
3241  std::string fn_tool_hist,
3242  std::string fn_total_hist,
3243  std::string fn_transmission,
3244  std::string fn_transition,
3245  std::string fn_reproductive_number
3246 ) const
3247 {
3248 
3249  if (fn_variant_info != "")
3250  {
3251  std::ofstream file_variant_info(fn_variant_info, std::ios_base::out);
3252 
3253  file_variant_info <<
3254  "id " << "variant_name " << "variant_sequence " << "date_recorded " << "parent\n";
3255 
3256  for (const auto & v : variant_id)
3257  {
3258  int id = v.second;
3259  file_variant_info <<
3260  id << " \"" <<
3261  variant_name[id] << "\" " <<
3262  seq_writer(variant_sequence[id]) << " " <<
3263  variant_origin_date[id] << " " <<
3264  variant_parent_id[id] << "\n";
3265  }
3266 
3267  }
3268 
3269  if (fn_variant_hist != "")
3270  {
3271  std::ofstream file_variant(fn_variant_hist, std::ios_base::out);
3272 
3273  file_variant <<
3274  "date " << "id " << "status " << "n\n";
3275 
3276  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_variant_id.size(); ++i)
3277  file_variant <<
3278  hist_variant_date[i] << " " <<
3279  hist_variant_id[i] << " " <<
3280  model->status_labels[hist_variant_status[i]] << " " <<
3281  hist_variant_counts[i] << "\n";
3282  }
3283 
3284  if (fn_tool_info != "")
3285  {
3286  std::ofstream file_tool_info(fn_tool_info, std::ios_base::out);
3287 
3288  file_tool_info <<
3289  "id " << "tool_name " << "tool_sequence " << "date_recorded\n";
3290 
3291  for (const auto & t : tool_id)
3292  {
3293  int id = t.second;
3294  file_tool_info <<
3295  id << " \"" <<
3296  tool_name[id] << "\" " <<
3297  seq_writer(tool_sequence[id]) << " " <<
3298  tool_origin_date[id] << "\n";
3299  }
3300 
3301  }
3302 
3303  if (fn_tool_hist != "")
3304  {
3305  std::ofstream file_tool_hist(fn_tool_hist, std::ios_base::out);
3306 
3307  file_tool_hist <<
3308  "date " << "id " << "status " << "n\n";
3309 
3310  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_tool_id.size(); ++i)
3311  file_tool_hist <<
3312  hist_tool_date[i] << " " <<
3313  hist_tool_id[i] << " " <<
3314  model->status_labels[hist_tool_status[i]] << " " <<
3315  hist_tool_counts[i] << "\n";
3316  }
3317 
3318  if (fn_total_hist != "")
3319  {
3320  std::ofstream file_total(fn_total_hist, std::ios_base::out);
3321 
3322  file_total <<
3323  "date " << "nvariants " << "status " << "counts\n";
3324 
3325  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < hist_total_date.size(); ++i)
3326  file_total <<
3327  hist_total_date[i] << " " <<
3328  hist_total_nvariants_active[i] << " \"" <<
3329  model->status_labels[hist_total_status[i]] << "\" " <<
3330  hist_total_counts[i] << "\n";
3331  }
3332 
3333  if (fn_transmission != "")
3334  {
3335  std::ofstream file_transmission(fn_transmission, std::ios_base::out);
3336  file_transmission <<
3337  "date " << "variant " << "source_exposure_date " << "source " << "target\n";
3338 
3339  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < transmission_target.size(); ++i)
3340  file_transmission <<
3341  transmission_date[i] << " " <<
3342  transmission_variant[i] << " " <<
3343  transmission_source_exposure_date[i] << " " <<
3344  transmission_source[i] << " " <<
3345  transmission_target[i] << "\n";
3346 
3347  }
3348 
3349  if (fn_transition != "")
3350  {
3351  std::ofstream file_transition(fn_transition, std::ios_base::out);
3352  file_transition <<
3353  "date " << "from " << "to " << "counts\n";
3354 
3355  int ns = model->nstatus;
3356 
3357  for (int i = 0; i <= model->today(); ++i)
3358  {
3359 
3360  for (int from = 0u; from < ns; ++from)
3361  for (int to = 0u; to < ns; ++to)
3362  file_transition <<
3363  i << " " <<
3364  model->status_labels[from] << " " <<
3365  model->status_labels[to] << " " <<
3366  hist_transition_matrix[i * (ns * ns) + to * ns + from] << "\n";
3367 
3368  }
3369 
3370  }
3371 
3372  if (fn_reproductive_number != "")
3373  reproductive_number(fn_reproductive_number);
3374 
3375 }
3376 
3377 template<typename TSeq>
3378 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::record_transmission(
3379  int i,
3380  int j,
3381  int variant,
3382  int i_expo_date
3383 ) {
3384 
3385  transmission_date.push_back(model->today());
3386  transmission_source.push_back(i);
3387  transmission_target.push_back(j);
3388  transmission_variant.push_back(variant);
3389  transmission_source_exposure_date.push_back(i_expo_date);
3390 
3391 }
3392 
3393 template<typename TSeq>
3394 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_variants() const
3395 {
3396  return variant_id.size();
3397 }
3398 
3399 template<typename TSeq>
3400 inline size_t DataBase<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const
3401 {
3402  return tool_id.size();
3403 }
3404 
3405 template<typename TSeq>
3406 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::reset()
3407 {
3408 
3409  variant_id.clear();
3410  variant_name.clear();
3411  variant_sequence.clear();
3412  variant_origin_date.clear();
3413  variant_parent_id.clear();
3414 
3415  hist_variant_date.clear();
3416  hist_variant_id.clear();
3417  hist_variant_status.clear();
3418  hist_variant_counts.clear();
3419 
3420  tool_id.clear();
3421  tool_name.clear();
3422  tool_sequence.clear();
3423  tool_origin_date.clear();
3424 
3425  hist_tool_date.clear();
3426  hist_tool_id.clear();
3427  hist_tool_status.clear();
3428  hist_tool_counts.clear();
3429 
3430  hist_total_date.clear();
3431  hist_total_nvariants_active.clear();
3432  hist_total_status.clear();
3433  hist_total_counts.clear();
3434 
3435  transmission_date.clear();
3436  transmission_source.clear();
3437  transmission_target.clear();
3438  transmission_variant.clear();
3439  transmission_source_exposure_date.clear();
3440 
3441  transition_matrix.clear();
3442  hist_transition_matrix.clear();
3443 
3444  today_total_nvariants_active = 0;
3445 
3446  today_total.clear();
3447 
3448  today_variant.clear();
3449 
3450  today_tool.clear();
3451 
3452 }
3453 
3454 template<typename TSeq>
3455 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::set_user_data(
3456  std::vector< std::string > names
3457 )
3458 {
3459  user_data = UserData<TSeq>(names);
3460  user_data.model = model;
3461 }

3465  std::vector< epiworld_double > x
3466 )

3474 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::add_user_data(
3475  epiworld_fast_uint k,
3476  epiworld_double x
3477 )
3478 {
3479

3481

3485 inline UserData<TSeq> & DataBase<TSeq>::get_user_data()
3486 {
