3488 }
3489 
3490 template<typename TSeq>
3491 inline MapVec_type<int,int> DataBase<TSeq>::reproductive_number()
3492 const {
3493 
3494  // Checking size
3495  MapVec_type<int,int> map;
3496 
3497  // Number of digits of maxid
3498  for (size_t i = 0u; i < transmission_date.size(); ++i)
3499  {
3500  // Fabricating id
3501  std::vector< int > h = {
3502  transmission_variant[i],
3503  transmission_source[i],
3504  transmission_source_exposure_date[i]
3505  };
3506 
3507  // Adding to counter
3508  if (map.find(h) == map.end())
3509  map[h] = 1;
3510  else
3511  map[h]++;
3512 
3513  // The target is added
3514  std::vector< int > h_target = {
3515  transmission_variant[i],
3516  transmission_target[i],
3517  transmission_date[i]
3518  };
3519 
3520  map[h_target] = 0;
3521 
3522  }
3523 
3524  return map;
3525 
3526 }
3527 
3528 template<typename TSeq>
3529 inline void DataBase<TSeq>::reproductive_number(
3530  std::string fn
3531 ) const {
3532 
3533 
3534  auto map = reproductive_number();
3535 
3536  std::ofstream fn_file(fn, std::ios_base::out);
3537 
3538  fn_file << "variant source source_exposure_date rt\n";
3539 
3540  for (auto & m : map)
3541  fn_file <<
3542  m.first[0u] << " " <<
3543  m.first[1u] << " " <<
3544  m.first[2u] << " " <<
3545  m.second << "\n";
3546 
3547  return;
3548 
3549 }
3550 
3551 template<typename TSeq>
3552 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > DataBase<TSeq>::transition_probability(
3553  bool print
3554 ) const {
3555 
3556  auto status_labels = model->get_status();
3557  size_t n_status = status_labels.size();
3558  size_t n_days = model->get_ndays();
3559  std::vector< epiworld_double > res(n_status * n_status, 0.0);
3560  std::vector< epiworld_double > days_to_include(n_status, 0.0);
3561 
3562  for (size_t t = 1; t < n_days; ++t)
3563  {
3564 
3565  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_status; ++s_i)
3566  {
3567  epiworld_double daily_total = hist_total_counts[(t - 1) * n_status + s_i];
3568 
3569  if (daily_total == 0)
3570  continue;
3571 
3572  days_to_include[s_i] += 1.0;
3573 
3574  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_status; ++s_j)
3575  {
3576  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
3577  epiworld_double entry = hist_transition_matrix[
3578  s_i + s_j * n_status +
3579  t * (n_status * n_status)
3580  ];
3581 
3582  if (entry > daily_total)
3583  throw std::logic_error(
3584  "The entry in hist_transition_matrix cannot have more elememnts than the total"
3585  );
3586 
3587  res[s_i + s_j * n_status] += (entry / daily_total);
3588  #else
3589  res[s_i + s_j * n_status] += (
3590  hist_transition_matrix[
3591  s_i + s_j * n_status +
3592  t * (n_status * n_status)
3593  ] / daily_total
3594  );
3595  #endif
3596  }
3597 
3598  }
3599 
3600  }
3601 
3602  for (size_t s_i = 0; s_i < n_status; ++s_i)
3603  {
3604  for (size_t s_j = 0; s_j < n_status; ++s_j)
3605  res[s_i + s_j * n_status] /= days_to_include[s_i];
3606  }
3607 
3608  if (print)
3609  {
3610 
3611  size_t nchar = 0u;
3612  for (auto & l : status_labels)
3613  if (l.length() > nchar)
3614  nchar = l.length();
3615 
3616  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar) + "s";
3617 
3618  printf_epiworld("\nTransition Probabilities:\n");
3619  for (size_t s_i = 0u; s_i < n_status; ++s_i)
3620  {
3621  printf_epiworld(fmt.c_str(), status_labels[s_i].c_str());
3622  for (size_t s_j = 0u; s_j < n_status; ++s_j)
3623  {
3624  if (std::isnan(res[s_i + s_j * n_status]))
3625  {
3626  printf_epiworld(" -");
3627  } else {
3628  printf_epiworld(" % 4.2f", res[s_i + s_j * n_status]);
3629  }
3630  }
3631  printf_epiworld("\n");
3632  }
3633 
3634  printf_epiworld("\n");
3635 
3636  }
3637 
3638  return res;
3639 
3640 
3641 }
3642 
3643 #endif
3644 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3646 
3647  End of -include/epiworld/database-meat.hpp-
3648 
3651 
3652 
3653 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3655 
3656  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
3657 
3660 
3661 
3662 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
3663 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_BONES_HPP
3664 
3665 class AdjList {
3666 private:
3667 
3668  std::vector<std::map<epiworld_fast_uint, epiworld_fast_uint>> dat;
3669  bool directed;
3670  epiworld_fast_uint N = 0;
3671  epiworld_fast_uint E = 0;
3672 
3673 public:
3674 
3675  AdjList() {};
3676 
3688  AdjList(
3689  const std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > & source,
3690  const std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > & target,
3691  int size,
3692  bool directed
3693  );
3694 
3695  AdjList(AdjList && a); // Move constructor
3696  AdjList(const AdjList & a); // Copy constructor
3697  AdjList& operator=(const AdjList& a);
3698 
3699 
3710  void read_edgelist(
3711  std::string fn,
3712  int size,
3713  int skip = 0,
3714  bool directed = true
3715  );
3716 
3717  std::map<epiworld_fast_uint, epiworld_fast_uint> operator()(
3718  epiworld_fast_uint i
3719  ) const;
3720 
3721  void print(epiworld_fast_uint limit = 20u) const;
3722  size_t vcount() const; ///< Number of vertices/nodes in the network.
3723  size_t ecount() const; ///< Number of edges/arcs/ties in the network.
3724 
3725  std::vector<std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint>> & get_dat() {
3726  return dat;
3727  };
3728 
3729  bool is_directed() const; ///< `true` if the network is directed.
3730 
3731 };
3732 
3733 
3734 #endif
3735 
3736 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3738 
3739  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-bones.hpp-
3740 
3743 
3744 
3745 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3747 
3748  Start of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
3749 
3752 
3753 
3754 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
3755 #define EPIWORLD_ADJLIST_MEAT_HPP
3756 
3757 inline AdjList::AdjList(
3758  const std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > & source,
3759  const std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > & target,
3760  int size,
3761  bool directed
3762 ) : directed(directed) {
3763 
3764 
3765  dat.resize(size, std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint>({}));
3766  int max_id = size - 1;
3767 
3768  int i,j;
3769  for (epiworld_fast_uint m = 0; m < source.size(); ++m)
3770  {
3771 
3772  i = source[m];
3773  j = target[m];
3774 
3775  if (i > max_id)
3776  throw std::range_error(
3777  "The source["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
3778  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
3779  );
3780 
3781  if (j > max_id)
3782  throw std::range_error(
3783  "The target["+std::to_string(m)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
3784  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
3785  );
3786 
3787  // Adding nodes
3788  if (dat[i].find(j) == dat[i].end())
3789  dat[i].insert(std::pair<epiworld_fast_uint, epiworld_fast_uint>(j, 1u));
3790  else
3791  dat[i][j]++;
3792 
3793  if (!directed)
3794  {
3795 
3796  if (dat[j].find(i) == dat[j].end())
3797  dat[j].insert(std::pair<epiworld_fast_uint, epiworld_fast_uint>(i, 1u));
3798  else
3799  dat[j][i]++;
3800 
3801  }
3802 
3803  E++;
3804 
3805  }
3806 
3807  N = size;
3808 
3809  return;
3810 
3811 }
3812 
3813 
3814 inline AdjList::AdjList(AdjList && a) :
3815  dat(std::move(a.dat)),
3816  directed(a.directed),
3817  N(a.N),
3818  E(a.E)
3819 {
3820 
3821 }
3822 
3823 inline AdjList::AdjList(const AdjList & a) :
3824  dat(a.dat),
3825  directed(a.directed),
3826  N(a.N),
3827  E(a.E)
3828 {
3829 
3830 }
3831 
3832 inline AdjList& AdjList::operator=(const AdjList& a)
3833 {
3834  if (this == &a)
3835  return *this;
3836 
3837  this->dat = a.dat;
3838  this->directed = a.directed;
3839  this->N = a.N;
3840  this->E = a.E;
3841 
3842  return *this;
3843 }
3844 
3845 inline void AdjList::read_edgelist(
3846  std::string fn,
3847  int size,
3848  int skip,
3849  bool directed
3850 ) {
3851 
3852  int i,j;
3853  std::ifstream filei(fn);
3854 
3855  if (!filei)
3856  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
3857 
3858  int linenum = 0;
3859  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > source_;
3860  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > target_;
3861 
3862  source_.reserve(1e5);
3863  target_.reserve(1e5);
3864 
3865  int max_id = size - 1;
3866 
3867  while (!filei.eof())
3868  {
3869 
3870  if (linenum++ < skip)
3871  continue;
3872 
3873  filei >> i >> j;
3874 
3875  // Looking for exceptions
3876  if (filei.bad())
3877  throw std::logic_error(
3878  "I/O error while reading the file " +
3879  fn
3880  );
3881 
3882  if (filei.fail())
3883  break;
3884 
3885  if (i > max_id)
3886  throw std::range_error(
3887  "The source["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(i) +
3888  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
3889  );
3890 
3891  if (j > max_id)
3892  throw std::range_error(
3893  "The target["+std::to_string(linenum)+"] = " + std::to_string(j) +
3894  " is above the max_id " + std::to_string(max_id)
3895  );
3896 
3897  source_.push_back(i);
3898  target_.push_back(j);
3899 
3900  }
3901 
3902  // Now using the right constructor
3903  *this = AdjList(source_, target_, size, directed);
3904 
3905  return;
3906 
3907 }
3908 
3909 inline std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint> AdjList::operator()(
3910  epiworld_fast_uint i
3911  ) const {
3912 
3913  if (i >= N)
3914  throw std::range_error(
3915  "The vertex id " + std::to_string(i) + " is not in the network."
3916  );
3917 
3918  return dat[i];
3919 
3920 }
3921 
3922 inline void AdjList::print(epiworld_fast_uint limit) const {
3923 
3924 
3925  epiworld_fast_uint counter = 0;
3926  printf_epiworld("Nodeset:\n");
3927  int i = -1;
3928  for (auto & n : dat)
3929  {
3930 
3931  if (counter++ > limit)
3932  break;
3933 
3934  printf_epiworld(" % 3i: {", ++i);
3935  int niter = 0;
3936  for (auto n_n : n)
3937  if (++niter < static_cast<int>(n.size()))
3938  {
3939  printf_epiworld("%i, ", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
3940  }
3941  else {
3942  printf_epiworld("%i}\n", static_cast<int>(n_n.first));
3943  }
3944  }
3945 
3946  if (limit < dat.size())
3947  {
3948  printf_epiworld(
3949  " (... skipping %i records ...)\n",
3950  static_cast<int>(dat.size() - limit)
3951  );
3952  }
3953 
3954 }
3955 
3956 inline size_t AdjList::vcount() const
3957 {
3958  return N;
3959 }
3960 
3961 inline size_t AdjList::ecount() const
3962 {
3963  return E;
3964 }
3965 
3966 inline bool AdjList::is_directed() const {
3967 
3968  if (dat.size() == 0u)
3969  throw std::logic_error("The edgelist is empty.");
3970 
3971  return directed;
3972 
3973 }
3974 
3975 #endif
3976 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3978 
3979  End of -include/epiworld/adjlist-meat.hpp-
3980 
3983 
3984 
3985 
3986 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3988 
3989  Start of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
3990 
3993 
3994 
3995 #ifndef EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
3996 #define EPIWORLD_RANDGRA
3997 
3998 template<typename TSeq>
3999 class Model;
4000 
4001 template<typename TSeq>
4002 class Agent;
4003 
4004 class AdjList;
4005 
4006 
4007 template<typename TSeq, typename TDat>
4008 inline void rewire_degseq(
4009  TDat * agents,
4010  Model<TSeq> * model,
4011  epiworld_double proportion
4012  );
4013 
4014 template<typename TSeq = int>
4015 inline void rewire_degseq(
4016  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > * agents,
4017  Model<TSeq> * model,
4018  epiworld_double proportion
4019  )
4020 {
4021 
4022  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
4023  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
4024  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
4025  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
4026  // std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > * agents = model->get_agents();
4027  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < agents->size(); ++i)
4028  {
4029  if (agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size() > 0u)
4030  {
4031  non_isolates.push_back(i);
4032  epiworld_double wtemp = static_cast<epiworld_double>(agents->operator[](i).get_neighbors().size());
4033  weights.push_back(wtemp);
4034  nedges += wtemp;
4035  }
4036  }
4037 
4038  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
4039  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
4040 
4041  // Cumulative probs
4042  weights[0u] /= nedges;
4043  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
4044  {
4045  weights[i] /= nedges;
4046  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
4047  }
4048 
4049  // Only swap if needed
4050  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
4051  epiworld_double prob;
4052  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges);
4053  while (nrewires-- > 0)
4054  {
4055 
4056  // Picking egos
4057  prob = model->runif();
4058  int id0 = N - 1;
4059  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
4060  if (prob <= weights[i])
4061  {
4062  id0 = i;
4063  break;
4064  }
4065 
4066  prob = model->runif();
4067  int id1 = N - 1;
4068  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
4069  if (prob <= weights[i])
4070  {
4071  id1 = i;
4072  break;
4073  }
4074 
4075  // Correcting for under or overflow.
4076  if (id1 == id0)
4077  id1++;
4078 
4079  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
4080  id1 = 0;
4081 
4082  Agent<TSeq> & p0 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id0]);
4083  Agent<TSeq> & p1 = agents->operator[](non_isolates[id1]);
4084 
4085  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
4086  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
4087  int id01 = std::floor(p0.get_neighbors().size() * model->runif());
4088  int id11 = std::floor(p1.get_neighbors().size() * model->runif());
4089 
4090  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
4091  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
4092 
4093  // Finding what neighbour is id0
4094  if (!model->is_directed())
4095  {
4096  // Picking 0's alter
4097  epiworld_fast_uint n0,n1;
4098  Agent<TSeq> & p01 = agents->operator[](p0.get_neighbors()[id01]->get_id());
4099  for (n0 = 0; n0 < p01.get_neighbors().size(); ++n0)
4100  {
4101 
4102  // And getting the id of ego 0
4103  if (p0.get_id() == p01.get_neighbors()[n0]->get_id())
4104  break;
4105  }
4106 
4107  // Picking 1's alter
4108  Agent<TSeq> & p11 = agents->operator[](p1.get_neighbors()[id11]->get_id());
4109  for (n1 = 0; n1 < p11.get_neighbors().size(); ++n1)
4110  {
4111 
4112  // And getting the id of ego 1
4113  if (p1.get_id() == p11.get_neighbors()[n1]->get_id())
4114  break;
4115  }
4116 
4117  // Swapping alter's endpoints
4118  std::swap(p01.get_neighbors()[n0], p11.get_neighbors()[n1]);
4119 
4120  }
4121 
4122  // Moving alter first
4123  std::swap(p0.get_neighbors()[id01], p1.get_neighbors()[id11]);
4124 
4125 
4126  }
4127 
4128  return;
4129 
4130 }
4131 
4132 template<typename TSeq>
4133 inline void rewire_degseq(
4134  AdjList * agents,
4135  Model<TSeq> * model,
4136  epiworld_double proportion
4137  )
4138 {
4139 
4140  // Identifying individuals with degree > 0
4141  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > nties(agents->vcount(), 0);
4142 
4143  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > non_isolates;
4144  non_isolates.reserve(nties.size());
4145 
4146  std::vector< epiworld_double > weights;
4147  weights.reserve(nties.size());
4148 
4149  epiworld_double nedges = 0.0;
4150  // std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > * agents = model->get_agents();
4151  auto & dat = agents->get_dat();
4152 
4153  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
4154  nties[i] += dat[i].size();
4155 
4156  bool directed = agents->is_directed();
4157  for (size_t i = 0u; i < dat.size(); ++i)
4158  {
4159  if (nties[i] > 0)
4160  {
4161  non_isolates.push_back(i);
4162  if (directed)
4163  {
4164  weights.push_back(
4165  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])
4166  );
4167  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]);
4168  }
4169  else {
4170  weights.push_back(
4171  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i])/2.0
4172  );
4173  nedges += static_cast<epiworld_double>(nties[i]) / 2.0;
4174  }
4175  }
4176  }
4177 
4178  if (non_isolates.size() == 0u)
4179  throw std::logic_error("The graph is completely disconnected.");
4180 
4181  // Cumulative probs
4182  weights[0u] /= nedges;
4183  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 1u; i < non_isolates.size(); ++i)
4184  {
4185  weights[i] /= nedges;
4186  weights[i] += weights[i - 1u];
4187  }
4188 
4189  // Only swap if needed
4190  epiworld_fast_uint N = non_isolates.size();
4191  epiworld_double prob;
4192  int nrewires = floor(proportion * nedges / (
4193  agents->is_directed() ? 1.0 : 2.0
4194  ));
4195 
4196  while (nrewires-- > 0)
4197  {
4198 
4199  // Picking egos
4200  prob = model->runif();
4201  int id0 = N - 1;
4202  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
4203  if (prob <= weights[i])
4204  {
4205  id0 = i;
4206  break;
4207  }
4208 
4209  prob = model->runif();
4210  int id1 = N - 1;
4211  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < N; ++i)
4212  if (prob <= weights[i])
4213  {
4214  id1 = i;
4215  break;
4216  }
4217 
4218  // Correcting for under or overflow.
4219  if (id1 == id0)
4220  id1++;
4221 
4222  if (id1 >= static_cast<int>(N))
4223  id1 = 0;
4224 
4225  std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint> & p0 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id0]];
4226  std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint> & p1 = agents->get_dat()[non_isolates[id1]];
4227 
4228  // Picking alters (relative location in their lists)
4229  // In this case, these are uniformly distributed within the list
4230  int id01 = std::floor(p0.size() * model->runif());
4231  int id11 = std::floor(p1.size() * model->runif());
4232 
4233  // Since it is a map, we need to find the actual ids (positions)
4234  // are not good enough.
4235  int count = 0;
4236  for (auto & n : p0)
4237  if (count++ == id01)
4238  id01 = n.first;
4239 
4240  count = 0;
4241  for (auto & n : p1)
4242  if (count++ == id11)
4243  id11 = n.first;
4244 
4245  // When rewiring, we need to flip the individuals from the other
4246  // end as well, since we are dealing withi an undirected graph
4247 
4248  // Finding what neighbour is id0
4249  if (!agents->is_directed())
4250  {
4251 
4252  std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint> & p01 = agents->get_dat()[id01];
4253  std::map<epiworld_fast_uint,epiworld_fast_uint> & p11 = agents->get_dat()[id11];
4254 
4255  std::swap(p01[id0], p11[id1]);
4256 
4257  }
4258 
4259  // Moving alter first
4260  std::swap(p0[id01], p1[id11]);
4261 
4262  }
4263 
4264  return;
4265 
4266 }
4267 
4268 template<typename TSeq>
4269 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli(
4270  epiworld_fast_uint n,
4271  epiworld_double p,
4272  bool directed,
4273  Model<TSeq> & model
4274 ) {
4275 
4276  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > source;
4277  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > target;
4278 
4279  // Checking the density (how many)
4280  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
4281  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
4282  p
4283  );
4284 
4285  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(*model.get_rand_endgine());
4286 
4287  source.resize(m);
4288  target.resize(m);
4289 
4290  epiworld_fast_uint a,b;
4291  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
4292  {
4293  a = floor(model.runif() * n);
4294 
4295  if (!directed)
4296  b = floor(model.runif() * a);
4297  else
4298  {
4299  b = floor(model.runif() * n);
4300  if (b == a)
4301  b++;
4302 
4303  if (b >= n)
4304  b = 0u;
4305  }
4306 
4307  source[i] = a;
4308  target[i] = b;
4309 
4310  }
4311 
4312  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
4313 
4314  return al;
4315 
4316 }
4317 
4318 template<typename TSeq>
4319 inline AdjList rgraph_bernoulli2(
4320  epiworld_fast_uint n,
4321  epiworld_double p,
4322  bool directed,
4323  Model<TSeq> & model
4324 ) {
4325 
4326  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > source;
4327  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > target;
4328 
4329  // Checking the density (how many)
4330  std::binomial_distribution<> d(
4331  n * (n - 1.0) / (directed ? 1.0 : 2.0),
4332  p
4333  );
4334 
4335  // Need to compensate for the possible number of diagonal
4336  // elements sampled. If n * n, then each diag element has
4337  // 1/(n^2) chance of sampling
4338 
4339  epiworld_fast_uint m = d(*model.get_rand_endgine());
4340 
4341  source.resize(m);
4342  target.resize(m);
4343 
4344  double n2 = static_cast<double>(n * n);
4345 
4346  int loc,row,col;
4347  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < m; ++i)
4348  {
4349  loc = floor(model.runif() * n2);
4350  col = floor(static_cast<double>(loc)/static_cast<double>(n));
4351  row = loc - row * n;
4352 
4353  // Undirected needs to swap
4354  if (!directed && (col > row))
4355  std::swap(col, row);
4356 
4357  source[i] = row;
4358  target[i] = col;
4359 
4360  }
4361 
4362  AdjList al(source, target, static_cast<int>(n), directed);
4363 
4364  return al;
4365 
4366 }
4367 
4368 inline AdjList rgraph_ring_lattice(
4369  epiworld_fast_uint n,
4370  epiworld_fast_uint k,
4371  bool directed = false
4372 ) {
4373 
4374  if ((n - 1u) < k)
4375  throw std::logic_error("k can be at most n - 1.");
4376 
4377  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > source;
4378  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > target;
4379 
4380  if (!directed)
4381  if (k > 1u) k = static_cast< epiworld_fast_uint >(floor(k / 2.0));
4382 
4383  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0; i < n; ++i)
4384  {
4385 
4386  for (epiworld_fast_uint j = 1u; j <= k; ++j)
4387  {
4388 
4389  // Next neighbor
4390  epiworld_fast_uint l = i + j;
4391  if (l >= n) l = l - n;
4392 
4393  source.push_back(i);
4394  target.push_back(l);
4395 
4396  }
4397 
4398  }
4399 
4400  return AdjList(source, target, n, directed);
4401 
4402 }
4403 
4415 template<typename TSeq>
4416 inline AdjList rgraph_smallworld(
4417  epiworld_fast_uint n,
4418  epiworld_fast_uint k,
4419  epiworld_double p,
4420  bool directed,
4421  Model<TSeq> & model
4422 ) {
4423 
4424  // Creating the ring lattice
4425  AdjList ring = rgraph_ring_lattice(n,k,directed);
4426 
4427  // Rewiring and returning
4428  if (k > 0u)
4429  rewire_degseq(&ring, &model, p);
4430 
4431  return ring;
4432 
4433 }
4434 
4448 template<typename TSeq>
4449 inline AdjList rgraph_blocked(
4450  epiworld_fast_uint n,
4451  epiworld_fast_uint blocksize,
4452  epiworld_fast_uint ncons,
4453  Model<TSeq> & model
4454 ) {
4455 
4456  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > source_;
4457  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > target_;
4458 
4459  size_t i = 0u;
4460  size_t cum_node_count = 0u;
4461  while (i < n)
4462  {
4463 
4464  for (size_t j = 0; j < blocksize; ++j)
4465  {
4466 
4467  for (size_t k = 0; k < j; ++k)
4468  {
4469  // No loops
4470  if (k == j)
4471  continue;
4472 
4473  // Exists the loop in case there are no more
4474  // nodes available
4475  if ((i + k) >= n)
4476  break;
4477 
4478  source_.push_back(j + i);
4479  target_.push_back(k + i);
4480  }
4481 
4482  // No more nodes left to build connections
4483  if (++cum_node_count >= n)
4484  break;
4485 
4486  }
4487 
4488  // Connections between this and the previou sone
4489  if (i != 0)
4490  {
4491 
4492  size_t max_cons = std::min(ncons, n - cum_node_count);
4493 
4494  // Generating the connections
4495  for (size_t j = 0u; j < max_cons; ++j)
4496  {
4497 
4498  source_.push_back(i + j - blocksize);
4499  target_.push_back(i + j);
4500 
4501  }
4502  }
4503 
4504  i += blocksize;
4505 
4506  }
4507 
4508  return AdjList(source_, target_, n, false);
4509 
4510 }
4511 
4512 #endif
4513 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
4515 
4516  End of -include/epiworld/randgraph.hpp-
4517

4525 
4526  Start of -include/epiworld/queue-bones.hpp-
4527

4531 
4532 #ifndef EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
4533 #define EPIWORLD_QUEUE_BONES_HPP
4534 
4545 template<typename TSeq>
4546 class Queue
4547 {
4548 
4549 private:
4550 
4554  std::vector< epiworld_fast_int > active;
4555  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr;
4556 
4557  // Auxiliary variable that checks how many steps
4558  // left are there
4559  // int n_steps_left;
4560  // bool queuing_started = false;
4561 
4562 public:
4563 
4564  void operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
4565  void operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p);
4566  epiworld_fast_int & operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i);
4567 
4568  // void initialize(Model<TSeq> * m, Agent<TSeq> * p);
4569  void set_model(Model<TSeq> * m);
4570 
4571 };
4572 
4573 template<typename TSeq>
4574 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator+=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
4575 {
4576 
4577  active[p->id]++;
4578  for (auto * n : p->neighbors)
4579  active[n->id]++;
4580 
4581 }
4582 
4583 template<typename TSeq>
4584 inline void Queue<TSeq>::operator-=(Agent<TSeq> * p)
4585 {
4586 
4587  active[p->id]--;
4588  for (auto * n : p->neighbors)
4589  active[n->id]--;
4590 
4591 }
4592 
4593 template<typename TSeq>
4594 inline epiworld_fast_int & Queue<TSeq>::operator[](epiworld_fast_uint i)
4595 {
4596  return active[i];
4597 }
4598 
4599 template<typename TSeq>
4600 inline void Queue<TSeq>::set_model(Model<TSeq> * m)
4601 {
4602 
4603  model = m;
4604  active.resize(m->size(), 0);
4605 
4606 }
4607 
4608 #endif

4611

4679 template<typename TSeq>
4680 inline std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> make_save_run(
4681  std::string fmt = "%03lu-episimulation.csv",
4682  bool total_hist = true,
4683  bool variant_info = false,
4684  bool variant_hist = false,
4685  bool tool_info = false,
4686  bool tool_hist = false,
4687  bool transmission = false,
4688  bool transition = false,
4689  bool reproductive = false
4690  );

4692 // template<typename TSeq>
4693 // class VirusPtr;
4694 
4695 // template<typename TSeq>
4696 // class ToolPtr;
4697 
4707 template<typename TSeq>
4708 class Model {
4709  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
4710  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
4711  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
4712  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
4713 private:
4714 
4715  std::string name = ""; ///< Name of the model
4716 
4717  DataBase<TSeq> db = DataBase<TSeq>(*this);
4718 
4719  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > population;
4720 
4730  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_population;
4731  size_t sampled_population_n = 0u;
4732  std::vector< size_t > population_left;
4733  size_t population_left_n = 0u;
4735 
4745  double * population_data = nullptr;
4746  size_t population_data_n_features = 0u;
4748 
4749  bool directed = false;
4750 
4751  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > viruses;
4752  std::vector< epiworld_double > prevalence_virus; ///< Initial prevalence_virus of each virus
4753  std::vector< bool > prevalence_virus_as_proportion;
4754  std::vector< VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> > viruses_dist_funs;
4755 
4756  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
4757  std::vector< epiworld_double > prevalence_tool;
4758  std::vector< bool > prevalence_tool_as_proportion;
4759  std::vector< ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> > tools_dist_funs;
4760 
4761  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> > entities;
4762  std::vector< epiworld_double > prevalence_entity;
4763  std::vector< bool > prevalence_entity_as_proportion;
4764  std::vector< EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> > entities_dist_funs;
4765 
4766  std::shared_ptr< std::mt19937 > engine =
4767  std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >();
4768 
4769  std::shared_ptr< std::uniform_real_distribution<> > runifd =
4770  std::make_shared< std::uniform_real_distribution<> >(0.0, 1.0);
4771 
4772  std::shared_ptr< std::normal_distribution<> > rnormd =
4773  std::make_shared< std::normal_distribution<> >(0.0);
4774 
4775  std::shared_ptr< std::gamma_distribution<> > rgammad =
4776  std::make_shared< std::gamma_distribution<> >();
4777 
4778  std::shared_ptr< std::lognormal_distribution<> > rlognormald =
4779  std::make_shared< std::lognormal_distribution<> >();
4780 
4781  std::shared_ptr< std::exponential_distribution<> > rexpd =
4782  std::make_shared< std::exponential_distribution<> >();
4783

4785  epiworld_double rewire_prop;

4851  );
