5275 
5276  Start of -include/epiworld/model-meat.hpp-
5277 
5280 
5281 
5282 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_HPP
5283 #define EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_HPP
5284 
5285 #define CHECK_INIT() if (!initialized) \
5286  throw std::logic_error("Model not initialized.");
5287 
5306 template<typename TSeq>
5307 inline std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> make_save_run(
5308  std::string fmt,
5309  bool total_hist,
5310  bool variant_info,
5311  bool variant_hist,
5312  bool tool_info,
5313  bool tool_hist,
5314  bool transmission,
5315  bool transition,
5316  bool reproductive
5317  )
5318 {
5319 
5320  // Counting number of %
5321  int n_fmt = 0;
5322  for (auto & f : fmt)
5323  if (f == '%')
5324  n_fmt++;
5325 
5326  if (n_fmt != 1)
5327  throw std::logic_error("The -fmt- argument must have only one \"%\" symbol.");
5328 
5329  // Listting things to save
5330  std::vector< bool > what_to_save = {
5331  variant_info,
5332  variant_hist,
5333  tool_info,
5334  tool_hist,
5335  total_hist,
5336  transmission,
5337  transition,
5338  reproductive
5339  };
5340 
5341  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> saver = [fmt,what_to_save](
5342  size_t niter, Model<TSeq> * m
5343  ) -> void {
5344 
5345  std::string variant_info = "";
5346  std::string variant_hist = "";
5347  std::string tool_info = "";
5348  std::string tool_hist = "";
5349  std::string total_hist = "";
5350  std::string transmission = "";
5351  std::string transition = "";
5352  std::string reproductive = "";
5353 
5354  char buff[128];
5355  if (what_to_save[0u])
5356  {
5357  variant_info = fmt + std::string("_variant_info.csv");
5358  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), variant_info.c_str(), niter);
5359  variant_info = buff;
5360  }
5361  if (what_to_save[1u])
5362  {
5363  variant_hist = fmt + std::string("_variant_hist.csv");
5364  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), variant_hist.c_str(), niter);
5365  variant_hist = buff;
5366  }
5367  if (what_to_save[2u])
5368  {
5369  tool_info = fmt + std::string("_tool_info.csv");
5370  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_info.c_str(), niter);
5371  tool_info = buff;
5372  }
5373  if (what_to_save[3u])
5374  {
5375  tool_hist = fmt + std::string("_tool_hist.csv");
5376  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), tool_hist.c_str(), niter);
5377  tool_hist = buff;
5378  }
5379  if (what_to_save[4u])
5380  {
5381  total_hist = fmt + std::string("_total_hist.csv");
5382  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), total_hist.c_str(), niter);
5383  total_hist = buff;
5384  }
5385  if (what_to_save[5u])
5386  {
5387  transmission = fmt + std::string("_transmission.csv");
5388  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transmission.c_str(), niter);
5389  transmission = buff;
5390  }
5391  if (what_to_save[6u])
5392  {
5393  transition = fmt + std::string("_transition.csv");
5394  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), transition.c_str(), niter);
5395  transition = buff;
5396  }
5397  if (what_to_save[7u])
5398  {
5399 
5400  reproductive = fmt + std::string("_reproductive.csv");
5401  snprintf(buff, sizeof(buff), reproductive.c_str(), niter);
5402  reproductive = buff;
5403 
5404  }
5405 
5406  m->write_data(
5407  variant_info,
5408  variant_hist,
5409  tool_info,
5410  tool_hist,
5411  total_hist,
5412  transmission,
5413  transition,
5414  reproductive
5415  );
5416 
5417  };
5418 
5419  return saver;
5420 }
5421 
5422 template<typename TSeq>
5423 inline void Model<TSeq>::actions_add(
5424  Agent<TSeq> * agent_,
5425  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_,
5426  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_,
5427  Entity<TSeq> * entity_,
5428  epiworld_fast_uint new_status_,
5429  epiworld_fast_int queue_,
5430  ActionFun<TSeq> call_,
5431  int idx_agent_,
5432  int idx_object_
5433 ) {
5434 
5435  ++nactions;
5436 
5437  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5438  if (nactions == 0)
5439  throw std::logic_error("Actions cannot be zero!!");
5440  #endif
5441 
5442  if (nactions > actions.size())
5443  {
5444 
5445  actions.push_back(
5446  Action<TSeq>(
5447  agent_, virus_, tool_, entity_, new_status_, queue_, call_,
5448  idx_agent_, idx_object_
5449  ));
5450 
5451  }
5452  else
5453  {
5454 
5455  Action<TSeq> & A = actions.at(nactions - 1u);
5456  A.agent = agent_;
5457  A.virus = virus_;
5458  A.tool = tool_;
5459  A.entity = entity_;
5460  A.new_status = new_status_;
5461  A.queue = queue_;
5462  A.call = call_;
5463  A.idx_agent = idx_agent_;
5464  A.idx_object = idx_object_;
5465 
5466  }
5467 
5468  return;
5469 
5470 }
5471 
5472 template<typename TSeq>
5473 inline void Model<TSeq>::actions_run()
5474 {
5475  // Making the call
5476  while (nactions != 0u)
5477  {
5478 
5479  Action<TSeq> a = actions[--nactions];
5480  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
5481 
5482  // Applying function
5483  if (a.call)
5484  {
5485  a.call(a, this);
5486  }
5487 
5488  // Updating status
5489  if (static_cast<epiworld_fast_int>(p->status) != a.new_status)
5490  {
5491 
5492  if (a.new_status >= static_cast<epiworld_fast_int>(nstatus))
5493  throw std::range_error(
5494  "The proposed status " + std::to_string(a.new_status) + " is out of range. " +
5495  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstatus - 1) + " statuses.");
5496 
5497  // Figuring out if we need to undo a change
5498  // If the agent has made a change in the status recently, then we
5499  // need to undo the accounting, e.g., if A->B was made, we need to
5500  // undo it and set B->A so that the daily accounting is right.
5501  if (p->status_last_changed == today())
5502  {
5503 
5504  // Updating accounting
5505  db.update_state(p->status_prev, p->status, true); // Undoing
5506  db.update_state(p->status_prev, a.new_status);
5507 
5508  for (size_t v = 0u; v < p->n_viruses; ++v)
5509  {
5510  db.update_virus(p->viruses[v]->id, p->status, p->status_prev); // Undoing
5511  db.update_virus(p->viruses[v]->id, p->status_prev, a.new_status);
5512  }
5513 
5514  for (size_t t = 0u; t < p->n_tools; ++t)
5515  {
5516  db.update_tool(p->tools[t]->id, p->status, p->status_prev); // Undoing
5517  db.update_tool(p->tools[t]->id, p->status_prev, a.new_status);
5518  }
5519 
5520  // Changing to the new status, we won't update the
5521  // previous status in case we need to undo the change
5522  p->status = a.new_status;
5523 
5524  } else {
5525 
5526  // Updating accounting
5527  db.update_state(p->status, a.new_status);
5528 
5529  for (size_t v = 0u; v < p->n_viruses; ++v)
5530  db.update_virus(p->viruses[v]->id, p->status, a.new_status);
5531 
5532  for (size_t t = 0u; t < p->n_tools; ++t)
5533  db.update_tool(p->tools[t]->id, p->status, a.new_status);
5534 
5535 
5536  // Saving the last status and setting the new one
5537  p->status_prev = p->status;
5538  p->status = a.new_status;
5539 
5540  // It used to be a day before, but we still
5541  p->status_last_changed = today();
5542 
5543  }
5544 
5545  }
5546 
5547  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
5548  if (static_cast<int>(p->status) >= static_cast<int>(nstatus))
5549  throw std::range_error(
5550  "The new status " + std::to_string(p->status) + " is out of range. " +
5551  "The model currently has " + std::to_string(nstatus - 1) + " statuses.");
5552  #endif
5553 
5554  // Updating queue
5555  if (a.queue == QueueValues::Everyone)
5556  queue += p;
5557  else if (a.queue == -QueueValues::Everyone)
5558  queue -= p;
5559  else if (a.queue == QueueValues::OnlySelf)
5560  queue[p->get_id()]++;
5561  else if (a.queue == -QueueValues::OnlySelf)
5562  queue[p->get_id()]--;
5563  else if (a.queue != QueueValues::NoOne)
5564  throw std::logic_error(
5565  "The proposed queue change is not valid. Queue values can be {-2, -1, 0, 1, 2}."
5566  );
5567 
5568  }
5569 
5570  return;
5571 
5572 }
5573 
5582 template<typename TSeq>
5583 inline epiworld_double susceptibility_reduction_mixer_default(
5584  Agent<TSeq>* p,
5585  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
5586  Model<TSeq> * m
5587 )
5588 {
5589  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
5590  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
5591  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_susceptibility_reduction(v));
5592 
5593  return 1.0 - total;
5594 
5595 }
5596 
5597 template<typename TSeq>
5598 inline epiworld_double transmission_reduction_mixer_default(
5599  Agent<TSeq>* p,
5600  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
5601  Model<TSeq>* m
5602 )
5603 {
5604  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
5605  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
5606  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_transmission_reduction(v));
5607 
5608  return (1.0 - total);
5609 
5610 }
5611 
5612 template<typename TSeq>
5613 inline epiworld_double recovery_enhancer_mixer_default(
5614  Agent<TSeq>* p,
5615  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
5616  Model<TSeq>* m
5617 )
5618 {
5619  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
5620  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
5621  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_recovery_enhancer(v));
5622 
5623  return 1.0 - total;
5624 
5625 }
5626 
5627 template<typename TSeq>
5628 inline epiworld_double death_reduction_mixer_default(
5629  Agent<TSeq>* p,
5630  VirusPtr<TSeq> v,
5631  Model<TSeq>* m
5632 )
5633 {
5634  epiworld_double total = 1.0;
5635  for (auto & tool : p->get_tools())
5636  {
5637  total *= (1.0 - tool->get_death_reduction(v));
5638  }
5639 
5640  return 1.0 - total;
5641 
5642 }
5644 
5645 template<typename TSeq>
5646 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(const Model<TSeq> & model) :
5647  name(model.name),
5648  db(model.db),
5649  viruses(model.viruses),
5650  prevalence_virus(model.prevalence_virus),
5651  prevalence_virus_as_proportion(model.prevalence_virus_as_proportion),
5652  viruses_dist_funs(model.viruses_dist_funs),
5653  tools(model.tools),
5654  prevalence_tool(model.prevalence_tool),
5655  prevalence_tool_as_proportion(model.prevalence_tool_as_proportion),
5656  tools_dist_funs(model.tools_dist_funs),
5657  entities(model.entities),
5658  prevalence_entity(model.prevalence_entity),
5659  prevalence_entity_as_proportion(model.prevalence_entity_as_proportion),
5660  entities_dist_funs(model.entities_dist_funs),
5661  engine(model.engine),
5662  runifd(model.runifd),
5663  parameters(model.parameters),
5664  ndays(model.ndays),
5665  pb(model.pb),
5666  status_fun(model.status_fun),
5667  status_labels(model.status_labels),
5668  nstatus(model.nstatus),
5669  verbose(model.verbose),
5670  initialized(model.initialized),
5671  current_date(model.current_date),
5672  global_action_functions(model.global_action_functions),
5673  global_action_dates(model.global_action_dates),
5674  queue(model.queue),
5675  use_queuing(model.use_queuing)
5676 {
5677 
5678  // Pointing to the right place
5679  db.set_model(*this);
5680 
5681  // Removing old neighbors
5682  model.clone_population(
5683  population,
5684  directed,
5685  this
5686  );
5687 
5688  // Figure out the queuing
5689  if (use_queuing)
5690  queue.set_model(this);
5691 
5692  // Finally, seeds are resetted automatically based on the original
5693  // engine
5694  seed(floor(runif() * UINT_MAX));
5695 
5696 }
5697 
5698 template<typename TSeq>
5699 inline Model<TSeq>::Model(Model<TSeq> && model) :
5700  name(std::move(model.name)),
5701  db(std::move(model.db)),
5702  population(std::move(model.population)),
5703  population_data(std::move(model.population_data)),
5704  population_data_n_features(std::move(model.population_data_n_features)),
5705  directed(std::move(model.directed)),
5706  // Virus
5707  viruses(std::move(model.viruses)),
5708  prevalence_virus(std::move(model.prevalence_virus)),
5709  prevalence_virus_as_proportion(std::move(model.prevalence_virus_as_proportion)),
5710  viruses_dist_funs(std::move(model.viruses_dist_funs)),
5711  // Tools
5712  tools(std::move(model.tools)),
5713  prevalence_tool(std::move(model.prevalence_tool)),
5714  prevalence_tool_as_proportion(std::move(model.prevalence_tool_as_proportion)),
5715  tools_dist_funs(std::move(model.tools_dist_funs)),
5716  // Entities
5717  entities(std::move(model.entities)),
5718  prevalence_entity(std::move(model.prevalence_entity)),
5719  prevalence_entity_as_proportion(std::move(model.prevalence_entity_as_proportion)),
5720  entities_dist_funs(std::move(model.entities_dist_funs)),
5721  // Pseudo-RNG
5722  engine(std::move(model.engine)),
5723  runifd(std::move(model.runifd)),
5724  rnormd(std::move(model.rnormd)),
5725  rgammad(std::move(model.rgammad)),
5726  rlognormald(std::move(model.rlognormald)),
5727  rexpd(std::move(model.rexpd)),
5728  // Rewiring
5729  rewire_fun(std::move(model.rewire_fun)),
5730  rewire_prop(std::move(model.rewire_prop)),
5731  parameters(std::move(model.parameters)),
5732  // Others
5733  ndays(std::move(model.ndays)),
5734  pb(std::move(model.pb)),
5735  status_fun(std::move(model.status_fun)),
5736  status_labels(std::move(model.status_labels)),
5737  nstatus(model.nstatus),
5738  verbose(std::move(model.verbose)),
5739  initialized(std::move(model.initialized)),
5740  current_date(std::move(model.current_date)),
5741  global_action_functions(std::move(model.global_action_functions)),
5742  global_action_dates(std::move(model.global_action_dates)),
5743  queue(std::move(model.queue)),
5744  use_queuing(model.use_queuing)
5745 {
5746 
5747 }
5748 
5749 template<typename TSeq>
5750 inline void Model<TSeq>::clone_population(
5751  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> > & p,
5752  bool & d,
5753  Model<TSeq> * model
5754 ) const {
5755 
5756  // Copy and clean
5757  p = population;
5758  d = directed;
5759 
5760  for (auto & p: p)
5761  p.neighbors.clear();
5762 
5763  // Relinking individuals
5764  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < size(); ++i)
5765  {
5766  // Making room
5767  const Agent<TSeq> & agent_this = population[i];
5768  Agent<TSeq> & agent_res = p[i];
5769 
5770  // Readding
5771  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > neigh = agent_this.neighbors;
5772  for (epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u; n < neigh.size(); ++n)
5773  {
5774  // Point to the right neighbors
5775  int loc = p[neigh[n]->get_id()].get_id();
5776  agent_res.add_neighbor(&p[loc], true, true);
5777 
5778  }
5779 
5780  }
5781 }
5782 
5783 template<typename TSeq>
5784 inline void Model<TSeq>::clone_population(const Model<TSeq> & m)
5785 {
5786  m.clone_population(
5787  population,
5788  directed,
5789  this
5790  );
5791 }
5792 
5793 template<typename TSeq>
5794 inline DataBase<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_db()
5795 {
5796  return db;
5797 }
5798 
5799 template<typename TSeq>
5800 inline std::vector<Agent<TSeq>> * Model<TSeq>::get_agents()
5801 {
5802  return &population;
5803 }
5804 
5805 template<typename TSeq>
5806 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_smallworld(
5807  epiworld_fast_uint n,
5808  epiworld_fast_uint k,
5809  bool d,
5810  epiworld_double p
5811 )
5812 {
5813  agents_from_adjlist(
5814  rgraph_smallworld(n, k, p, d, *this)
5815  );
5816 }
5817 
5818 template<typename TSeq>
5819 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_empty_graph(
5820  epiworld_fast_uint n
5821 )
5822 {
5823 
5824  // Resizing the people
5825  population.clear();
5826  population.resize(n, Agent<TSeq>());
5827 
5828  // Filling the model and ids
5829  size_t i = 0u;
5830  for (auto & p : population)
5831  {
5832  p.model = this;
5833  p.id = i++;
5834  }
5835 
5836 }
5837 
5838 template<typename TSeq>
5839 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_engine(std::mt19937 & eng)
5840 {
5841  engine = std::make_shared< std::mt19937 >(eng);
5842 }
5843 
5844 template<typename TSeq>
5845 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_gamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta)
5846 {
5847  rgammad = std::make_shared<std::gamma_distribution<>>(alpha,beta);
5848 }
5849 
5850 template<typename TSeq>
5851 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_norm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd)
5852 {
5853  rnormd = std::make_shared<std::normal_distribution<>>(mean, sd);
5854 }
5855 
5856 template<typename TSeq>
5857 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_unif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b)
5858 {
5859  runifd = std::make_shared<std::uniform_real_distribution<>>(a, b);
5860 }
5861 
5862 template<typename TSeq>
5863 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_lognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape)
5864 {
5865  rlognormald = std::make_shared<std::lognormal_distribution<>>(mean, shape);
5866 }
5867 
5868 template<typename TSeq>
5869 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rand_exp(epiworld_double lambda)
5870 {
5871  rexpd = std::make_shared<std::exponential_distribution<>>(lambda);
5872 }
5873 
5874 template<typename TSeq>
5875 inline epiworld_double & Model<TSeq>::operator()(std::string pname) {
5876 
5877  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
5878  throw std::range_error("The parameter "+ pname + "is not in the model.");
5879 
5880  return parameters[pname];
5881 
5882 }
5883 
5884 template<typename TSeq>
5885 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::size() const {
5886  return population.size();
5887 }
5888 
5889 template<typename TSeq>
5890 inline void Model<TSeq>::init(
5891  epiworld_fast_uint ndays,
5892  epiworld_fast_uint seed
5893  ) {
5894 
5895  if (initialized)
5896  throw std::logic_error("Model already initialized.");
5897 
5898  if (nstatus == 0u)
5899  throw std::logic_error(
5900  std::string("No statuses registered in this model. ") +
5901  std::string("At least one status should be included. See the function -Model::add_status()-")
5902  );
5903 
5904  // Setting up the number of steps
5905  this->ndays = ndays;
5906 
5907  // Initializing population
5908  for (auto & p : population)
5909  p.model = this;
5910 
5911  engine->seed(seed);
5912  array_double_tmp.resize(size()/2, 0.0);
5913  array_virus_tmp.resize(size()/2);
5914 
5915  initialized = true;
5916 
5917  queue.set_model(this);
5918 
5919  // Checking whether the proposed status in/out/removed
5920  // are valid
5921  epiworld_fast_int _init, _end, _removed;
5922  int nstatus_int = static_cast<int>(nstatus);
5923  for (auto & v : viruses)
5924  {
5925  v->get_status(&_init, &_end, &_removed);
5926 
5927  // Negative unspecified status
5928  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstatus_int))
5929  throw std::range_error("Statuses must be between 0 and " +
5930  std::to_string(nstatus - 1));
5931 
5932  // Negative unspecified status
5933  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstatus_int))
5934  throw std::range_error("Statuses must be between 0 and " +
5935  std::to_string(nstatus - 1));
5936 
5937  if (((_removed != -99) && (_removed < 0)) || (_removed >= nstatus_int))
5938  throw std::range_error("Statuses must be between 0 and " +
5939  std::to_string(nstatus - 1));
5940 
5941  }
5942 
5943  for (auto & t : tools)
5944  {
5945  t->get_status(&_init, &_end);
5946 
5947  // Negative unspecified status
5948  if (((_init != -99) && (_init < 0)) || (_init >= nstatus_int))
5949  throw std::range_error("Statuses must be between 0 and " +
5950  std::to_string(nstatus - 1));
5951 
5952  // Negative unspecified status
5953  if (((_end != -99) && (_end < 0)) || (_end >= nstatus_int))
5954  throw std::range_error("Statuses must be between 0 and " +
5955  std::to_string(nstatus - 1));
5956 
5957  }
5958 
5959  // Starting first infection and tools
5960  reset();
5961 
5962 
5963 
5964 }
5965 
5966 template<typename TSeq>
5967 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_virus()
5968 {
5969 
5970  // Starting first infection
5971  int n = size();
5972  std::vector< size_t > idx(n);
5973 
5974  int n_left = n;
5975  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0);
5976 
5977  for (epiworld_fast_uint v = 0; v < viruses.size(); ++v)
5978  {
5979 
5980  if (viruses_dist_funs[v])
5981  {
5982 
5983  viruses_dist_funs[v](*viruses[v], this);
5984 
5985  } else {
5986 
5987  // Picking how many
5988  int nsampled;
5989  if (prevalence_virus_as_proportion[v])
5990  {
5991  nsampled = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence_virus[v] * size()));
5992  }
5993  else
5994  {
5995  nsampled = static_cast<int>(prevalence_virus[v]);
5996  }
5997 
5998  if (nsampled > static_cast<int>(size()))
5999  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(size()) +
6000  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the virus to " + std::to_string(nsampled));
6001 
6002 
6003  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus = viruses[v];
6004 
6005  while (nsampled > 0)
6006  {
6007 
6008  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(floor(runif() * (n_left--)));
6009 
6010  Agent<TSeq> & agent = population[idx[loc]];
6011 
6012  // Adding action
6013  agent.add_virus(virus, virus->status_init, virus->queue_init);
6014 
6015  // Adjusting sample
6016  nsampled--;
6017  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_left]);
6018 
6019  }
6020 
6021  }
6022 
6023  // Apply the actions
6024  actions_run();
6025  }
6026 
6027 }
6028 
6029 template<typename TSeq>
6030 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_tools()
6031 {
6032 
6033  // Starting first infection
6034  int n = size();
6035  std::vector< size_t > idx(n);
6036  for (epiworld_fast_uint t = 0; t < tools.size(); ++t)
6037  {
6038 
6039  if (tools_dist_funs[t])
6040  {
6041 
6042  tools_dist_funs[t](*tools[t], this);
6043 
6044  } else {
6045 
6046  // Picking how many
6047  int nsampled;
6048  if (prevalence_tool_as_proportion[t])
6049  {
6050  nsampled = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence_tool[t] * size()));
6051  }
6052  else
6053  {
6054  nsampled = static_cast<int>(prevalence_tool[t]);
6055  }
6056 
6057  if (nsampled > static_cast<int>(size()))
6058  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(size()) +
6059  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the tool to " + std::to_string(nsampled));
6060 
6061  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool = tools[t];
6062 
6063  int n_left = n;
6064  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0);
6065  while (nsampled > 0)
6066  {
6067  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(floor(runif() * n_left--));
6068 
6069  population[idx[loc]].add_tool(tool, tool->status_init, tool->queue_init);
6070 
6071  nsampled--;
6072 
6073  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_left]);
6074 
6075  }
6076 
6077  }
6078 
6079  // Apply the actions
6080  actions_run();
6081 
6082  }
6083 
6084 }
6085 
6086 template<typename TSeq>
6087 inline void Model<TSeq>::dist_entities()
6088 {
6089 
6090  // Starting first infection
6091  int n = size();
6092  std::vector< size_t > idx(n);
6093  for (epiworld_fast_uint e = 0; e < entities.size(); ++e)
6094  {
6095 
6096  if (entities_dist_funs[e])
6097  {
6098 
6099  entities_dist_funs[e](entities[e], this);
6100 
6101  } else {
6102 
6103  // Picking how many
6104  int nsampled;
6105  if (prevalence_entity_as_proportion[e])
6106  {
6107  nsampled = static_cast<int>(std::floor(prevalence_entity[e] * size()));
6108  }
6109  else
6110  {
6111  nsampled = static_cast<int>(prevalence_entity[e]);
6112  }
6113 
6114  if (nsampled > static_cast<int>(size()))
6115  throw std::range_error("There are only " + std::to_string(size()) +
6116  " individuals in the population. Cannot add the entity to " + std::to_string(nsampled));
6117 
6118  Entity<TSeq> & entity = entities[e];
6119 
6120  int n_left = n;
6121  std::iota(idx.begin(), idx.end(), 0);
6122  while (nsampled > 0)
6123  {
6124  int loc = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(floor(runif() * n_left--));
6125 
6126  population[idx[loc]].add_entity(entity, entity.status_init, entity.queue_init);
6127 
6128  nsampled--;
6129 
6130  std::swap(idx[loc], idx[n_left]);
6131 
6132  }
6133 
6134  }
6135 
6136  // Apply the actions
6137  actions_run();
6138 
6139  }
6140 
6141 }
6142 
6143 template<typename TSeq>
6144 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_start() {
6145  time_start = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
6146 }
6147 
6148 template<typename TSeq>
6149 inline void Model<TSeq>::chrono_end() {
6150  time_end = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
6151  time_elapsed += (time_end - time_start);
6152  n_replicates++;
6153 }
6154 
6155 template<typename TSeq>
6156 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_backup()
6157 {
6158 
6159  backup = std::unique_ptr<Model<TSeq>>(new Model<TSeq>(*this));
6160 
6161 }
6162 
6163 template<typename TSeq>
6164 inline void Model<TSeq>::restore_backup()
6165 {
6166 
6167  if (backup != nullptr)
6168  {
6169 
6170  clone_population(*backup);
6171 
6172  db = backup->db;
6173  db.set_model(*this);
6174 
6175  }
6176 
6177 }
6178 
6179 template<typename TSeq>
6180 inline std::mt19937 * Model<TSeq>::get_rand_endgine()
6181 {
6182  return engine.get();
6183 }
6184 
6185 template<typename TSeq>
6186 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif() {
6187  // CHECK_INIT()
6188  return (runifd->operator())(*engine);
6189 }
6190 
6191 template<typename TSeq>
6192 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::runif(epiworld_double a, epiworld_double b) {
6193  // CHECK_INIT()
6194  return ((runifd->operator())(*engine) * (b - a) + a);
6195 }
6196 
6197 template<typename TSeq>
6198 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm() {
6199  // CHECK_INIT()
6200  return (rnormd->operator())(*engine);
6201 }
6202 
6203 template<typename TSeq>
6204 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rnorm(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double sd) {
6205  // CHECK_INIT()
6206  return (rnormd->operator()(*engine)) * sd + mean;
6207 }
6208 
6209 template<typename TSeq>
6210 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma() {
6211  return (rgammad->operator())(*engine);
6212 }
6213 
6214 template<typename TSeq>
6215 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rgamma(epiworld_double alpha, epiworld_double beta) {
6216  auto old_param = rgammad->param();
6217  rgammad->param(std::gamma_distribution<>::param_type(alpha, beta));
6218  epiworld_double ans = (rgammad->operator())(*engine);
6219  rgammad->param(old_param);
6220  return ans;
6221 }
6222 
6223 template<typename TSeq>
6224 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp() {
6225  return (rexpd->operator())(*engine);
6226 }
6227 
6228 template<typename TSeq>
6229 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rexp(epiworld_double lambda) {
6230  auto old_param = rexpd->param();
6231  rexpd->param(std::exponential_distribution<>::param_type(lambda));
6232  epiworld_double ans = (rexpd->operator())(*engine);
6233  rexpd->param(old_param);
6234  return ans;
6235 }
6236 
6237 template<typename TSeq>
6238 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal() {
6239  return (rlognormald->operator())(*engine);
6240 }
6241 
6242 template<typename TSeq>
6243 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::rlognormal(epiworld_double mean, epiworld_double shape) {
6244  auto old_param = rlognormald->param();
6245  rlognormald->param(std::lognormal_distribution<>::param_type(mean, shape));
6246  epiworld_double ans = (rlognormald->operator())(*engine);
6247  rlognormald->param(old_param);
6248  return ans;
6249 }
6250 
6251 template<typename TSeq>
6252 inline void Model<TSeq>::seed(epiworld_fast_uint s) {
6253  this->engine->seed(s);
6254 }
6255 
6256 template<typename TSeq>
6257 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_virus(Virus<TSeq> v, epiworld_double preval)
6258 {
6259 
6260  if (preval > 1.0)
6261  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of virus cannot be above 1.0");
6262 
6263  if (preval < 0.0)
6264  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of virus cannot be negative");
6265 
6266  // Checking the status
6267  epiworld_fast_int init_, post_, rm_;
6268  v.get_status(&init_, &post_, &rm_);
6269 
6270  if (init_ == -99)
6271  throw std::logic_error(
6272  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -init- status."
6273  );
6274  else if (post_ == -99)
6275  throw std::logic_error(
6276  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -post- status."
6277  );
6278 
6279  // Setting sequence (if missing)
6280  if (v.get_sequence() == nullptr)
6281  v.set_sequence(default_sequence<TSeq>());
6282 
6283  // Adding new virus
6284  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(v));
6285  prevalence_virus.push_back(preval);
6286  prevalence_virus_as_proportion.push_back(true);
6287  viruses_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6288  db.record_variant(*viruses[viruses.size() - 1u]);
6289 
6290 }
6291 
6292 template<typename TSeq>
6293 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_virus_n(Virus<TSeq> v, epiworld_fast_uint preval)
6294 {
6295 
6296  // Checking the ids
6297  epiworld_fast_int init_, post_, rm_;
6298  v.get_status(&init_, &post_, &rm_);
6299 
6300  if (init_ == -99)
6301  throw std::logic_error(
6302  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -init- status."
6303  );
6304  else if (post_ == -99)
6305  throw std::logic_error(
6306  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -post- status."
6307  );
6308 
6309  // Setting the id
6310  v.set_id(viruses.size());
6311 
6312  // Adding new virus
6313  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(v));
6314  prevalence_virus.push_back(preval);
6315  prevalence_virus_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6316  viruses_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6317 
6318 }
6319 
6320 template<typename TSeq>
6321 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_virus_fun(Virus<TSeq> v, VirusToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
6322 {
6323 
6324  // Checking the ids
6325  epiworld_fast_int init_, post_, rm_;
6326  v.get_status(&init_, &post_, &rm_);
6327 
6328  if (init_ == -99)
6329  throw std::logic_error(
6330  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -init- status."
6331  );
6332  else if (post_ == -99)
6333  throw std::logic_error(
6334  "The virus \"" + v.get_name() + "\" has no -post- status."
6335  );
6336 
6337  // Setting the id
6338  v.set_id(viruses.size());
6339 
6340  // Adding new virus
6341  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(v));
6342  prevalence_virus.push_back(0.0);
6343  prevalence_virus_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6344  viruses_dist_funs.push_back(fun);
6345 
6346 }
6347 
6348 template<typename TSeq>
6349 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_tool(Tool<TSeq> t, epiworld_double preval)
6350 {
6351 
6352  if (preval > 1.0)
6353  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of tool cannot be above 1.0");
6354 
6355  if (preval < 0.0)
6356  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of tool cannot be negative");
6357 
6358  // Adding the tool to the model (and database.)
6359  tools.push_back(std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(t));
6360  prevalence_tool.push_back(preval);
6361  prevalence_tool_as_proportion.push_back(true);
6362  tools_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6363 
6364 }
6365 
6366 template<typename TSeq>
6367 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_tool_n(Tool<TSeq> t, epiworld_fast_uint preval)
6368 {
6369  t.id = tools.size();
6370  tools.push_back(std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq> >(t));
6371  prevalence_tool.push_back(preval);
6372  prevalence_tool_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6373  tools_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6374 }
6375 
6376 template<typename TSeq>
6377 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_tool_fun(Tool<TSeq> t, ToolToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
6378 {
6379  t.id = tools.size();
6380  tools.push_back(std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq> >(t));
6381  prevalence_tool.push_back(0.0);
6382  prevalence_tool_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6383  tools_dist_funs.push_back(fun);
6384 }
6385 
6386 
6387 template<typename TSeq>
6388 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_entity(Entity<TSeq> e, epiworld_double preval)
6389 {
6390 
6391  if (preval > 1.0)
6392  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of entity cannot be above 1.0");
6393 
6394  if (preval < 0.0)
6395  throw std::range_error("Prevalence of entity cannot be negative");
6396 
6397  e.model = this;
6398  e.id = entities.size();
6399  entities.push_back(e);
6400  prevalence_entity.push_back(preval);
6401  prevalence_entity_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6402  entities_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6403 
6404 }
6405 
6406 template<typename TSeq>
6407 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_entity_n(Entity<TSeq> e, epiworld_fast_uint preval)
6408 {
6409 
6410  e.model = this;
6411  e.id = entities.size();
6412  entities.push_back(e);
6413  prevalence_entity.push_back(preval);
6414  prevalence_entity_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6415  entities_dist_funs.push_back(nullptr);
6416 
6417 }
6418 
6419 template<typename TSeq>
6420 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_entity_fun(Entity<TSeq> e, EntityToAgentFun<TSeq> fun)
6421 {
6422 
6423  e.id = entities.size();
6424  entities.push_back(e);
6425  prevalence_entity.push_back(0.0);
6426  prevalence_entity_as_proportion.push_back(false);
6427  entities_dist_funs.push_back(fun);
6428 
6429 }
6430 
6431 template<typename TSeq>
6432 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(
6433  std::string fn,
6434  int size,
6435  int skip,
6436  bool directed
6437  ) {
6438 
6439  AdjList al;
6440  al.read_edgelist(fn, size, skip, directed);
6441  this->agents_from_adjlist(al);
6442 
6443 }
6444 
6445 template<typename TSeq>
6446 inline void Model<TSeq>::agents_from_adjlist(AdjList al) {
6447 
6448  // Resizing the people
6449  agents_empty_graph(al.vcount());
6450 
6451  const auto & tmpdat = al.get_dat();
6452 
6453  for (size_t i = 0u; i < tmpdat.size(); ++i)
6454  {
6455 
6456  // population[i].id = i;
6457  // population[i].model = this;
6458 
6459  for (const auto & link: tmpdat[i])
6460  {
6461 
6462  population[i].add_neighbor(
6463  &population[link.first],
6464  true, true
6465  );
6466 
6467  }
6468 
6469  }
6470 
6471  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6472  for (auto & p: population)
6473  {
6474  if (p.id >= static_cast<int>(al.vcount()))
6475  throw std::logic_error(
6476  "Agent's id cannot be negative above or equal to the number of agents!");
6477 
6478  for (const auto & n : p.neighbors)
6479  {
6480  if (n == nullptr)
6481  throw std::logic_error("A neighbor cannot be nullptr!");
6482  }
6483  }
6484  #endif
6485 
6486 }
6487 
6488 template<typename TSeq>
6489 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_directed() const
6490 {
6491  if (population.size() == 0u)
6492  throw std::logic_error("The population hasn't been initialized.");
6493 
6494  return directed;
6495 }
6496 
6497 template<typename TSeq>
6498 inline int Model<TSeq>::today() const {
6499  return this->current_date;
6500 }
6501 
6502 template<typename TSeq>
6503 inline void Model<TSeq>::next() {
6504 
6505  ++this->current_date;
6506  db.record();
6507 
6508  // Advancing the progress bar
6509  if (verbose)
6510  pb.next();
6511 
6512  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
6513  // A possible check here
6514  #endif
6515 
6516  return ;
6517 }
6518 
6519 template<typename TSeq>
6520 inline void Model<TSeq>::run()
6521 {
6522 
6523  if (size() == 0u)
6524  throw std::logic_error("There's no agents in this model!");
6525 
6526  // Initializing the simulation
6527  chrono_start();
6528  EPIWORLD_RUN((*this))
6529  {
6530 
6531  // We can execute these components in whatever order the
6532  // user needs.
6533  this->update_status();
6534 
6535  // We start with the global actions
6536  this->run_global_actions();
6537 
6538  // In this case we are applying degree sequence rewiring
6539  // to change the network just a bit.
6540  this->rewire();
6541 
6542  // This locks all the changes
6543  this->next();
6544 
6545  // Mutation must happen at the very end of all
6546  this->mutate_variant();
6547 
6548  }
6549  chrono_end();
6550 
6551 }
6552 
6553 template<typename TSeq>
6554 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_multiple(
6555  epiworld_fast_uint nexperiments,
6556  std::function<void(size_t,Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
6557  bool reset,
6558  bool verbose
6559 )
6560 {
6561 
6562  if (reset)
6563  set_backup();
6564 
6565  bool old_verb = this->verbose;
6566  verbose_off();
6567 
6568  Progress pb_multiple(
6569  nexperiments,
6570  EPIWORLD_PROGRESS_BAR_WIDTH
6571  )
6572  ;
6573  if (verbose)
6574  {
6575 
6576  printf_epiworld(
6577  "Starting multiple runs (%i)\n",
6578  static_cast<int>(nexperiments)
6579  );
6580 
6581  pb_multiple.start();
6582 
6583  }
6584 
6585  for (epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u; n < nexperiments; ++n)
6586  {
6587 
6588  run();
6589 
6590  if (fun)
6591  fun(n, this);
6592 
6593  if ((n < (nexperiments - 1u)) && reset)
6594  this->reset();
6595 
6596  if (verbose)
6597  pb_multiple.next();
6598 
6599  }
6600 
6601  if (verbose)
6602  pb_multiple.end();
6603 
6604  if (old_verb)
6605  verbose_on();
6606 
6607  return;
6608 
6609 }
6610 
6611 template<typename TSeq>
6612 inline void Model<TSeq>::update_status() {
6613 
6614  // Next status
6615  if (use_queuing)
6616  {
6617  int i = -1;
6618  for (auto & p: population)
6619  if (queue[++i] > 0)
6620  {
6621  if (status_fun[p.status])
6622  status_fun[p.status](&p, this);
6623  }
6624 
6625  }
6626  else
6627  {
6628 
6629  for (auto & p: population)
6630  if (status_fun[p.status])
6631  status_fun[p.status](&p, this);
6632 
6633  }
6634 
6635  actions_run();
6636 
6637 }
6638 
6639 template<typename TSeq>
6640 inline void Model<TSeq>::mutate_variant() {
6641 
6642  if (use_queuing)
6643  {
6644 
6645  int i = -1;
6646  for (auto & p: population)
6647  {
6648 
6649  if (queue[++i] == 0)
6650  continue;
6651 
6652  if (p.n_viruses > 0u)
6653  for (auto & v : p.get_viruses())
6654  v->mutate();
6655 
6656  }
6657 
6658  }
6659  else
6660  {
6661 
6662  for (auto & p: population)
6663  {
6664 
6665  if (p.n_viruses > 0u)
6666  for (auto & v : p.get_viruses())
6667  v->mutate();
6668 
6669  }
6670 
6671  }
6672 
6673 
6674 }
6675 
6676 template<typename TSeq>
6677 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_variants() const {
6678  return db.size();
6679 }
6680 
6681 template<typename TSeq>
6682 inline size_t Model<TSeq>::get_n_tools() const {
6683  return tools.size();
6684 }
6685 
6686 template<typename TSeq>
6687 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_ndays() const {
6688  return ndays;
6689 }
6690 
6691 template<typename TSeq>
6692 inline epiworld_fast_uint Model<TSeq>::get_n_replicates() const
6693 {
6694  return n_replicates;
6695 }
6696 
6697 template<typename TSeq>
6698 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_ndays(epiworld_fast_uint ndays) {
6699  this->ndays = ndays;
6700 }
6701 
6702 template<typename TSeq>
6703 inline bool Model<TSeq>::get_verbose() const {
6704  return verbose;
6705 }
6706 
6707 template<typename TSeq>
6708 inline void Model<TSeq>::verbose_on() {
6709  verbose = true;
6710 }
6711 
6712 template<typename TSeq>
6713 inline void Model<TSeq>::verbose_off() {
6714  verbose = false;
6715 }
6716 
6717 template<typename TSeq>
6718 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_fun(
6719  std::function<void(std::vector<Agent<TSeq>>*,Model<TSeq>*,epiworld_double)> fun
6720  ) {
6721  rewire_fun = fun;
6722 }
6723 
6724 template<typename TSeq>
6725 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_rewire_prop(epiworld_double prop)
6726 {
6727 
6728  if (prop < 0.0)
6729  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be negative.");
6730 
6731  if (prop > 1.0)
6732  throw std::range_error("Proportions cannot be above 1.0.");
6733 
6734  rewire_prop = prop;
6735 }
6736 
6737 template<typename TSeq>
6738 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_rewire_prop() const {
6739  return rewire_prop;
6740 }
6741 
6742 template<typename TSeq>
6743 inline void Model<TSeq>::rewire() {
6744 
6745  if (rewire_fun)
6746  rewire_fun(&population, this, rewire_prop);
6747 }
6748 
6749 
6750 template<typename TSeq>
6751 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_data(
6752  std::string fn_variant_info,
6753  std::string fn_variant_hist,
6754  std::string fn_tool_info,
6755  std::string fn_tool_hist,
6756  std::string fn_total_hist,
6757  std::string fn_transmission,
6758  std::string fn_transition,
6759  std::string fn_reproductive_number
6760  ) const
6761 {
6762 
6763  db.write_data(
6764  fn_variant_info, fn_variant_hist,
6765  fn_tool_info, fn_tool_hist,
6766  fn_total_hist, fn_transmission, fn_transition,
6767  fn_reproductive_number
6768  );
6769 
6770 }
6771 
6772 template<typename TSeq>
6773 inline void Model<TSeq>::write_edgelist(
6774  std::string fn
6775  ) const
6776 {
6777 
6778  // Figuring out the writing sequence
6779  std::vector< const Agent<TSeq> * > wseq(size());
6780  for (const auto & p: population)
6781  wseq[p.id] = &p;
6782 
6783  std::ofstream efile(fn, std::ios_base::out);
6784  efile << "source target\n";
6785  if (this->is_directed())
6786  {
6787 
6788  for (const auto & p : wseq)
6789  {
6790  for (auto & n : p->neighbors)
6791  efile << p->id << " " << n->id << "\n";
6792  }
6793 
6794  } else {
6795 
6796  for (const auto & p : wseq)
6797  {
6798  for (auto & n : p->neighbors)
6799  if (p->id <= n->id)
6800  efile << p->id << " " << n->id << "\n";
6801  }
6802 
6803  }
6804 
6805 }
6806 
6807 template<typename TSeq>
6808 inline std::map<std::string,epiworld_double> & Model<TSeq>::params()
6809 {
6810  return parameters;
6811 }
6812 
6813 template<typename TSeq>
6814 inline void Model<TSeq>::reset() {
6815 
6816  // Restablishing people
6817  pb = Progress(ndays, 80);
6818 
6819  if (backup != nullptr)
6820  {
6821  backup->clone_population(
6822  population,
6823  directed,
6824  this
6825  );
6826  }
6827 
6828  for (auto & p : population)
6829  p.reset();
6830 
6831  current_date = 0;
6832 
6833  db.set_model(*this);
6834 
6835  // Recording variants
6836  for (auto & v : viruses)
6837  db.record_variant(*v);
6838 
6839  // Recording tools
6840  for (auto & t : tools)
6841  db.record_tool(*t);
6842 
6843  if (use_queuing)
6844  queue.set_model(this);
6845 
6846  // Re distributing tools and virus
6847  dist_entities();
6848  dist_virus();
6849  dist_tools();
6850 
6851  // Recording the original state
6852  db.record();
6853 
6854 }
6855 
6856 // Too big to keep here
6857 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
6859 
6860  Start of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
6861 
6864 
6865 
6866 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
6867 #define EPIWORLD_MODEL_MEAT_PRINT_HPP
6868 
6869 template<typename TSeq>
6870 inline void Model<TSeq>::print() const
6871 {
6872 
6873  // Horizontal line
6874  std::string line = "";
6875  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
6876  line += "_";
6877 
6878  // Prints a message if debugging is on
6879  EPI_DEBUG_NOTIFY_ACTIVE()
6880 
6881  printf_epiworld("\n%s\n%s\n\n",line.c_str(), "SIMULATION STUDY");
6882 
6883  printf_epiworld("Name of the model : %s\n", (this->name == "") ? std::string("(none)").c_str() : name.c_str());
6884  printf_epiworld("Population size : %i\n", static_cast<int>(size()));
6885  printf_epiworld("Number of entitites : %i\n", static_cast<int>(entities.size()));
6886  printf_epiworld("Days (duration) : %i (of %i)\n", today(), static_cast<int>(ndays));
6887  printf_epiworld("Number of variants : %i\n", static_cast<int>(db.get_n_variants()));
6888  if (n_replicates > 0u)
6889  {
6890  std::string abbr;
6891  epiworld_double elapsed;
6892  epiworld_double total;
6893  get_elapsed("auto", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
6894  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : %.2f%s\n", elapsed, abbr.c_str());
6895  if (n_replicates > 1u)
6896  {
6897  printf_epiworld("Total elapsed t : %.2f%s (%i runs)\n", total, abbr.c_str(), static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
6898  }
6899 
6900  // Elapsed time in speed
6901  get_elapsed("microseconds", &elapsed, &total, &abbr, false);
6902  printf_epiworld("Last run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
6903  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
6904  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) /
6905  static_cast<double>(elapsed)
6906  );
6907  if (n_replicates > 1u)
6908  {
6909  printf_epiworld("Average run speed : %.2f million agents x day / second\n",
6910  static_cast<double>(this->size()) *
6911  static_cast<double>(this->get_ndays()) *
6912  static_cast<double>(n_replicates) /
6913  static_cast<double>(total)
6914  );
6915  }
6916 
6917  } else {
6918  printf_epiworld("Last run elapsed t : -\n");
6919  }
6920 
6921 
6922  if (rewire_fun)
6923  {
6924  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : on (%.2f)\n\n", rewire_prop);
6925  } else {
6926  printf_epiworld("Rewiring : off\n\n");
6927  }
6928 
6929 
6930  printf_epiworld("Virus(es):\n");
6931  size_t n_variants_model = viruses.size();
6932  for (size_t i = 0u; i < db.get_n_variants(); ++i)
6933  {
6934 
6935  if ((n_variants_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
6936  {
6937  printf_epiworld(" ...and %li more variants...\n", n_variants_model - i);
6938  break;
6939  }
6940 
6941  if (i < n_variants_model)
6942  {
6943 
6944  if (prevalence_virus_as_proportion[i])
6945  {
6946 
6947  printf_epiworld(
6948  " - %s (baseline prevalence: %.2f%%)\n",
6949  db.variant_name[i].c_str(),
6950  prevalence_virus[i] * 100.00
6951  );
6952 
6953  }
6954  else
6955  {
6956 
6957  printf_epiworld(
6958  " - %s (baseline prevalence: %i seeds)\n",
6959  db.variant_name[i].c_str(),
6960  static_cast<int>(prevalence_virus[i])
6961  );
6962 
6963  }
6964 
6965  } else {
6966 
6967  printf_epiworld(
6968  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
6969  db.variant_name[i].c_str()
6970  );
6971 
6972  }
6973 
6974  }
6975 
6976  if (db.variant_id.size() == 0u)
6977  {
6978  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
6979  }
6980 
6981  printf_epiworld("\nTool(s):\n");
6982  size_t n_tools_model = tools.size();
6983  for (size_t i = 0u; i < db.tool_id.size(); ++i)
6984  {
6985 
6986  if ((n_tools_model > 10) && (i >= 10))
6987  {
6988  printf_epiworld(" ...and %li more tools...\n", n_tools_model - i);
6989  break;
6990  }
6991 
6992  if (i < n_tools_model)
6993  {
6994  if (prevalence_tool_as_proportion[i])
6995  {
6996 
6997  printf_epiworld(
6998  " - %s (baseline prevalence: %.2f%%)\n",
6999  db.tool_name[i].c_str(),
7000  prevalence_tool[i] * 100.0
7001  );
7002 
7003  }
7004  else
7005  {
7006 
7007  printf_epiworld(
7008  " - %s (baseline prevalence: %i seeds)\n",
7009  db.tool_name[i].c_str(),
7010  static_cast<int>(prevalence_tool[i])
7011  );
7012 
7013  }
7014 
7015  } else {
7016  printf_epiworld(
7017  " - %s (originated in the model...)\n",
7018  db.tool_name[i].c_str()
7019  );
7020  }
7021 
7022 
7023  }
7024 
7025  if (db.tool_id.size() == 0u)
7026  {
7027  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
7028  }
7029 
7030  // Information about the parameters included
7031  printf_epiworld("\nModel parameters:\n");
7032  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
7033  for (auto & p : parameters)
7034  if (p.first.length() > nchar)
7035  nchar = p.first.length();
7036 
7037  std::string fmt = " - %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1) + "s: ";
7038  for (auto & p : parameters)
7039  {
7040  std::string fmt_tmp = fmt;
7041  if (std::fabs(p.second) < 0.0001)
7042  fmt_tmp += "%.1e\n";
7043  else
7044  fmt_tmp += "%.4f\n";
7045 
7046  printf_epiworld(
7047  fmt_tmp.c_str(),
7048  p.first.c_str(),
7049  p.second
7050  );
7051 
7052  }
7053 
7054  if (parameters.size() == 0u)
7055  {
7056  printf_epiworld(" (none)\n");
7057  }
7058 
7059  nchar = 0u;
7060  for (auto & p : status_labels)
7061  if (p.length() > nchar)
7062  nchar = p.length();
7063 
7064 
7065 
7066  if (initialized)
7067  {
7068 
7069  if (today() != 0)
7070  fmt = " - (%" + std::to_string(nstatus).length() +
7071  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) + "s : %" +
7072  std::to_string(std::to_string(size()).length()) + "i -> %i\n";
7073  else
7074  fmt = " - (%" + std::to_string(nstatus).length() +
7075  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) + "s : %i\n";
7076 
7077  }
7078  else
7079  fmt = " - (%" + std::to_string(nstatus).length() +
7080  std::string("d) %-") + std::to_string(nchar) + "s : %s\n";
7081 
7082  printf_epiworld("\nDistribution of the population at time %i:\n", today());
7083  for (size_t s = 0u; s < nstatus; ++s)
7084  {
7085  if (initialized)
7086  {
7087 
7088  if (today() != 0)
7089  {
7090 
7091  printf_epiworld(
7092  fmt.c_str(),
7093  s,
7094  status_labels[s].c_str(),
7095  db.hist_total_counts[s],
7096  db.today_total[ s ]
7097  );
7098 
7099  }
7100  else
7101  {
7102 
7103  printf_epiworld(
7104  fmt.c_str(),
7105  s,
7106  status_labels[s].c_str(),
7107  db.today_total[ s ]
7108  );
7109 
7110  }
7111 
7112 
7113  }
7114  else
7115  {
7116 
7117  printf_epiworld(
7118  fmt.c_str(),
7119  s,
7120  status_labels[s].c_str(),
7121  " - "
7122  );
7123 
7124  }
7125  }
7126 
7127  if (initialized && (today() != 0))
7128  (void) db.transition_probability(true);
7129 
7130  return;
7131 
7132 }
7133 
7134 #endif
7135 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7137 
7138  End of -include/epiworld//model-meat-print.hpp-
7139 
7142 
7143 
7144 
7145 template<typename TSeq>
7146 inline Model<TSeq> && Model<TSeq>::clone() const {
7147 
7148  // Step 1: Regen the individuals and make sure that:
7149  // - Neighbors point to the right place
7150  // - DB is pointing to the right place
7151  Model<TSeq> res(*this);
7152 
7153  // Pointing to the right place
7154  res.get_db().set_model(res);
7155 
7156  // Removing old neighbors
7157  for (auto & p: res.population)
7158  p.neighbors.clear();
7159 
7160  // Rechecking individuals
7161  for (epiworld_fast_uint p = 0u; p < size(); ++p)
7162  {
7163  // Making room
7164  const Agent<TSeq> & agent_this = population[p];
7165  Agent<TSeq> & agent_res = res.population[p];
7166 
7167  // Agent pointing to the right model and agent
7168  agent_res.model = &res;
7169  agent_res.viruses.agent = &agent_res;
7170  agent_res.tools.agent = &agent_res;
7171 
7172  // Readding
7173  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > neigh = agent_this.neighbors;
7174  for (epiworld_fast_uint n = 0u; n < neigh.size(); ++n)
7175  {
7176  // Point to the right neighbors
7177  int loc = res.population_ids[neigh[n]->get_id()];
7178  agent_res.add_neighbor(&res.population[loc], true, true);
7179 
7180  }
7181 
7182  }
7183 
7184  return res;
7185 
7186 }
7187 
7188 
7189 
7190 template<typename TSeq>
7191 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_status(
7192  std::string lab,
7193  UpdateFun<TSeq> fun
7194 )
7195 {
7196  if (this->initialized)
7197  throw std::logic_error("Cannot add status once the model has been initialized.");
7198 
7199  // Checking it doesn't match
7200  for (auto & s : status_labels)
7201  if (s == lab)
7202  throw std::logic_error("Status \"" + s + "\" already registered.");
7203 
7204  status_labels.push_back(lab);
7205  status_fun.push_back(fun);
7206  nstatus++;
7207 
7208 }
7209 
7210 
7211 template<typename TSeq>
7212 inline const std::vector< std::string > &
7213 Model<TSeq>::get_status() const
7214 {
7215  return status_labels;
7216 }
7217 
7218 template<typename TSeq>
7219 inline const std::vector< UpdateFun<TSeq> > &
7220 Model<TSeq>::get_status_fun() const
7221 {
7222  return status_fun;
7223 }
7224 
7225 template<typename TSeq>
7226 inline void Model<TSeq>::print_status_codes() const
7227 {
7228 
7229  // Horizontal line
7230  std::string line = "";
7231  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < 80u; ++i)
7232  line += "_";
7233 
7234  printf_epiworld("\n%s\nSTATUS CODES\n\n", line.c_str());
7235 
7236  epiworld_fast_uint nchar = 0u;
7237  for (auto & p : status_labels)
7238  if (p.length() > nchar)
7239  nchar = p.length();
7240 
7241  std::string fmt = " %2i = %-" + std::to_string(nchar + 1 + 4) + "s\n";
7242  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < nstatus; ++i)
7243  {
7244 
7245  printf_epiworld(
7246  fmt.c_str(),
7247  i,
7248  (status_labels[i] + " (S)").c_str()
7249  );
7250 
7251  }
7252 
7253 }
7254 
7255 #define CASE_PAR(a,b) case a: b = &(parameters[pname]);break;
7256 #define CASES_PAR(a) \
7257  switch (a) \
7258  { \
7259  CASE_PAR(0u, p0) CASE_PAR(1u, p1) CASE_PAR(2u, p2) CASE_PAR(3u, p3) \
7260  CASE_PAR(4u, p4) CASE_PAR(5u, p5) CASE_PAR(6u, p6) CASE_PAR(7u, p7) \
7261  CASE_PAR(8u, p8) CASE_PAR(9u, p9) \
7262  CASE_PAR(10u, p10) CASE_PAR(11u, p11) CASE_PAR(12u, p12) CASE_PAR(13u, p13) \
7263  CASE_PAR(14u, p14) CASE_PAR(15u, p15) CASE_PAR(16u, p16) CASE_PAR(17u, p17) \
7264  CASE_PAR(18u, p18) CASE_PAR(19u, p19) \
7265  CASE_PAR(20u, p20) CASE_PAR(21u, p21) CASE_PAR(22u, p22) CASE_PAR(23u, p23) \
7266  CASE_PAR(24u, p24) CASE_PAR(25u, p25) CASE_PAR(26u, p26) CASE_PAR(27u, p27) \
7267  CASE_PAR(28u, p28) CASE_PAR(29u, p29) \
7268  CASE_PAR(30u, p30) CASE_PAR(31u, p31) CASE_PAR(32u, p22) CASE_PAR(33u, p23) \
7269  CASE_PAR(34u, p34) CASE_PAR(35u, p35) CASE_PAR(36u, p26) CASE_PAR(37u, p27) \
7270  CASE_PAR(38u, p38) CASE_PAR(39u, p39) \
7271  default: \
7272  break; \
7273  }
7274 
7275 template<typename TSeq>
7276 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::add_param(
7277  epiworld_double initial_value,
7278  std::string pname
7279  ) {
7280 
7281  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
7282  parameters[pname] = initial_value;
7283 
7284  CASES_PAR(npar_used++)
7285 
7286  return initial_value;
7287 
7288 }
7289 
7290 template<typename TSeq>
7291 inline void Model<TSeq>::read_params(std::string fn)
7292 {
7293 
7294  std::ifstream paramsfile(fn);
7295 
7296  if (!paramsfile)
7297  throw std::logic_error("The file " + fn + " was not found.");
7298 
7299  std::regex pattern("^([^:]+)\\s*[:]\\s*([0-9]+|[0-9]*\\.[0-9]+)?\\s*$");
7300 
7301  std::string line;
7302  std::smatch match;
7303  auto empty = std::sregex_iterator();
7304 
7305  while (std::getline(paramsfile, line))
7306  {
7307 
7308  // Is it a comment or an empty line?
7309  if (std::regex_match(line, std::regex("^([*].+|//.+|#.+|\\s*)$")))
7310  continue;
7311 
7312  // Finding the patter, if it doesn't match, then error
7313  std::regex_match(line, match, pattern);
7314 
7315  if (match.empty())
7316  throw std::logic_error("The line does not match parameters:\n" + line);
7317 
7318  // Capturing the number
7319  std::string anumber = match[2u].str() + match[3u].str();
7320  epiworld_double tmp_num = static_cast<epiworld_double>(
7321  std::strtod(anumber.c_str(), nullptr)
7322  );
7323 
7324  add_param(
7325  tmp_num,
7326  std::regex_replace(
7327  match[1u].str(),
7328  std::regex("^\\s+|\\s+$"),
7329  "")
7330  );
7331 
7332  }
7333 
7334 }
7335 
7336 template<typename TSeq>
7337 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::get_param(std::string pname)
7338 {
7339  if (parameters.find(pname) == parameters.end())
7340  throw std::logic_error("The parameter " + pname + " does not exists.");
7341 
7342  return parameters[pname];
7343 }
7344 
7345 template<typename TSeq>
7346 inline epiworld_double Model<TSeq>::par(std::string pname)
7347 {
7348  return parameters[pname];
7349 }
7350 
7351 #define DURCAST(tunit,txtunit) {\
7352  elapsed = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(\
7353  time_end - time_start).count(); \
7354  elapsed_total = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono:: tunit>(time_elapsed).count(); \
7355  abbr_unit = txtunit;}
7356 
7357 template<typename TSeq>
7358 inline void Model<TSeq>::get_elapsed(
7359  std::string unit,
7360  epiworld_double * last_elapsed,
7361  epiworld_double * total_elapsed,
7362  std::string * unit_abbr,
7363  bool print
7364 ) const {
7365 
7366  // Preparing the result
7367  epiworld_double elapsed, elapsed_total;
7368  std::string abbr_unit;
7369 
7370  // Figuring out the length
7371  if (unit == "auto")
7372  {
7373 
7374  size_t tlength = std::to_string(
7375  static_cast<int>(floor(time_elapsed.count()))
7376  ).length();
7377 
7378  if (tlength <= 1)
7379  unit = "nanoseconds";
7380  else if (tlength <= 3)
7381  unit = "microseconds";
7382  else if (tlength <= 6)
7383  unit = "milliseconds";
7384  else if (tlength <= 8)
7385  unit = "seconds";
7386  else if (tlength <= 9)
7387  unit = "minutes";
7388  else
7389  unit = "hours";
7390 
7391  }
7392 
7393  if (unit == "nanoseconds") DURCAST(nanoseconds,"ns")
7394  else if (unit == "microseconds") DURCAST(microseconds,"\xC2\xB5s")
7395  else if (unit == "milliseconds") DURCAST(milliseconds,"ms")
7396  else if (unit == "seconds") DURCAST(seconds,"s")
7397  else if (unit == "minutes") DURCAST(minutes,"m")
7398  else if (unit == "hours") DURCAST(hours,"h")
7399  else
7400  throw std::range_error("The time unit " + unit + " is not supported.");
7401 
7402 
7403  if (last_elapsed != nullptr)
7404  *last_elapsed = elapsed;
7405  if (total_elapsed != nullptr)
7406  *total_elapsed = elapsed_total;
7407  if (unit_abbr != nullptr)
7408  *unit_abbr = abbr_unit;
7409 
7410  if (!print)
7411  return;
7412 
7413  if (n_replicates > 1u)
7414  {
7415  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
7416  elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
7417  printf_epiworld("total elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
7418  elapsed_total, abbr_unit.c_str());
7419  printf_epiworld("total runs : %i\n",
7420  static_cast<int>(n_replicates));
7421  printf_epiworld("mean run elapsed time : %.2f%s\n",
7422  elapsed_total/static_cast<epiworld_double>(n_replicates), abbr_unit.c_str());
7423 
7424  } else {
7425  printf_epiworld("last run elapsed time : %.2f%s.\n", elapsed, abbr_unit.c_str());
7426  }
7427 }
7428 
7429 template<typename TSeq>
7430 inline void Model<TSeq>::set_user_data(std::vector< std::string > names)
7431 {
7432  db.set_user_data(names);
7433 }

7438  db.add_user_data(j, x);

7453 template<typename TSeq>
7454 inline void Model<TSeq>::add_global_action(
7455  std::function<void(Model<TSeq>*)> fun,
7456  int date
7457 )
7458 {
7459 
7460  global_action_functions.push_back(fun);
7461  global_action_dates.push_back(date);
7462 
7463 }
7464 
7465 template<typename TSeq>
7466 inline void Model<TSeq>::run_global_actions()
7467 {
7468 
7469  for (epiworld_fast_uint i = 0u; i < global_action_dates.size(); ++i)
7470  {
7471 
7472  if (global_action_dates[i] < 0)
7473  {
7474 
7475  global_action_functions[i](this);
7476 
7477  }
7478  else if (global_action_dates[i] == today())
7479  {
7480 
7481  global_action_functions[i](this);
7482 
7483  }
7484 
7485  actions_run();
7486 
7487  }
7488 
7489 }
7490 
7491 template<typename TSeq>
7492 inline void Model<TSeq>::queuing_on()
7493 {
7494  use_queuing = true;
7495 }
7496 
7497 template<typename TSeq>
7498 inline void Model<TSeq>::queuing_off()
7499 {
7500  use_queuing = false;
7501 }
7502 
7503 template<typename TSeq>
7504 inline bool Model<TSeq>::is_queuing_on() const
7505 {
7506  return use_queuing;
7507 }

7510 inline Queue<TSeq> & Model<TSeq>::get_queue()
7511 {
7512  return queue;
7513 }

7566 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
7567 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUSES_BONES_HPP
7568 
7569 template<typename TSeq>
7570 class Virus;
7571 
7572 template<typename TSeq>
7573 class Agent;
7574 
7575 #define VIRUSPTR std::shared_ptr< Virus<TSeq> >
7576 
7582 template<typename TSeq>
7583 class Viruses {
7584  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
7585  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
7586 private:
7587  std::vector< VIRUSPTR > * dat;
7588  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
7589 
7590 public:
7591 
7592  Viruses() = delete;
7593  Viruses(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
7594 
7595  typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::iterator begin();
7596  typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::iterator end();
7597 
7598  VIRUSPTR & operator()(size_t i);
7599  VIRUSPTR & operator[](size_t i);
7600 
7601  size_t size() const noexcept;
7602 
7603 };
7604 
7605 template<typename TSeq>
7606 inline typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::begin()
7607 {
7608 
7609  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
7610  return dat->end();
7611 
7612  return dat->begin();
7613 }
7614 
7615 template<typename TSeq>
7616 inline typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::iterator Viruses<TSeq>::end()
7617 {
7618 
7619  return begin() + *n_viruses;
7620 }
7621 
7622 template<typename TSeq>
7623 inline VIRUSPTR & Viruses<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
7624 {
7625 
7626  if (i >= *n_viruses)
7627  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
7628 
7629  return dat->operator[](i);
7630 
7631 }
7632 
7633 template<typename TSeq>
7634 inline VIRUSPTR & Viruses<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
7635 {
7636 
7637  return dat->operator[](i);
7638 
7639 }
7640 
7641 template<typename TSeq>
7642 inline size_t Viruses<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
7643 {
7644  return *n_viruses;
7645 }
7646 
7652 template<typename TSeq>
7653 class Viruses_const {
7654  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
7655  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
7656 private:
7657  const std::vector< VIRUSPTR > * dat;
7658  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_viruses;
7659 
7660 public:
7661 
7662  Viruses_const() = delete;
7663  Viruses_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.viruses), n_viruses(&p.n_viruses) {};
7664 
7665  typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::const_iterator begin() const;
7666  typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::const_iterator end() const;
7667 
7668  const VIRUSPTR & operator()(size_t i);
7669  const VIRUSPTR & operator[](size_t i);
7670 
7671  size_t size() const noexcept;
7672 
7673 };
7674 
7675 template<typename TSeq>
7676 inline typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
7677 
7678  if (*n_viruses == 0u)
7679  return dat->end();
7680 
7681  return dat->begin();
7682 }
7683 
7684 template<typename TSeq>
7685 inline typename std::vector< VIRUSPTR >::const_iterator Viruses_const<TSeq>::end() const {
7686 
7687  return begin() + *n_viruses;
7688 }
7689 
7690 template<typename TSeq>
7691 inline const VIRUSPTR & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
7692 {
7693 
7694  if (i >= *n_viruses)
7695  throw std::range_error("Virus index out of range.");
7696 
7697  return dat->operator[](i);
7698 
7699 }
7700 
7701 template<typename TSeq>
7702 inline const VIRUSPTR & Viruses_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
7703 {
7704 
7705  return dat->operator[](i);
7706 
7707 }
7708 
7709 template<typename TSeq>
7710 inline size_t Viruses_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
7711 {
7712  return *n_viruses;
7713 }

7739 #ifndef EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP
7740 #define EPIWORLD_VIRUS_HPP

7742 template<typename TSeq>
7743 class Agent;

7746 class Virus;

7749 class Model;

7761 template<typename TSeq>
7762 class Virus {
7763  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
7764  friend class Model<TSeq>;
7765  friend class DataBase<TSeq>;
7766  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
7767  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
7768 private:
7769 
7770  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
7771  int agent_idx = -99;
7772  int agent_exposure_number = -99;
7773 
7774  std::shared_ptr<TSeq> baseline_sequence = nullptr;
7775  std::shared_ptr<std::string> virus_name = nullptr;
7776  int date = -99;
7777  int id = -99;
7778  bool active = true;
7779  MutFun<TSeq> mutation_fun = nullptr;
7780  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> post_recovery_fun = nullptr;
7781  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_infecting_fun = nullptr;
7782  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_recovery_fun = nullptr;
7783  VirusFun<TSeq> probability_of_death_fun = nullptr;
7784 
7785  // Setup parameters
7786  std::vector< epiworld_double * > params;
7787  std::vector< epiworld_double > data;
7788 
7789  epiworld_fast_int status_init = -99; ///< Change of status when added to agent.
7790  epiworld_fast_int status_post = -99; ///< Change of status when removed from agent.
7791  epiworld_fast_int status_removed = -99; ///< Change of status when agent is removed
7792 
7793  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = QueueValues::Everyone; ///< Change of status when added to agent.
7794  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = -QueueValues::Everyone; ///< Change of status when removed from agent.
7795  epiworld_fast_int queue_removed = -99; ///< Change of status when agent is removed
7796 
7797 public:
7798  Virus(std::string name = "unknown virus");
7799 
7800  void mutate();
7801  void set_mutation(MutFun<TSeq> fun);
7802 
7803  const TSeq* get_sequence();
7804  void set_sequence(TSeq sequence);
7805 
7806  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
7807  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld_fast_uint idx);
7808  Model<TSeq> * get_model();
7809 
7810  void set_date(int d);
7811  int get_date() const;
7812 
7813  void set_id(int idx);
7814  int get_id() const;
7815 
7825  epiworld_double get_prob_infecting();
7826  epiworld_double get_prob_recovery();
7827  epiworld_double get_prob_death();
7828 
7829  void post_recovery();
7830  void set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun);
7831  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double prob);
7832  void set_post_immunity(epiworld_double * prob);
7833 
7834  void set_prob_infecting_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
7835  void set_prob_recovery_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
7836  void set_prob_death_fun(VirusFun<TSeq> fun);
7837 
7838  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double * prob);
7839  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double * prob);
7840  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double * prob);
7841 
7842  void set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double prob);
7843  void set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double prob);
7844  void set_prob_death(epiworld_double prob);
7846 
7847 
7848  void set_name(std::string name);
7849  std::string get_name() const;
7850 
7851  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_data();
7852 
7866  void set_status(
7867  epiworld_fast_int init,
7868  epiworld_fast_int end,
7869  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
7870  );
7871 
7872  void set_queue(
7873  epiworld_fast_int init,
7874  epiworld_fast_int end,
7875  epiworld_fast_int removed = -99
7876  );
7877 
7878  void get_status(
7879  epiworld_fast_int * init,
7880  epiworld_fast_int * end,
7881  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
7882  );
7883 
7884  void get_queue(
7885  epiworld_fast_int * init,
7886  epiworld_fast_int * end,
7887  epiworld_fast_int * removed = nullptr
7888  );
7890 
7891 };
7892 
7893 #endif
7894 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
7896 
7897  End of -include/epiworld/virus-bones.hpp-

7915 template<typename TSeq>
7916 inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(std::string name) {
7917  set_name(name);
7918 }
7919 
7920 // template<typename TSeq>
7921 // inline Virus<TSeq>::Virus(TSeq sequence, std::string name) {
7922 // baseline_sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(sequence);
7923 // set_name(name);
7924 // }
7925 
7926 template<typename TSeq>
7927 inline void Virus<TSeq>::mutate() {
7928 
7929  if (mutation_fun)
7930  if (mutation_fun(agent, *this, this->get_model()))
7931  agent->get_model()->get_db().record_variant(*this);
7932 
7933  return;
7934 
7935 }
7936 
7937 template<typename TSeq>
7938 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_mutation(
7939  MutFun<TSeq> fun
7940 ) {
7941  mutation_fun = MutFun<TSeq>(fun);
7942 }
7943 
7944 template<typename TSeq>
7945 inline const TSeq * Virus<TSeq>::get_sequence() {
7946  return &(*baseline_sequence);
7947 }
7948 
7949 template<typename TSeq>
7950 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_sequence(TSeq sequence) {
7951  baseline_sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(sequence);
7952  return;
7953 }
7954 
7955 template<typename TSeq>
7956 inline Agent<TSeq> * Virus<TSeq>::get_agent() {
7957  return agent;
7958 }
7959 
7960 template<typename TSeq>
7961 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld_fast_uint idx) {
7962  agent = p;
7963  agent_idx = static_cast<int>(idx);
7964 }
7965 
7966 template<typename TSeq>
7967 inline Model<TSeq> * Virus<TSeq>::get_model() {
7968  return agent->get_model();
7969 }
7970

7972 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_id(int idx) {
7973  id = idx;
7974  return;
7975 }

7980  return id;
7981 }

7985  date = d;
7986  return;
7987 }
7988 
7989 template<typename TSeq>
7990 inline int Virus<TSeq>::get_date() const {
7991 
7992  return date;
7993 }
7994 
7995 template<typename TSeq>
7996 inline epiworld_double Virus<TSeq>::get_prob_infecting()
7997 {
7998 
7999  if (probability_of_infecting_fun)
8000  return probability_of_infecting_fun(agent, *this, agent->get_model());
8001 
8002  return EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_INFECTION;
8003 
8004 }
8005 
8006 
8007 
8008 template<typename TSeq>
8009 inline epiworld_double Virus<TSeq>::get_prob_recovery()
8010 {
8011 
8012  if (probability_of_recovery_fun)
8013  return probability_of_recovery_fun(agent, *this, agent->get_model());
8014 
8015  return EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_RECOVERY;
8016 
8017 }
8018 
8019

8023 {
8024 
8025  if (probability_of_death_fun)
8026  return probability_of_death_fun(agent, *this, agent->get_model());
8027 
8028  return EPI_DEFAULT_VIRUS_PROB_DEATH;
8029 
8030 }

8050 template<typename TSeq>
8051 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_prob_infecting(epiworld_double * prob)
8052 {
8053  VirusFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8054  [prob](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> & v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8055  {
8056  return *prob;
8057  };
8058 
8059  probability_of_infecting_fun = tmpfun;
8060 }
8061 
8062 template<typename TSeq>
8063 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_prob_recovery(epiworld_double * prob)
8064 {
8065  VirusFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8066  [prob](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> & v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8067  {
8068  return *prob;
8069  };
8070 
8071  probability_of_recovery_fun = tmpfun;
8072 }

8080  return *prob;

8088 {
8089  VirusFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8090  [prob](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> & v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8091  {
8092  return prob;

8094

8121 
8122 template<typename TSeq>
8123 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_recovery(PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> fun)
8124 {
8125  if (post_recovery_fun)
8126  {
8127  printf_epiworld(
8128  "Warning: a PostRecoveryFun is alreay in place (overwriting)."
8129  );
8130  }
8131 
8132  post_recovery_fun = fun;
8133 }
8134 
8135 template<typename TSeq>
8136 inline void Virus<TSeq>::post_recovery()
8137 {
8138 
8139  if (post_recovery_fun)
8140  post_recovery_fun(agent, *this, agent->get_model());
8141 
8142  return;
8143 
8144 }
8145 
8146 template<typename TSeq>
8147 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
8148  epiworld_double prob
8149 )
8150 {
8151 
8152  if (post_recovery_fun)
8153  {
8154 
8155  std::string msg =
8156  std::string(
8157  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
8158  ) +
8159  std::string(
8160  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
8161  );
8162 
8163  throw std::logic_error(msg);
8164 
8165  }
8166 
8167  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
8168  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
8169  "Immunity (" + *virus_name + ")"
8170  );
8171 
8172  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
8173  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
8174  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
8175  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
8176 
8177  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8178  [__no_reinfect](
8179  Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> & v, Model<TSeq> * m
8180  )
8181  {
8182 
8183  // Have we registered the tool?
8184  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
8185  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
8186 
8187  p->add_tool(__no_reinfect);
8188 
8189  return;
8190 
8191  };
8192 
8193  post_recovery_fun = tmpfun;
8194 
8195 }
8196 
8197 template<typename TSeq>
8198 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_post_immunity(
8199  epiworld_double * prob
8200 )
8201 {
8202 
8203  if (post_recovery_fun)
8204  {
8205 
8206  std::string msg =
8207  std::string(
8208  "You cannot set post immunity when a post_recovery "
8209  ) +
8210  std::string(
8211  "function is already in place. Redesign the post_recovery function."
8212  );
8213 
8214  throw std::logic_error(msg);
8215 
8216  }
8217 
8218  // To make sure that we keep registering the virus
8219  ToolPtr<TSeq> __no_reinfect = std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(
8220  "Immunity (" + *virus_name + ")"
8221  );
8222 
8223  __no_reinfect->set_susceptibility_reduction(prob);
8224  __no_reinfect->set_death_reduction(0.0);
8225  __no_reinfect->set_transmission_reduction(0.0);
8226  __no_reinfect->set_recovery_enhancer(0.0);
8227 
8228  PostRecoveryFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8229  [__no_reinfect](Agent<TSeq> * p, Virus<TSeq> & v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8230  {
8231 
8232  // Have we registered the tool?
8233  if (__no_reinfect->get_id() == -99)
8234  m->get_db().record_tool(*__no_reinfect);
8235 
8236  p->add_tool(__no_reinfect);
8237 
8238  return;
8239 
8240  };
8241 
8242  post_recovery_fun = tmpfun;
8243 
8244 }
8245 
8246 template<typename TSeq>
8247 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_name(std::string name)
8248 {
8249 
8250  if (name == "")
8251  virus_name = nullptr;
8252  else
8253  virus_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(name);
8254 
8255 }
8256 
8257 template<typename TSeq>
8258 inline std::string Virus<TSeq>::get_name() const
8259 {
8260 
8261  if (virus_name)
8262  return *virus_name;
8263 
8264  return "unknown virus";
8265 
8266 }
8267 
8268 template<typename TSeq>
8269 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & Virus<TSeq>::get_data() {
8270  return data;
8271 }
8272 
8273 template<typename TSeq>
8274 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_status(
8275  epiworld_fast_int init,
8276  epiworld_fast_int end,
8277  epiworld_fast_int removed
8278 )
8279 {
8280  status_init = init;
8281  status_post = end;
8282  status_removed = removed;
8283 }
8284 
8285 template<typename TSeq>
8286 inline void Virus<TSeq>::set_queue(
8287  epiworld_fast_int init,
8288  epiworld_fast_int end,
8289  epiworld_fast_int removed
8290 )
8291 {
8292 
8293  queue_init = init;
8294  queue_post = end;
8295  queue_removed = removed;
8296 
8297 }
8298 
8299 template<typename TSeq>
8300 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_status(
8301  epiworld_fast_int * init,
8302  epiworld_fast_int * end,
8303  epiworld_fast_int * removed
8304 )
8305 {
8306 
8307  if (init != nullptr)
8308  *init = status_init;
8309 
8310  if (end != nullptr)
8311  *end = status_post;
8312 
8313  if (removed != nullptr)
8314  *removed = status_removed;
8315 
8316 }
8317 
8318 template<typename TSeq>
8319 inline void Virus<TSeq>::get_queue(
8320  epiworld_fast_int * init,
8321  epiworld_fast_int * end,
8322  epiworld_fast_int * removed
8323 )
8324 {
8325 
8326  if (init != nullptr)
8327  *init = queue_init;
8328 
8329  if (end != nullptr)
8330  *end = queue_post;
8331 
8332  if (removed != nullptr)
8333  *removed = queue_removed;
8334 
8335 }

8351  Start of -include/epiworld/tools-bones.hpp-
8352 
8355 
8356 
8357 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
8358 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_BONES_HPP
8359 
8360 template<typename TSeq>
8361 class Tool;
8362 
8363 template<typename TSeq>
8364 class Agent;
8365 
8366 // #define ToolPtr<TSeq> std::shared_ptr< Tool<TSeq> >
8367 
8373 template<typename TSeq>
8374 class Tools {
8375  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
8376  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
8377 private:
8378  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
8379  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_tools;
8380 
8381 public:
8382 
8383  Tools() = delete;
8384  Tools(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
8385 
8386  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator begin();
8387  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator end();
8388 
8389  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
8390  ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
8391 
8392  size_t size() const noexcept;
8393 
8394 };
8395 
8396 template<typename TSeq>
8397 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::begin()
8398 {
8399 
8400  if (*n_tools == 0u)
8401  return dat->end();
8402 
8403  return dat->begin();
8404 }
8405 
8406 template<typename TSeq>
8407 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::iterator Tools<TSeq>::end()
8408 {
8409 
8410  return begin() + *n_tools;
8411 }
8412 
8413 template<typename TSeq>
8414 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
8415 {
8416 
8417  if (i >= *n_tools)
8418  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
8419 
8420  return dat->operator[](i);
8421 
8422 }
8423 
8424 template<typename TSeq>
8425 inline ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
8426 {
8427 
8428  return dat->operator[](i);
8429 
8430 }
8431 
8432 template<typename TSeq>
8433 inline size_t Tools<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
8434 {
8435  return *n_tools;
8436 }
8437 
8443 template<typename TSeq>
8444 class Tools_const {
8445  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
8446  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
8447 private:
8448  const std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > * dat;
8449  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_tools;
8450 
8451 public:
8452 
8453  Tools_const() = delete;
8454  Tools_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.tools), n_tools(&p.n_tools) {};
8455 
8456  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator begin() const;
8457  typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator end() const;
8458 
8459  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator()(size_t i);
8460  const ToolPtr<TSeq> & operator[](size_t i);
8461 
8462  size_t size() const noexcept;
8463 
8464 };
8465 
8466 template<typename TSeq>
8467 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::begin() const {
8468 
8469  if (*n_tools == 0u)
8470  return dat->end();
8471 
8472  return dat->begin();
8473 }
8474 
8475 template<typename TSeq>
8476 inline typename std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> >::const_iterator Tools_const<TSeq>::end() const {
8477 
8478  return begin() + *n_tools;
8479 }
8480 
8481 template<typename TSeq>
8482 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
8483 {
8484 
8485  if (i >= *n_tools)
8486  throw std::range_error("Tool index out of range.");
8487 
8488  return dat->operator[](i);
8489 
8490 }
8491 
8492 template<typename TSeq>
8493 inline const ToolPtr<TSeq> & Tools_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
8494 {
8495 
8496  return dat->operator[](i);
8497 
8498 }
8499 
8500 template<typename TSeq>
8501 inline size_t Tools_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
8502 {
8503  return *n_tools;
8504 }
8505

8519 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
8521 
8522  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-bones.hpp-
8523 
8526 
8527 
8528 
8529 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
8530 #define EPIWORLD_TOOL_BONES_HPP
8531 
8532 template<typename TSeq>
8533 class Virus;
8534 
8535 template<typename TSeq>
8536 class Agent;
8537 
8538 template<typename TSeq>
8539 class Model;
8540 
8541 template<typename TSeq>
8542 class Tool;
8543 
8549 template<typename TSeq>
8550 class Tool {
8551  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
8552  friend class Model<TSeq>;
8553  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
8554  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
8555 private:
8556 
8557  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
8558  int agent_idx = -99;
8559 
8560  int date = -99;
8561  int id = -99;
8562  std::shared_ptr<std::string> tool_name = nullptr;
8563  std::shared_ptr<TSeq> sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(default_sequence<TSeq>());
8564  TSeq sequence_unique = default_sequence<TSeq>();
8565  ToolFun<TSeq> susceptibility_reduction_fun = nullptr;
8566  ToolFun<TSeq> transmission_reduction_fun = nullptr;
8567  ToolFun<TSeq> recovery_enhancer_fun = nullptr;
8568  ToolFun<TSeq> death_reduction_fun = nullptr;
8569 
8570  // Setup parameters
8571  std::vector< epiworld_double * > params;
8572 
8573  epiworld_fast_int status_init = -99;
8574  epiworld_fast_int status_post = -99;
8575 
8576  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = QueueValues::NoOne; ///< Change of status when added to agent.
8577  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = QueueValues::NoOne; ///< Change of status when removed from agent.
8578 
8579  void set_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p, size_t idx);
8580 
8581 public:
8582  Tool(std::string name = "unknown tool");
8583  // Tool(TSeq d, std::string name = "unknown tool");
8584 
8585  void set_sequence(TSeq d);
8586  void set_sequence_unique(TSeq d);
8587  void set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d);
8588  std::shared_ptr<TSeq> get_sequence();
8589  TSeq & get_sequence_unique();
8590 
8600  epiworld_double get_susceptibility_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
8601  epiworld_double get_transmission_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
8602  epiworld_double get_recovery_enhancer(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
8603  epiworld_double get_death_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
8604 
8605  void set_susceptibility_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
8606  void set_transmission_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
8607  void set_recovery_enhancer_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
8608  void set_death_reduction_fun(ToolFun<TSeq> fun);
8609 
8610  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
8611  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
8612  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double * prob);
8613  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double * prob);
8614 
8615  void set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
8616  void set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
8617  void set_recovery_enhancer(epiworld_double prob);
8618  void set_death_reduction(epiworld_double prob);
8620 
8621  void set_name(std::string name);
8622  std::string get_name() const;
8623 
8624  Agent<TSeq> * get_agent();
8625  int get_id() const;
8626  void set_id(int id);
8627  void set_date(int d);
8628  int get_date() const;
8629 
8630  void set_status(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
8631  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
8632  void get_status(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
8633  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
8634 
8635 };
8636 
8637 #endif
8638 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

8641  End of -include/epiworld/tool-bones.hpp-
