8647 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
8649 
8650  Start of -include/epiworld/tool-meat.hpp-
8651 
8654 
8655 
8656 
8657 #ifndef EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
8658 #define EPIWORLD_TOOLS_MEAT_HPP
8659 
8660 template<typename TSeq>
8661 inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(std::string name)
8662 {
8663  set_name(name);
8664 }
8665 
8666 // template<typename TSeq>
8667 // inline Tool<TSeq>::Tool(TSeq d, std::string name) {
8668 // sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(d);
8669 // tool_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(name);
8670 // }
8671 
8672 template<typename TSeq>
8673 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(TSeq d) {
8674  sequence = std::make_shared<TSeq>(d);
8675 }
8676 
8677 template<typename TSeq>
8678 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence_unique(TSeq d) {
8679  sequence_unique = d;
8680 }
8681 
8682 template<typename TSeq>
8683 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_sequence(std::shared_ptr<TSeq> d) {
8684  sequence = d;
8685 }
8686 
8687 template<typename TSeq>
8688 inline std::shared_ptr<TSeq> Tool<TSeq>::get_sequence() {
8689  return sequence;
8690 }
8691 
8692 template<typename TSeq>
8693 inline TSeq & Tool<TSeq>::get_sequence_unique() {
8694  return sequence_unique;
8695 }
8696 
8697 template<typename TSeq>
8698 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
8699  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
8700 )
8701 {
8702 
8703  if (susceptibility_reduction_fun)
8704  return susceptibility_reduction_fun(*this, this->agent, v, agent->get_model());
8705 
8706  return DEFAULT_TOOL_CONTAGION_REDUCTION;
8707 
8708 }
8709 
8710 template<typename TSeq>
8711 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
8712  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
8713 )
8714 {
8715 
8716  if (transmission_reduction_fun)
8717  return transmission_reduction_fun(*this, this->agent, v, agent->get_model());
8718 
8719  return DEFAULT_TOOL_TRANSMISSION_REDUCTION;
8720 
8721 }
8722 
8723 template<typename TSeq>
8724 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_recovery_enhancer(
8725  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
8726 )
8727 {
8728 
8729  if (recovery_enhancer_fun)
8730  return recovery_enhancer_fun(*this, this->agent, v, agent->get_model());
8731 
8732  return DEFAULT_TOOL_RECOVERY_ENHANCER;
8733 
8734 }
8735 
8736 template<typename TSeq>
8737 inline epiworld_double Tool<TSeq>::get_death_reduction(
8738  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
8739 )
8740 {
8741 
8742  if (death_reduction_fun)
8743  return death_reduction_fun(*this, this->agent, v, agent->get_model());
8744 
8745  return DEFAULT_TOOL_DEATH_REDUCTION;
8746 
8747 }
8748 
8749 template<typename TSeq>

8751  ToolFun<TSeq> fun
8752 )
8753 {
8754  susceptibility_reduction_fun = fun;
8755 }
8756

8759  ToolFun<TSeq> fun
8760 )

8775  ToolFun<TSeq> fun
8776 )
8777 {
8778  death_reduction_fun = fun;
8779 }
8780 
8781 template<typename TSeq>
8782 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_susceptibility_reduction(epiworld_double * prob)
8783 {
8784 
8785  ToolFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8786  [prob](Tool<TSeq> & t, Agent<TSeq> * p, VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8787  {
8788  return *prob;
8789  };
8790 
8791  susceptibility_reduction_fun = tmpfun;
8792 
8793 }
8794 
8795 // EPIWORLD_SET_LAMBDA(susceptibility_reduction)
8796 template<typename TSeq>
8797 inline void Tool<TSeq>::set_transmission_reduction(epiworld_double * prob)
8798 {
8799 
8800  ToolFun<TSeq> tmpfun =
8801  [prob](Tool<TSeq> & t, Agent<TSeq> * p, VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8802  {
8803  return *prob;
8804  };
8805 
8806  transmission_reduction_fun = tmpfun;
8807 
8808 }
8809 
8810 // EPIWORLD_SET_LAMBDA(transmission_reduction)

8814

8816  [prob](Tool<TSeq> & t, Agent<TSeq> * p, VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8817  {
8818  return *prob;
8819  };
8820 
8821  recovery_enhancer_fun = tmpfun;
8822 
8823 }
8824

8828 {

8831  [prob](Tool<TSeq> & t, Agent<TSeq> * p, VirusPtr<TSeq> v, Model<TSeq> * m)
8832  {
8833  return *prob;
8834  };
8835

8837 
8838 }

8851  {
8852  return prob;
8853  };

8856

8907 template<typename TSeq>

8909 {

8911  tool_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(name);
8912 }

8914 template<typename TSeq>
8915 inline std::string Tool<TSeq>::get_name() const {
8916 
8917  if (tool_name)
8918  return *tool_name;
8919 
8920  return "unknown tool";
8921 
8922 }

8926 {

8934  agent_idx = static_cast<int>(idx);
8935 }

8982 inline void Tool<TSeq>::get_status(
8983  epiworld_fast_int * init,
8984  epiworld_fast_int * post
8985 )
8986 {
8987  if (init != nullptr)
8988  *init = status_init;
8989 
8990  if (post != nullptr)
8991  *post = status_post;
8992 
8993 }

9004  if (post != nullptr)

9019 
9020 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9022 
9023  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
9024 
9027 
9028 
9029 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
9030 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_BONES_HPP
9031 
9032 template<typename TSeq>
9033 class Model;
9034 
9035 template<typename TSeq>
9036 class Agent;
9037 
9038 template<typename TSeq>
9039 class AgentsSample;
9040 
9041 template<typename TSeq>
9042 inline void default_add_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
9043 
9044 template<typename TSeq>
9045 inline void default_rm_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
9046 
9047 template<typename TSeq>
9048 class Entity {
9049  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
9050  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
9051  friend class Model<TSeq>;
9052  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
9053  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
9054 private:
9055 
9056  int id = -1;
9057  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > agents; ///< Vector of agents
9058  std::vector< size_t > agents_location; ///< Location where the entity is stored in the agent
9059  size_t n_agents = 0u;
9060 
9070  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_agents;
9071  size_t sampled_agents_n = 0u;
9072  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents_left;
9073  size_t sampled_agents_left_n = 0u;
9074  int date_last_add_or_remove = -99; ///< Last time the entity added or removed an agent
9076 
9077  int max_capacity = -1;
9078  std::string entity_name = "Unknown entity";
9079 
9080  std::vector< epiworld_double > location = {0.0}; ///< An arbitrary vector for location
9081  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr;
9082 
9083  epiworld_fast_int status_init = -99;
9084  epiworld_fast_int status_post = -99;
9085 
9086  epiworld_fast_int queue_init = 0; ///< Change of status when added to agent.
9087  epiworld_fast_int queue_post = 0; ///< Change of status when removed from agent.
9088 
9089 public:
9090 
9091  Entity() = delete;
9092  // Entity(const Entity & e) = delete;
9093  // Entity(Entity && e);
9094  Entity(std::string name) : entity_name(name) {};
9095 
9096  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> & p);
9097  void add_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p);
9098  void rm_agent(size_t idx);
9099  size_t size() const noexcept;
9100  void set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc);
9101  std::vector< epiworld_double > & get_location();
9102 
9103  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
9104  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
9105 
9106  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator begin() const;
9107  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator end() const;
9108 
9109  Agent<TSeq> * operator[](size_t i);
9110 
9111  int get_id() const noexcept;
9112  const std::string & get_name() const noexcept;
9113 
9114  void set_status(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
9115  void set_queue(epiworld_fast_int init, epiworld_fast_int post);
9116  void get_status(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
9117  void get_queue(epiworld_fast_int * init, epiworld_fast_int * post);
9118 
9119 };
9120 
9121 
9122 #endif
9123 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9125 
9126  End of -include/epiworld/entity-bones.hpp-
9127 
9130 
9131 
9132 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9134 
9135  Start of -include/epiworld/entity-meat.hpp-
9136 
9139 
9140 
9141 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITY_MEAT_HPP
9142 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITY_MEAT_HPP
9143 template<typename TSeq>
9144 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(Agent<TSeq> & p)
9145 {
9146 
9147  // Need to add it to the actions, through the individual
9148  p.add_entity(*this);
9149 
9150 }
9151 
9152 template<typename TSeq>
9153 inline void Entity<TSeq>::add_agent(Agent<TSeq> * p)
9154 {
9155  p->add_entity(*this);
9156 }
9157 
9158 template<typename TSeq>
9159 inline void Entity<TSeq>::rm_agent(size_t idx)
9160 {
9161  if (idx >= n_agents)
9162  throw std::out_of_range(
9163  "Trying to remove agent "+ std::to_string(idx) +
9164  " out of " + std::to_string(n_agents)
9165  );
9166 
9167  agents[idx]->rm_entity(*this);
9168 
9169  return;
9170 }
9171 
9172 template<typename TSeq>
9173 inline size_t Entity<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
9174 {
9175  return n_agents;
9176 }
9177 
9178 template<typename TSeq>
9179 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_location(std::vector< epiworld_double > loc)
9180 {
9181  location = loc;
9182 }
9183 
9184 template<typename TSeq>
9185 inline std::vector< epiworld_double > & Entity<TSeq>::get_location()
9186 {
9187  return location;
9188 }
9189 
9190 template<typename TSeq>
9191 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin()
9192 {
9193 
9194  if (n_agents == 0)
9195  return agents.end();
9196 
9197  return agents.begin();
9198 
9199 }
9200 
9201 template<typename TSeq>
9202 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator Entity<TSeq>::end()
9203 {
9204  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
9205 }
9206 
9207 template<typename TSeq>
9208 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::begin() const
9209 {
9210 
9211  if (n_agents == 0)
9212  return agents.end();
9213 
9214  return agents.begin();
9215 
9216 }
9217 
9218 template<typename TSeq>
9219 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::const_iterator Entity<TSeq>::end() const
9220 {
9221  return agents.begin() + n_agents;
9222 }
9223 
9224 template<typename TSeq>
9225 inline Agent<TSeq> * Entity<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
9226 {
9227  if (n_agents <= i)
9228  throw std::logic_error("There are not that many agents in this entity.");
9229 
9230  return agents[i];
9231 }
9232 
9233 template<typename TSeq>
9234 inline int Entity<TSeq>::get_id() const noexcept
9235 {
9236  return id;
9237 }
9238 
9239 template<typename TSeq>
9240 inline const std::string & Entity<TSeq>::get_name() const noexcept
9241 {
9242  return entity_name;
9243 }
9244 
9245 template<typename TSeq>
9246 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_status(
9247  epiworld_fast_int init,
9248  epiworld_fast_int end
9249 )
9250 {
9251  status_init = init;
9252  status_post = end;
9253 }
9254 
9255 template<typename TSeq>
9256 inline void Entity<TSeq>::set_queue(
9257  epiworld_fast_int init,
9258  epiworld_fast_int end
9259 )
9260 {
9261  queue_init = init;
9262  queue_post = end;
9263 }
9264 
9265 template<typename TSeq>
9266 inline void Entity<TSeq>::get_status(
9267  epiworld_fast_int * init,
9268  epiworld_fast_int * post
9269 )
9270 {

9272  *init = status_init;
9273

9287 
9288  if (post != nullptr)

9307  Start of -include/epiworld/entities-bones.hpp-

9311 
9312 
9313 #ifndef EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
9314 #define EPIWORLD_ENTITIES_BONES_HPP
9315 
9316 template<typename TSeq>
9317 class Virus;
9318 
9319 template<typename TSeq>
9320 class Agent;
9321 
9322 
9328 template<typename TSeq>
9329 class Entities {
9330  friend class Entity<TSeq>;
9331  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
9332 private:
9333  std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > * dat;
9334  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_entities;
9335 
9336 public:
9337 
9338  Entities() = delete;
9339  Entities(Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.entities), n_entities(&p.n_entities) {};
9340 
9341  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator begin();
9342  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator end();
9343 
9344  Entity<TSeq>* & operator()(size_t i);
9345  Entity<TSeq>* & operator[](size_t i);
9346 
9347  size_t size() const noexcept;
9348 
9349 };
9350 
9351 template<typename TSeq>
9352 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::begin()
9353 {
9354 
9355  if (*n_entities == 0u)
9356  return dat->end();
9357 
9358  return dat->begin();
9359 }
9360 
9361 template<typename TSeq>
9362 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::iterator Entities<TSeq>::end()
9363 {
9364 
9365  return begin() + *n_entities;
9366 }
9367 
9368 template<typename TSeq>
9369 inline Entity<TSeq>* & Entities<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
9370 {
9371 
9372  if (i >= *n_entities)
9373  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
9374 
9375  return dat->operator[](i);
9376 
9377 }
9378 
9379 template<typename TSeq>
9380 inline Entity<TSeq>* & Entities<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
9381 {
9382 
9383  return dat->operator[](i);
9384 
9385 }
9386 
9387 template<typename TSeq>
9388 inline size_t Entities<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
9389 {
9390  return *n_entities;
9391 }
9392 
9398 template<typename TSeq>
9399 class Entities_const {
9400  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
9401  friend class Agent<TSeq>;
9402 private:
9403  const std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* > * dat;
9404  const epiworld_fast_uint * n_entities;
9405 
9406 public:
9407 
9408  Entities_const() = delete;
9409  Entities_const(const Agent<TSeq> & p) : dat(&p.entities), n_entities(&p.n_entities) {};
9410 
9411  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator begin();
9412  typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator end();
9413 
9414  const Entity<TSeq>* & operator()(size_t i);
9415  const Entity<TSeq>* & operator[](size_t i);
9416 
9417  size_t size() const noexcept;
9418 
9419 };
9420 
9421 template<typename TSeq>
9422 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::begin() {
9423 
9424  if (*n_entities == 0u)
9425  return dat->end();
9426 
9427  return dat->begin();
9428 }
9429 
9430 template<typename TSeq>
9431 inline typename std::vector< Entity<TSeq>* >::const_iterator Entities_const<TSeq>::end() {
9432 
9433  return begin() + *n_entities;
9434 }
9435 
9436 template<typename TSeq>
9437 inline const Entity<TSeq>* & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
9438 {
9439 
9440  if (i >= *n_entities)
9441  throw std::range_error("Entity index out of range.");
9442 
9443  return dat->operator[](i);
9444 
9445 }
9446 
9447 template<typename TSeq>
9448 inline const Entity<TSeq>* & Entities_const<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
9449 {
9450 
9451  return dat->operator[](i);
9452 
9453 }
9454 
9455 template<typename TSeq>
9456 inline size_t Entities_const<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
9457 {
9458  return *n_entities;
9459 }

9462 #endif

9467

9473 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9475 
9476  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-status.hpp-
9477 
9480 
9481 
9482 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATUS_HPP
9483 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_STATUS_HPP
9484 
9485 // template<typename TSeq>

9488 // template<typename TSeq>
9489 // class Agent;
9490 
9491 
9502 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9504 
9505  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
9506 
9509 
9510 
9511 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
9512 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_MEAT_VIRUS_SAMPLING
9513 
9518 namespace sampler {
9519 
9533 template<typename TSeq>
9534 inline std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_update_susceptible(
9535  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
9536  )
9537 {
9538 
9539 
9540  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
9541  {
9542 
9543  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
9544  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
9545  {
9546 
9547  if (p->get_n_viruses() > 0u)
9548  throw std::logic_error(
9549  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
9550  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
9551  std::string(" has ") + std::to_string(p->get_n_viruses()) +
9552  std::string(" viruses.")
9553  );
9554 
9555  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
9556  size_t nvariants_tmp = 0u;
9557  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
9558  {
9559 
9560  for (const VirusPtr<TSeq> & v : neighbor->get_viruses())
9561  {
9562 
9563  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9564  if (nvariants_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
9565  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
9566  // printf_epiworld("N used %d\n", v.use_count());
9567  #endif
9568 
9569  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
9570  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] =
9571  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
9572  v->get_prob_infecting() *
9573  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
9574  ;
9575 
9576  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
9577 
9578  }
9579  }
9580 
9581  // No virus to compute
9582  if (nvariants_tmp == 0u)
9583  return;
9584 
9585  // Running the roulette
9586  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
9587 
9588  if (which < 0)
9589  return;
9590 
9591  p->add_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which]);
9592 
9593  return;
9594  };
9595 
9596  return sampler;
9597 
9598  } else {
9599 
9600  // Making room for the query
9601  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
9602  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
9603 
9604  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
9605  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
9606 
9607  std::function<void(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> sampler =
9608  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
9609  {
9610 
9611  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
9612  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
9613  {
9614 
9615  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_status().size(), false);
9616  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
9617  {
9618  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
9619  throw std::logic_error(
9620  std::string("You are trying to exclude a status that is out of range: ") +
9621  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
9622  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
9623  std::string(" statuses in the model.")
9624  );
9625 
9626  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
9627 
9628  }
9629 
9630  }
9631 
9632  if (p->get_n_viruses() > 0u)
9633  throw std::logic_error(
9634  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
9635  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
9636  std::string(" has ") + std::to_string(p->get_n_viruses()) +
9637  std::string(" viruses.")
9638  );
9639 
9640  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
9641  size_t nvariants_tmp = 0u;
9642  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
9643  {
9644 
9645  // If the status is in the list, exclude it
9646  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_status()))
9647  continue;
9648 
9649  for (const VirusPtr<TSeq> & v : neighbor->get_viruses())
9650  {
9651 
9652  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9653  if (nvariants_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
9654  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
9655  // printf_epiworld("N used %d\n", v.use_count());
9656  #endif
9657 
9658  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
9659  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] =
9660  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
9661  v->get_prob_infecting() *
9662  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
9663  ;
9664 
9665  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
9666 
9667  }
9668  }
9669 
9670  // No virus to compute
9671  if (nvariants_tmp == 0u)
9672  return;
9673 
9674  // Running the roulette
9675  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
9676 
9677  if (which < 0)
9678  return;
9679 
9680  p->add_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which]);
9681 
9682  return;
9683 
9684  };
9685 
9686  return sampler;
9687 
9688  }
9689 
9690 }
9691 
9705 template<typename TSeq = int>
9706 inline std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(
9707  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude = {}
9708 )
9709 {
9710  if (exclude.size() == 0u)
9711  {
9712 
9713  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
9714  [](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
9715 
9716  if (p->get_n_viruses() > 0u)
9717  throw std::logic_error(
9718  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
9719  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
9720  std::string(" has ") + std::to_string(p->get_n_viruses()) +
9721  std::string(" viruses.")
9722  );
9723 
9724  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
9725  size_t nvariants_tmp = 0u;
9726  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
9727  {
9728 
9729  for (const VirusPtr<TSeq> & v : neighbor->get_viruses())
9730  {
9731 
9732  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9733  if (nvariants_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
9734  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
9735  // printf_epiworld("N used %d\n", v.use_count());
9736  #endif
9737 
9738  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
9739  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] =
9740  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
9741  v->get_prob_infecting() *
9742  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
9743  ;
9744 
9745  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
9746 
9747  }
9748  }
9749 
9750  // No virus to compute
9751  if (nvariants_tmp == 0u)
9752  return nullptr;
9753 
9754  // Running the roulette
9755  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
9756 
9757  if (which < 0)
9758  return nullptr;
9759 
9760  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
9761 
9762  };
9763 
9764  return res;
9765 
9766 
9767  } else {
9768 
9769  // Making room for the query
9770  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<bool>> exclude_agent_bool =
9771  std::make_shared<std::vector<bool>>(0);
9772 
9773  std::shared_ptr<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>> exclude_agent_bool_idx =
9774  std::make_shared<std::vector<epiworld_fast_uint>>(exclude);
9775 
9776 
9777  std::function<Virus<TSeq>*(Agent<TSeq>*,Model<TSeq>*)> res =
9778  [exclude_agent_bool,exclude_agent_bool_idx](Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) -> Virus<TSeq>* {
9779 
9780  // The first time we call it, we need to initialize the vector
9781  if (exclude_agent_bool->size() == 0u)
9782  {
9783 
9784  exclude_agent_bool->resize(m->get_status().size(), false);
9785  for (auto s : *exclude_agent_bool_idx)
9786  {
9787  if (s >= exclude_agent_bool->size())
9788  throw std::logic_error(
9789  std::string("You are trying to exclude a status that is out of range: ") +
9790  std::to_string(s) + std::string(". There are only ") +
9791  std::to_string(exclude_agent_bool->size()) +
9792  std::string(" statuses in the model.")
9793  );
9794 
9795  exclude_agent_bool->operator[](s) = true;
9796 
9797  }
9798 
9799  }
9800 
9801  if (p->get_n_viruses() > 0u)
9802  throw std::logic_error(
9803  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
9804  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
9805  std::string(" has ") + std::to_string(p->get_n_viruses()) +
9806  std::string(" viruses.")
9807  );
9808 
9809  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
9810  size_t nvariants_tmp = 0u;
9811  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
9812  {
9813 
9814  // If the status is in the list, exclude it
9815  if (exclude_agent_bool->operator[](neighbor->get_status()))
9816  continue;
9817 
9818  for (const VirusPtr<TSeq> & v : neighbor->get_viruses())
9819  {
9820 
9821  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9822  if (nvariants_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
9823  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
9824  // printf_epiworld("N used %d\n", v.use_count());
9825  #endif
9826 
9827  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
9828  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] =
9829  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
9830  v->get_prob_infecting() *
9831  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
9832  ;
9833 
9834  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
9835 
9836  }
9837  }
9838 
9839  // No virus to compute
9840  if (nvariants_tmp == 0u)
9841  return nullptr;
9842 
9843  // Running the roulette
9844  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
9845 
9846  if (which < 0)
9847  return nullptr;
9848 
9849  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
9850 
9851  };
9852 
9853  return res;
9854 
9855  }
9856 
9857 }
9858 
9875 template<typename TSeq = int>
9876 inline Virus<TSeq> * sample_virus_single(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m)
9877 {
9878 
9879  if (p->get_n_viruses() > 0u)
9880  throw std::logic_error(
9881  std::string("Using the -default_update_susceptible- on agents WITH viruses makes no sense! ") +
9882  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) +
9883  std::string(" has ") + std::to_string(p->get_n_viruses()) +
9884  std::string(" viruses.")
9885  );
9886 
9887  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
9888  size_t nvariants_tmp = 0u;
9889  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
9890  {
9891 
9892  for (const VirusPtr<TSeq> & v : neighbor->get_viruses())
9893  {
9894 
9895  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
9896  if (nvariants_tmp >= m->array_virus_tmp.size())
9897  throw std::logic_error("Trying to add an extra element to a temporal array outside of the range.");
9898  // printf_epiworld("N used %d\n", v.use_count());
9899  #endif
9900 
9901  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
9902  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] =
9903  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
9904  v->get_prob_infecting() *
9905  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
9906  ;
9907 
9908  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
9909 
9910  }
9911  }
9912 
9913  // No virus to compute
9914  if (nvariants_tmp == 0u)
9915  return nullptr;
9916 
9917  // Running the roulette
9918  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
9919 
9920  if (which < 0)
9921  return nullptr;
9922 
9923  return m->array_virus_tmp[which];
9924 
9925 }
9926 
9927 }
9928 
9929 #endif
9930 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
9932 
9933  End of -include/epiworld//agent-meat-virus-sampling.hpp-
9934 
9937 
9938 
9939 
9940 
9941 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9942 inline void default_update_susceptible(
9943  Agent<TSeq> * p,
9944  Model<TSeq> * m
9945  )
9946 {
9947 
9948  Virus<TSeq> * virus = sampler::sample_virus_single<TSeq>(p, m);
9949 
9950  if (virus == nullptr)
9951  return;
9952 
9953  p->add_virus(*virus);
9954 
9955  return;
9956 
9957 }
9958 
9959 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
9960 inline void default_update_exposed(Agent<TSeq> * p, Model<TSeq> * m) {
9961 
9962  if (p->get_n_viruses() == 0u)
9963  throw std::logic_error(
9964  std::string("Using the -default_update_exposed- on agents WITHOUT viruses makes no sense! ") +
9965  std::string("Agent id ") + std::to_string(p->get_id()) + std::string(" has no virus registered.")
9966  );
9967 
9968  // Odd: Die, Even: Recover
9969  epiworld_fast_uint n_events = 0u;
9970  for (const auto & v : p->get_viruses())
9971  {
9972 
9973  // Die
9974  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
9975  v->get_prob_death() * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v));
9976 
9977  // Recover
9978  m->array_double_tmp[n_events++] =
9979  1.0 - (1.0 - v->get_prob_recovery()) * (1.0 - p->get_recovery_enhancer(v));
9980 
9981  }
9982 
9983  if (n_events == 0u)
9984  return;
9985 
9986  // Running the roulette
9987  int which = roulette(n_events, m);
9988 
9989  if (which < 0)
9990  return;
9991 
9992  // Which roulette happen?
9993  if ((which % 2) == 0) // If odd
9994  {
9995 
9996  size_t which_v = std::ceil(which / 2);
9997  p->rm_agent_by_virus(which_v);
9998 
9999  } else {
10000 
10001  size_t which_v = std::floor(which / 2);
10002  p->rm_virus(which_v);
10003 
10004  }
10005 
10006  return ;
10007 
10008 }
10009 
10010 #endif
10011 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10013 
10014  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat-status.hpp-
10015 
10018 
10019 
10020 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10022 
10023  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-bones.hpp-
10024 
10027 
10028 
10029 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_BONES_HPP
10030 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_BONES_HPP
10031 
10032 template<typename TSeq>
10033 class Model;
10034 
10035 template<typename TSeq>
10036 class Virus;
10037 
10038 template<typename TSeq>
10039 class Viruses;
10040 
10041 template<typename TSeq>
10042 class Viruses_const;
10043 
10044 template<typename TSeq>
10045 class Tool;
10046 
10047 template<typename TSeq>
10048 class Tools;
10049 
10050 template<typename TSeq>
10051 class Tools_const;
10052 
10053 template<typename TSeq>
10054 class Queue;
10055 
10056 template<typename TSeq>
10057 struct Action;
10058 
10059 template<typename TSeq>
10060 class Entity;
10061 
10062 template<typename TSeq>
10063 class Entities;
10064 
10065 template<typename TSeq>
10066 inline void default_add_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10067 
10068 template<typename TSeq>
10069 inline void default_add_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10070 
10071 template<typename TSeq>
10072 inline void default_add_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10073 
10074 template<typename TSeq>
10075 inline void default_rm_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10076 
10077 template<typename TSeq>
10078 inline void default_rm_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10079 
10080 template<typename TSeq>
10081 inline void default_rm_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10082

10084 
10090 template<typename TSeq>
10091 class Agent {
10092  friend class Model<TSeq>;
10093  friend class Virus<TSeq>;
10094  friend class Viruses<TSeq>;
10095  friend class Viruses_const<TSeq>;
10096  friend class Tool<TSeq>;
10097  friend class Tools<TSeq>;
10098  friend class Tools_const<TSeq>;
10099  friend class Queue<TSeq>;
10100  friend class Entities<TSeq>;
10101  friend class AgentsSample<TSeq>;
10102  friend void default_add_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10103  friend void default_add_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10104  friend void default_add_entity<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10105  friend void default_rm_virus<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10106  friend void default_rm_tool<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10107  friend void default_rm_entity<TSeq>(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m);
10108 private:
10109  Model<TSeq> * model;
10110 
10111  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > neighbors;
10112  std::vector< Entity<TSeq> * > entities;
10113  std::vector< size_t > entities_locations;
10114  epiworld_fast_uint n_entities = 0u;
10115 
10116  epiworld_fast_uint status = 0u;
10117  epiworld_fast_uint status_prev = 0u; ///< For accounting, if need to undo a change.
10118 
10119  int status_last_changed = -1; ///< Last time the agent was updated.
10120  int id = -1;
10121 
10122  bool in_queue = false;
10123  // size_t actions_queued = 0u;
10124 
10125  std::vector< VirusPtr<TSeq> > viruses;
10126  epiworld_fast_uint n_viruses = 0u;
10127  epiworld_fast_uint n_exposures = 0u;
10128 
10129  std::vector< ToolPtr<TSeq> > tools;
10130  epiworld_fast_uint n_tools = 0u;
10131 
10132  ActionFun<TSeq> add_virus_ = default_add_virus<TSeq>;
10133  ActionFun<TSeq> add_tool_ = default_add_tool<TSeq>;
10134  ActionFun<TSeq> add_entity_ = default_add_entity<TSeq>;
10135 
10136  ActionFun<TSeq> rm_virus_ = default_rm_virus<TSeq>;
10137  ActionFun<TSeq> rm_tool_ = default_rm_tool<TSeq>;
10138  ActionFun<TSeq> rm_entity_ = default_rm_entity<TSeq>;
10139 
10140  epiworld_fast_uint action_counter = 0u;
10141 
10142  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > sampled_agents;
10143  size_t sampled_agents_n = 0u;
10144  std::vector< size_t > sampled_agents_left;
10145  size_t sampled_agents_left_n = 0u;
10146  int date_last_build_sample = -99;
10147 
10148 public:
10149 
10150  Agent();
10151  Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p);
10152 
10164  void add_tool(
10165  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
10166  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10167  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10168  );
10169 
10170  void add_tool(
10171  Tool<TSeq> tool,
10172  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10173  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10174  );
10175 
10176  void add_virus(
10177  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
10178  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10179  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10180  );
10181 
10182  void add_virus(
10183  Virus<TSeq> virus,
10184  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10185  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10186  );
10187 
10188  void add_entity(
10189  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
10190  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10191  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10192  );
10193 
10194  void rm_tool(
10195  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
10196  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10197  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10198  );
10199 
10200  void rm_tool(
10201  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
10202  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10203  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10204  );
10205 
10206  void rm_virus(
10207  epiworld_fast_uint virus_idx,
10208  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10209  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10210  );
10211 
10212  void rm_virus(
10213  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus,
10214  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10215  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10216  );
10217 
10218  void rm_entity(
10219  epiworld_fast_uint entity_idx,
10220  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10221  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10222  );
10223 
10224  void rm_entity(
10225  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
10226  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10227  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10228  );
10229 
10230  void rm_agent_by_virus(
10231  epiworld_fast_uint virus_idx,
10232  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10233  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10234  ); ///< Agent removed by virus
10235 
10236  void rm_agent_by_virus(
10237  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus,
10238  epiworld_fast_int status_new = -99,
10239  epiworld_fast_int queue = -99
10240  ); ///< Agent removed by virus
10242 
10250  epiworld_double get_susceptibility_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
10251  epiworld_double get_transmission_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
10252  epiworld_double get_recovery_enhancer(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
10253  epiworld_double get_death_reduction(VirusPtr<TSeq> v);
10255 
10256  int get_id() const; ///< Id of the individual
10257 
10258  std::mt19937 * get_rand_endgine();
10259  Model<TSeq> * get_model();
10260 
10261  VirusPtr<TSeq> & get_virus(int i);
10262  Viruses<TSeq> get_viruses();
10263  const Viruses_const<TSeq> get_viruses() const;
10264  size_t get_n_viruses() const noexcept;
10265 
10266  ToolPtr<TSeq> & get_tool(int i);
10267  Tools<TSeq> get_tools();
10268  const Tools_const<TSeq> get_tools() const;
10269  size_t get_n_tools() const noexcept;
10270 
10271  void mutate_variant();
10272  void add_neighbor(
10273  Agent<TSeq> * p,
10274  bool check_source = true,
10275  bool check_target = true
10276  );
10277 
10278  std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * > & get_neighbors();
10279 
10280  void change_status(
10281  epiworld_fast_uint new_status,
10282  epiworld_fast_int queue = 0
10283  );
10284 
10285  const epiworld_fast_uint & get_status() const;
10286 
10287  void reset();
10288 
10289  bool has_tool(epiworld_fast_uint t) const;
10290  bool has_tool(std::string name) const;
10291  bool has_virus(epiworld_fast_uint t) const;
10292  bool has_virus(std::string name) const;
10293 
10294  void print(bool compressed = false) const;
10295 
10312  double & operator()(size_t j);
10313  double & operator[](size_t j);
10315 
10316  Entities<TSeq> get_entities();
10317  const Entities_const<TSeq> get_entities() const;
10318 
10319 };
10320 
10321 
10322 
10323 #endif
10324 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10326 
10327  End of -include/epiworld/agent-bones.hpp-
10328 
10331 
10332 
10333 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10335 
10336  Start of -include/epiworld/agent-meat.hpp-
10337 
10340 
10341 
10342 #ifndef EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_HPP
10343 #define EPIWORLD_PERSON_MEAT_HPP
10344 
10345 // template<typename Ta>
10346 // inline bool IN(Ta & a, std::vector< Ta > & b);
10347 
10348 #define CHECK_COALESCE_(proposed_, virus_tool_, alt_) \
10349  if (static_cast<int>(proposed_) == -99) {\
10350  if (static_cast<int>(virus_tool_) == -99) \
10351  (proposed_) = (alt_);\
10352  else (proposed_) = (virus_tool_);}
10353 
10354 // To large to add directly here
10355 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10357 
10358  Start of -include/epiworld//agent-actions-meat.hpp-
10359 
10362 
10363 
10364 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENT_ACTIONS_MEAT_HPP
10365 #define EPIWORLD_AGENT_ACTIONS_MEAT_HPP
10366 
10367 template<typename TSeq>
10368 inline void default_add_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10369 {
10370 
10371  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10372  VirusPtr<TSeq> v = a.virus;
10373 
10374  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, v->status_init, p->get_status())
10375  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, v->queue_init, 1)
10376 
10377  // Has a agent? If so, we need to register the transmission
10378  if (v->get_agent())
10379  {
10380 
10381  // ... only if not the same agent
10382  if (v->get_agent()->get_id() != p->get_id())
10383  m->get_db().record_transmission(
10384  v->get_agent()->get_id(),
10385  p->get_id(),
10386  v->get_id(),
10387  v->get_date()
10388  );
10389 
10390  }
10391 
10392  // Update virus accounting
10393  p->n_viruses++;
10394  size_t n_viruses = p->n_viruses;
10395 
10396  if (n_viruses <= p->viruses.size())
10397  p->viruses[n_viruses - 1] = std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(*v);
10398  else
10399  p->viruses.push_back(std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(*v));
10400 
10401  n_viruses--;
10402 
10403  // Notice that both agent and date can be changed in this case
10404  // as only the sequence is a shared_ptr itself.
10405  p->viruses[n_viruses]->set_agent(p, n_viruses);
10406  p->viruses[n_viruses]->set_date(m->today());
10407  p->viruses[n_viruses]->agent_exposure_number = ++p->n_exposures;
10408 
10409  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
10410  m->get_db().today_variant.at(v->get_id()).at(p->status)++;
10411  #else
10412  m->get_db().today_variant[v->get_id()][p->status]++;
10413  #endif
10414 
10415 }
10416 
10417 template<typename TSeq>
10418 inline void default_add_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10419 {
10420 
10421  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10422  ToolPtr<TSeq> t = a.tool;
10423 
10424  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, t->status_init, p->get_status())
10425  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, t->queue_init, QueueValues::NoOne)
10426 
10427  // Update tool accounting
10428  p->n_tools++;
10429  size_t n_tools = p->n_tools;
10430 
10431  if (n_tools <= p->tools.size())
10432  p->tools[n_tools - 1] = std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(*t);
10433  else
10434  p->tools.push_back(std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(*t));
10435 
10436  n_tools--;
10437 
10438  p->tools[n_tools]->set_date(m->today());
10439  p->tools[n_tools]->set_agent(p, n_tools);
10440 
10441  m->get_db().today_tool[t->get_id()][p->status]++;
10442 
10443 }
10444 
10445 template<typename TSeq>
10446 inline void default_rm_virus(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10447 {
10448 
10449  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10450  VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = a.agent->viruses[a.virus->agent_idx];
10451 
10452  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, v->status_post, p->get_status())
10453  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, v->queue_post, -QueueValues::Everyone)
10454 
10455  if (--p->n_viruses > 0)
10456  {
10457  // The new virus will change positions
10458  p->viruses[p->n_viruses]->agent_idx = v->agent_idx;
10459  std::swap(v, p->viruses[p->n_viruses]);
10460  }
10461 
10462  // Calling the virus action over the removed virus
10463  v->post_recovery();
10464 
10465  return;
10466 
10467 }
10468 
10469 template<typename TSeq>
10470 inline void default_rm_tool(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10471 {
10472 
10473  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10474  ToolPtr<TSeq> & t = a.agent->tools[a.tool->agent_idx];
10475 
10476  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, t->status_post, p->get_status())
10477  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, t->queue_post, QueueValues::NoOne)
10478 
10479  if (--p->n_tools > 0)
10480  {
10481  p->tools[p->n_tools]->agent_idx = t->agent_idx;
10482  std::swap(t, p->tools[p->n_tools - 1]);
10483  }
10484 
10485  return;
10486 
10487 }
10488 
10489 template<typename TSeq>
10490 inline void default_add_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10491 {
10492 
10493  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10494  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
10495 
10496  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, e->status_post, p->get_status())
10497  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, e->queue_post, QueueValues::NoOne)
10498 
10499  // Adding the entity to the agent
10500  if (++p->n_entities <= p->entities.size())
10501  {
10502 
10503  p->entities[p->n_entities - 1] = e;
10504  p->entities_locations[p->n_entities - 1] = e->n_agents;
10505 
10506  } else
10507  {
10508  p->entities.push_back(e);
10509  p->entities_locations.push_back(e->n_agents);
10510  }
10511 
10512  // Adding the agent to the entity
10513  // Adding the entity to the agent
10514  if (++e->n_agents <= e->agents.size())
10515  {
10516 
10517  e->agents[e->n_agents - 1] = p;
10518  // Adjusted by '-1' since the list of entities in the agent just grew.
10519  e->agents_location[e->n_agents - 1] = p->n_entities - 1;
10520 
10521  } else
10522  {
10523  e->agents.push_back(p);
10524  e->agents_location.push_back(p->n_entities - 1);
10525  }
10526 
10527  // Today was the last modification
10528  e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
10529 
10530 }
10531 
10532 template<typename TSeq>
10533 inline void default_rm_entity(Action<TSeq> & a, Model<TSeq> * m)
10534 {
10535 
10536  Agent<TSeq> * p = a.agent;
10537  Entity<TSeq> * e = a.entity;
10538  size_t idx_agent_in_entity = a.idx_agent;
10539  size_t idx_entity_in_agent = a.idx_object;
10540 
10541  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.new_status, e->status_post, p->get_status())
10542  CHECK_COALESCE_(a.queue, e->queue_post, QueueValues::NoOne)
10543 
10544  if (--p->n_entities > 0)
10545  {
10546 
10547  // When we move the end entity to the new location, the
10548  // moved entity needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
10549  // entity will now be located in the agent
10550  size_t agent_in_end_entity = p->entities_locations[p->n_entities];
10551  Entity<TSeq> * moved_entity = p->entities[p->n_entities];
10552 
10553  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
10554  moved_entity->agents_location[agent_in_end_entity] = idx_entity_in_agent;
10555 
10556  // We now make the swap
10557  std::swap(
10558  p->entities[p->n_entities],
10559  p->entities[idx_entity_in_agent]
10560  );
10561 
10562  }
10563 
10564  if (--e->n_agents > 0)
10565  {
10566 
10567  // When we move the end entity to the new location, the
10568  // moved entity needs to reflect the change, i.e., where the
10569  // entity will now be located in the agent
10570  size_t entity_in_end_agent = e->agents_location[e->n_agents];
10571  Agent<TSeq> * moved_agent = e->agents[e->n_agents];
10572 
10573  // The end entity will be located where the removed was
10574  moved_agent->entities_locations[entity_in_end_agent] = idx_agent_in_entity;
10575 
10576  // We now make the swap
10577  std::swap(
10578  e->agents[e->n_agents],
10579  e->agents[idx_agent_in_entity]
10580  );
10581 
10582  }
10583 
10584  // Setting the date of the last removal
10585  e->date_last_add_or_remove = m->today();
10586 
10587  return;
10588 
10589 }
10590 #endif
10591 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
10593 
10594  End of -include/epiworld//agent-actions-meat.hpp-
10595 
10598 
10599 
10600 
10601 template<typename TSeq>
10602 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent()
10603 {
10604 
10605 }
10606 
10607 template<typename TSeq>
10608 inline Agent<TSeq>::Agent(const Agent<TSeq> & p)
10609 {
10610 
10611  model = p.model;
10612 
10613  // We can't do anything with the neighbors
10614  neighbors.reserve(p.neighbors.size());
10615 
10616  status = p.status;
10617  id = p.id;
10618 
10619  in_queue = p.in_queue;
10620 
10621  // Dealing with the virus
10622  viruses.reserve(p.get_n_viruses());
10623  const auto & viruses_ = p.get_viruses();
10624  for (const auto & v : viruses_)
10625  {
10626  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
10627  // the virus code
10628  viruses.push_back(std::make_shared<Virus<TSeq>>(*v));
10629  viruses[n_viruses++]->agent = this;
10630 
10631  }
10632 
10633  n_viruses = p.n_viruses;
10634 
10635  tools.reserve(p.get_n_tools());
10636  const auto & tools_ = p.get_tools();
10637  for (const auto & t : tools_)
10638  {
10639  // Will create a copy of the virus, with the exeption of
10640  // the virus code
10641  tools.push_back(std::make_shared<Tool<TSeq>>(*t));
10642 
10643  }
10644 
10645  n_tools = p.n_tools;
10646 
10647  add_virus_ = p.add_virus_;
10648  add_tool_ = p.add_tool_;
10649  rm_virus_ = p.rm_virus_;
10650  rm_tool_ = p.rm_tool_;
10651 
10652 }
10653 
10654 template<typename TSeq>
10655 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
10656  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool,
10657  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10658  epiworld_fast_int queue
10659 ) {
10660 
10661  // Checking the virus exists
10662  if (tool->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_tools()))
10663  throw std::range_error("The tool with id: " + std::to_string(tool->get_id()) +
10664  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_tools()) +
10665  " included in the model.");
10666 
10667 
10668  model->actions_add(
10669  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, status_new, queue, add_tool_, -1, -1
10670  );
10671 
10672 }
10673 
10674 template<typename TSeq>
10675 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_tool(
10676  Tool<TSeq> tool,
10677  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10678  epiworld_fast_int queue
10679 )
10680 {
10681  ToolPtr<TSeq> tool_ptr = std::make_shared< Tool<TSeq> >(tool);
10682  add_tool(tool_ptr, status_new, queue);
10683 }
10684 
10685 template<typename TSeq>
10686 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_virus(
10687  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus,
10688  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10689  epiworld_fast_int queue
10690 )
10691 {
10692 
10693  // Checking the virus exists
10694  if (virus->get_id() >= static_cast<int>(model->get_db().get_n_variants()))
10695  throw std::range_error("The virus with id: " + std::to_string(virus->get_id()) +
10696  " has not been registered. There are only " + std::to_string(model->get_n_variants()) +
10697  " included in the model.");
10698 
10699  model->actions_add(
10700  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr, status_new, queue, add_virus_, -1, -1
10701  );
10702 
10703 }
10704 
10705 template<typename TSeq>
10706 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_virus(
10707  Virus<TSeq> virus,
10708  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10709  epiworld_fast_int queue
10710 )
10711 {
10712  VirusPtr<TSeq> virus_ptr = std::make_shared< Virus<TSeq> >(virus);
10713  add_virus(virus_ptr, status_new, queue);
10714 }
10715 
10716 template<typename TSeq>
10717 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_entity(
10718  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
10719  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10720  epiworld_fast_int queue
10721 )
10722 {
10723 
10724  model->actions_add(
10725  this, nullptr, nullptr, &entity, status_new, queue, add_entity_, -1, -1
10726  );
10727 
10728 }
10729 
10730 template<typename TSeq>
10731 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
10732  epiworld_fast_uint tool_idx,
10733  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10734  epiworld_fast_int queue
10735 )
10736 {
10737 
10738  if (tool_idx >= n_tools)
10739  throw std::range_error(
10740  "The Tool you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
10741  std::to_string(n_tools) + " tools."
10742  );
10743 
10744  model->actions_add(
10745  this, nullptr, tools[tool_idx], nullptr, status_new, queue, rm_tool_, -1, -1
10746  );
10747 
10748 }
10749 
10750 template<typename TSeq>
10751 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_tool(
10752  ToolPtr<TSeq> & tool,
10753  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10754  epiworld_fast_int queue
10755 )
10756 {
10757 
10758  if (tool->agent != this)
10759  throw std::logic_error("Cannot remove a virus from another agent!");
10760 
10761  model->actions_add(
10762  this, nullptr, tool, nullptr, status_new, queue, rm_tool_, -1, -1
10763  );
10764 
10765 }
10766 
10767 template<typename TSeq>
10768 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_virus(
10769  epiworld_fast_uint virus_idx,
10770  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10771  epiworld_fast_int queue
10772 )
10773 {
10774  if (virus_idx >= n_viruses)
10775  throw std::range_error(
10776  "The Virus you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
10777  std::to_string(n_viruses) + " viruses."
10778  );
10779  else if (n_viruses == 0u)
10780  throw std::logic_error(
10781  "There is no virus to remove here!"
10782  );
10783 
10784 
10785  model->actions_add(
10786  this, viruses[virus_idx], nullptr, nullptr, status_new, queue,
10787  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
10788  );
10789 
10790 }
10791 
10792 template<typename TSeq>
10793 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_virus(
10794  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus,
10795  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10796  epiworld_fast_int queue
10797 )
10798 {
10799 
10800  if (virus->agent != this)
10801  throw std::logic_error("Cannot remove a virus from another agent!");
10802 
10803  model->actions_add(
10804  this, virus, nullptr, nullptr, status_new, queue,
10805  default_rm_virus<TSeq>, -1, -1
10806  );
10807 
10808 
10809 }
10810 
10811 template<typename TSeq>
10812 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
10813  epiworld_fast_uint entity_idx,
10814  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10815  epiworld_fast_int queue
10816 )
10817 {
10818 
10819  if (entity_idx >= n_entities)
10820  throw std::range_error(
10821  "The Entity you want to remove is out of range. This Agent only has " +
10822  std::to_string(n_entities) + " entitites."
10823  );
10824  else if (n_entities == 0u)
10825  throw std::logic_error(
10826  "There is entity to remove here!"
10827  );
10828 
10829  model->actions_add(
10830  this, nullptr, nullptr, entities[entity_idx], status_new, queue,
10831  default_rm_entity, entities_locations[entity_idx], entity_idx
10832  );
10833 }
10834 
10835 template<typename TSeq>
10836 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_entity(
10837  Entity<TSeq> & entity,
10838  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10839  epiworld_fast_int queue
10840 )
10841 {
10842 
10843  // Looking for entity location in the agent
10844  int entity_idx = -1;
10845  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_entities; ++i)
10846  {
10847  if (entities[i]->get_id() == entity->get_id())
10848  entity_idx = i;
10849  }
10850 
10851  if (entity_idx == -1)
10852  throw std::logic_error(
10853  "The agent " + std::to_string(id) + " is not associated with entity \"" +
10854  entity.get_name() + "\"."
10855  );
10856 
10857 
10858  model->actions_add(
10859  this, nullptr, nullptr, entities[entity_idx], status_new, queue,
10860  default_rm_entity, entities_locations[entity_idx], entity_idx
10861  );
10862 }
10863 
10864 template<typename TSeq>
10865 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_agent_by_virus(
10866  epiworld_fast_uint virus_idx,
10867  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10868  epiworld_fast_int queue
10869 )
10870 {
10871 
10872  if (status_new == -99)
10873  status_new = status;
10874 
10875  if (virus_idx >= n_viruses)
10876  throw std::range_error(
10877  std::string("The virus trying to remove the agent is out of range. ") +
10878  std::string("This agent has only ") + std::to_string(n_viruses) +
10879  std::string(" and you are trying to remove virus # ") +
10880  std::to_string(virus_idx) + std::string(".")
10881  );
10882 
10883  // Removing viruses
10884  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n_viruses; ++i)
10885  {
10886  if (i != virus_idx)
10887  rm_virus(i);
10888  }
10889 
10890  // Changing status to new_status
10891  VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = viruses[virus_idx];
10892  epiworld_fast_int dead_status, dead_queue;
10893  v->get_status(nullptr, nullptr, &dead_status);
10894  v->get_queue(nullptr, nullptr, &dead_queue);
10895 
10896  if (queue != -99)
10897  dead_queue = queue;
10898 
10899  change_status(
10900  // Either preserve the current status or apply a new one
10901  (dead_status < 0) ? status : static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(dead_status),
10902 
10903  // By default, it will be removed from the queue... unless the user
10904  // says the contrary!
10905  (dead_queue == -99) ? QueueValues::NoOne : dead_queue
10906  );
10907 
10908 }
10909 
10910 template<typename TSeq>
10911 inline void Agent<TSeq>::rm_agent_by_virus(
10912  VirusPtr<TSeq> & virus,
10913  epiworld_fast_int status_new,
10914  epiworld_fast_int queue
10915 )
10916 {
10917 
10918  if (virus->get_agent() == nullptr)
10919  throw std::logic_error("The virus trying to remove the agent has no host.");
10920 
10921  if (virus->get_agent()->id != id)
10922  throw std::logic_error("Viruses can only remove their hosts'.");
10923 
10924  rm_agent_by_virus(
10925  virus->agent_idx,
10926  status_new,
10927  queue
10928  );
10929 
10930 }
10931 
10932 template<typename TSeq>
10933 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_susceptibility_reduction(
10934  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
10935 ) {
10936 
10937  return model->susceptibility_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
10938 }
10939 
10940 template<typename TSeq>
10941 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_transmission_reduction(
10942  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
10943 ) {
10944  return model->transmission_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
10945 }
10946

10948 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_recovery_enhancer(
10949  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
10950 ) {
10951  return model->recovery_enhancer_mixer(this, v, model);
10952 }
10953

10955 inline epiworld_double Agent<TSeq>::get_death_reduction(
10956  VirusPtr<TSeq> v
10957 ) {
10958  return model->death_reduction_mixer(this, v, model);
10959 }

11020 {

11023 
11024 template<typename TSeq>
11025 inline void Agent<TSeq>::mutate_variant()
11026 {
11027 
11028  for (auto & v : viruses)
11029  v->mutate();
11030 
11031 }
11032 
11033 template<typename TSeq>
11034 inline void Agent<TSeq>::add_neighbor(
11035  Agent<TSeq> * p,
11036  bool check_source,
11037  bool check_target
11038 ) {
11039  // Can we find the neighbor?
11040  if (check_source)
11041  {
11042 
11043  bool found = false;
11044  for (auto & n: neighbors)
11045  if (n->get_id() == p->get_id())
11046  {
11047  found = true;
11048  break;
11049  }
11050 
11051  if (!found)
11052  neighbors.push_back(p);
11053 
11054  } else
11055  neighbors.push_back(p);
11056 
11057  if (check_target)
11058  {
11059 
11060  bool found = false;
11061  for (auto & n: p->neighbors)
11062  if (n->get_id() == id)
11063  {
11064  found = true;
11065  break;
11066  }
11067 
11068  if (!found)
11069  p->neighbors.push_back(this);
11070 
11071  } else
11072  p->neighbors.push_back(this);
11073 
11074 
11075 }
11076 
11077 template<typename TSeq>
11078 inline std::vector< Agent<TSeq> *> & Agent<TSeq>::get_neighbors()
11079 {
11080  return neighbors;
11081 }
11082 
11083 template<typename TSeq>
11084 inline void Agent<TSeq>::change_status(
11085  epiworld_fast_uint new_status,
11086  epiworld_fast_int queue
11087  )
11088 {
11089 
11090  model->actions_add(
11091  this, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, new_status, queue, nullptr, -1, -1
11092  );
11093 
11094  return;
11095 
11096 }
11097 
11098 template<typename TSeq>
11099 inline const epiworld_fast_uint & Agent<TSeq>::get_status() const {
11100  return status;
11101 }
11102 
11103 template<typename TSeq>
11104 inline void Agent<TSeq>::reset()
11105 {
11106 
11107  this->viruses.clear();
11108  n_viruses = 0u;
11109 
11110  this->tools.clear();
11111  n_tools = 0u;
11112 
11113  this->status = 0u;
11114 
11115 }
11116 
11117 template<typename TSeq>
11118 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
11119 {
11120 
11121  for (auto & tool : tools)
11122  if (tool->get_id() == t)
11123  return true;
11124 
11125  return false;
11126 
11127 }
11128 
11129 template<typename TSeq>
11130 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_tool(std::string name) const
11131 {
11132 
11133  for (auto & tool : tools)
11134  if (tool->get_name() == name)
11135  return true;
11136 
11137  return false;
11138 
11139 }
11140 
11141 template<typename TSeq>
11142 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(epiworld_fast_uint t) const
11143 {
11144  for (auto & v : viruses)
11145  if (v->get_id() == t)
11146  return true;
11147 
11148  return false;
11149 }
11150 
11151 template<typename TSeq>
11152 inline bool Agent<TSeq>::has_virus(std::string name) const
11153 {
11154 
11155  for (auto & v : viruses)
11156  if (v->get_name() == name)
11157  return true;
11158 
11159  return false;
11160 
11161 }
11162 
11163 template<typename TSeq>
11164 inline void Agent<TSeq>::print(bool compressed) const
11165 {
11166 
11167  if (compressed)
11168  {
11169  printf_epiworld(
11170  "Agent: %i, Status: %s (%lu), Nvirus: %lu, NTools: %lu, NNeigh: %lu\n",
11171  id, model->status_labels[status].c_str(), status, n_viruses, n_tools, neighbors.size()
11172  );
11173  }
11174  else {
11175 
11176  printf_epiworld("Information about agent id %i\n", this->id);
11177  printf_epiworld(" Status : %s (%lu)\n", model->status_labels[status].c_str(), status);
11178  printf_epiworld(" Virus count : %lu\n", n_viruses);
11179  printf_epiworld(" Tool count : %lu\n", n_tools);
11180  printf_epiworld(" Neigh. count : %lu\n", neighbors.size());
11181 
11182  }
11183 
11184  return;
11185 
11186 }
11187 
11188 template<typename TSeq>
11189 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator()(size_t j)
11190 {
11191 
11192  if (model->population_data_n_features <= j)
11193  throw std::logic_error("The requested feature of the agent is out of range.");
11194 
11195  return *(model->population_data + j * model->size() + id);
11196 
11197 }
11198 
11199 template<typename TSeq>
11200 inline double & Agent<TSeq>::operator[](size_t j)
11201 {
11202  return *(model->population_data + j * model->size() + id);
11203 }
11204

11207 {
