11220 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11222 
11223  End of -include/epiworld/agent-meat.hpp-
11224 
11227 
11228 
11229 
11230 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11232 
11233  Start of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
11234 
11237 
11238 
11239 #ifndef EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
11240 #define EPIWORLD_AGENTS_BONES_HPP
11241 
11242 class SAMPLETYPE {
11243 public:
11244  static const int MODEL = 0;
11245  static const int ENTITY = 1;
11246  static const int AGENT = 2;
11247 };
11248 
11249 // template<typename TSeq>
11250 // class Agent;
11251 
11252 // template<typename TSeq>
11253 // class Model;
11254 
11255 // template<typename TSeq>
11256 // class Entity;
11257 
11265 template<typename TSeq>
11266 class AgentsSample {
11267 private:
11268 
11269  size_t sample_size = 0u;
11270 
11271  std::vector< Agent<TSeq>* > * agents = nullptr; ///< Pointer to sample of agents
11272  size_t * agents_n = nullptr; ///< Size of sample of agents
11273 
11274  std::vector< size_t > * agents_left = nullptr; ///< Pointer to agents left (iota)
11275  size_t * agents_left_n = nullptr; ///< Size of agents left
11276 
11277  Model<TSeq> * model = nullptr; ///< Extracts runif() and (if the case) population.
11278  Entity<TSeq> * entity = nullptr; ///
11279  Agent<TSeq> * agent = nullptr;
11280 
11281  int sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
11282 
11283  void sample_n(size_t n); ///< Backbone function for sampling
11284 
11285 
11286 public:
11287 
11288  // Not available (for now)
11289  AgentsSample() = delete; ///< Default constructor
11290  AgentsSample(const AgentsSample<TSeq> & a) = delete; ///< Copy constructor
11291  AgentsSample(AgentsSample<TSeq> && a) = delete; ///< Move constructor
11292 
11293  AgentsSample(Model<TSeq> & model_, size_t n, bool truncate = false);
11294  AgentsSample(Entity<TSeq> & entity_, size_t n, bool truncate = false);
11295  AgentsSample(Agent<TSeq> & agent_, size_t n, bool truncate = false);
11296 
11297  ~AgentsSample();
11298 
11299  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator begin();
11300  typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator end();
11301 
11302  Agent<TSeq> * operator[](size_t n);
11303  Agent<TSeq> * operator()(size_t n);
11304  size_t size() const noexcept;
11305 
11306 };
11307 
11308 template<typename TSeq>
11309 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(Model<TSeq> & model_, size_t n, bool truncate) {
11310 
11311  if (truncate)
11312  {
11313 
11314  if (n > model_.size())
11315  n = model_.size();
11316 
11317  } else if (n > model_.size())
11318  throw std::logic_error(
11319  "There are only " + std::to_string(model_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
11320  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
11321 
11322  sample_size = n;
11323  model = &model_;
11324  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::MODEL;
11325 
11326  agents = &model_.sampled_population;
11327  agents_n = &model_.sampled_population_n;
11328 
11329  agents_left = &model_.population_left;
11330  agents_left_n = &model_.population_left_n;
11331 
11332  sample_n(n);
11333 
11334  return;
11335 
11336 }
11337 
11338 template<typename TSeq>
11339 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(Entity<TSeq> & entity_, size_t n, bool truncate) {
11340 
11341  if (truncate)
11342  {
11343 
11344  if (n > entity_.size())
11345  n = entity_.size();
11346 
11347  } else if (n > entity_.size())
11348  throw std::logic_error(
11349  "There are only " + std::to_string(entity_.size()) + " agents. You cannot " +
11350  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
11351 
11352  sample_size = n;
11353  model = &entity_.model;
11354  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY;
11355 
11356  agents = &entity_.sampled_agents;
11357  agents_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_n;
11358 
11359  agents_left = &entity_.sampled_agents_left;
11360  agents_left_n = &entity_.sampled_agents_left_n;
11361 
11362  sample_n(n);
11363 
11364  return;
11365 
11366 }
11367 
11380 template<typename TSeq>
11381 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::AgentsSample(Agent<TSeq> & agent_, size_t n, bool truncate)
11382 {
11383 
11384  model = agent_.model;
11385  sample_type = SAMPLETYPE::AGENT;
11386 
11387  agent = &agent_;
11388 
11389  agents = &agent_.sampled_agents;
11390  agents_n = &agent_.sampled_agents_n;
11391 
11392  agents_left = &agent_.sampled_agents_left;
11393  agents_left_n = &agent_.sampled_agents_left_n;
11394 
11395  // Computing the cumulative sum of counts across entities
11396  size_t agents_in_entities = 0;
11397  Entities<TSeq> entities_a = agent->get_entities();
11398 
11399  std::vector< int > cum_agents_count(entities_a.size(), 0);
11400  int idx = -1;
11401  for (auto & e : entities_a)
11402  {
11403  if (++idx == 0)
11404  cum_agents_count[idx] = (e->size() - 1u);
11405  else
11406  cum_agents_count[idx] = (
11407  (e->size() - 1u) +
11408  cum_agents_count[idx - 1]
11409  );
11410 
11411  agents_in_entities += (e->size() - 1u);
11412  }
11413 
11414  if (truncate)
11415  {
11416 
11417  if (n > agents_in_entities)
11418  n = agents_in_entities;
11419 
11420  } else if (n > agents_in_entities)
11421  throw std::logic_error(
11422  "There are only " + std::to_string(agents_in_entities) + " agents. You cannot " +
11423  "sample " + std::to_string(n));
11424 
11425  sample_size = n;
11426 
11427  if (agents->size() < n)
11428  agents->resize(n);
11429 
11430  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
11431  {
11432  int jth = std::floor(model->runif() * agents_in_entities);
11433  for (size_t e = 0u; e < cum_agents_count.size(); ++e)
11434  {
11435  // Are we in the limit?
11436  if (jth <= cum_agents_count[e])
11437  {
11438  if (e == 0) // From the first group
11439  agents->operator[](i) = entities_a[e]->operator[](jth);
11440  else
11441  agents->operator[](i) = entities_a[e]->operator[](jth - cum_agents_count[e - 1]);
11442 
11443  break;
11444  }
11445 
11446  }
11447  }
11448 
11449  return;
11450 
11451 }
11452 
11453 template<typename TSeq>
11454 inline AgentsSample<TSeq>::~AgentsSample() {}
11455 
11456 template<typename TSeq>
11457 inline size_t AgentsSample<TSeq>::size() const noexcept
11458 {
11459  return this->sample_size;
11460 }
11461 
11462 template<typename TSeq>
11463 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator[](size_t i)
11464 {
11465 
11466  return agents->operator[](i);
11467 
11468 }
11469 
11470 template<typename TSeq>
11471 inline Agent<TSeq> * AgentsSample<TSeq>::operator()(size_t i)
11472 {
11473 
11474  if (i >= this->sample_size)
11475  throw std::range_error("The requested agent is out of range.");
11476 
11477  return agents->operator[](i);
11478 
11479 }
11480 
11481 template<typename TSeq>
11482 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::begin()
11483 {
11484 
11485  if (sample_size > 0u)
11486  return agents->begin();
11487  else
11488  return agents->end();
11489 
11490 }
11491 
11492 template<typename TSeq>
11493 inline typename std::vector< Agent<TSeq> * >::iterator AgentsSample<TSeq>::end()
11494 {
11495 
11496  return agents->begin() + sample_size;
11497 
11498 }
11499 
11500 template<typename TSeq>
11501 inline void AgentsSample<TSeq>::sample_n(size_t n)
11502 {
11503 
11504  // Checking if the size of the entity has changed (or hasn't been initialized)
11505  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
11506  {
11507 
11508  if (model->size() != agents_left->size())
11509  {
11510  agents_left->resize(model->size(), 0u);
11511  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
11512  }
11513 
11514 
11515  } else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY) {
11516 
11517  if (entity->size() != agents_left->size())
11518  {
11519 
11520  agents_left->resize(entity->size(), 0u);
11521  std::iota(agents_left->begin(), agents_left->end(), 0u);
11522 
11523  }
11524 
11525  }
11526 
11527  // Restart the counter of agents left
11528  *agents_left_n = agents_left->size();
11529 
11530  if (agents->size() < sample_size)
11531  agents->resize(sample_size, nullptr);
11532 
11533  if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::MODEL)
11534  {
11535 
11536  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
11537  {
11538 
11539  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](model->runif() * ((*agents_left_n)--));
11540  agents->operator[](i) = &model->population[ith];
11541 
11542  // Updating list
11543  std::swap(agents_left->operator[](ith), agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n));
11544 
11545  }
11546 
11547  } else if (sample_type == SAMPLETYPE::ENTITY) {
11548 
11549  for (size_t i = 0u; i < n; ++i)
11550  {
11551 
11552  size_t ith = agents_left->operator[](model->runif() * (--(*agents_left_n)));
11553  agents->operator[](i) = entity->agents[ith];
11554 
11555  // Updating list
11556  std::swap(agents_left->operator[](ith), agents_left->operator[](*agents_left_n));
11557 
11558  }
11559 
11560  }
11561 
11562  return;
11563 
11564 }
11565 
11566 #endif
11567 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11569 
11570  End of -include/epiworld/agentssample-bones.hpp-
11571 
11574 
11575 
11576 
11577 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11579 
11580  Start of -include/epiworld/models/models.hpp-
11581 
11584 
11585 
11586 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
11587 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_HPP
11588 
11589 namespace epimodels {
11590 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11592 
11593  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sis.hpp-
11594 
11597 
11598 
11599 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIS_HPP
11600 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIS_HPP
11601 
11610 template<typename TSeq = int>
11611 class ModelSIS : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
11612 {
11613 
11614 public:
11615 
11616  ModelSIS() {};
11617 
11618  ModelSIS(
11619  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
11620  std::string vname,
11621  epiworld_double prevalence,
11622  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11623  epiworld_double recovery
11624  );
11625 
11626  ModelSIS(
11627  std::string vname,
11628  epiworld_double prevalence,
11629  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11630  epiworld_double recovery
11631  );
11632 
11633 };
11634 
11635 template<typename TSeq>
11636 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
11637  ModelSIS<TSeq> & model,
11638  std::string vname,
11639  epiworld_double prevalence,
11640  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11641  epiworld_double recovery
11642  )
11643 {
11644 
11645  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Susceptible (SIS)");
11646 
11647  // Adding statuses
11648  model.add_status("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
11649  model.add_status("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
11650 
11651  // Setting up parameters
11652  model.add_param(infectiousness, "Infection rate");
11653  model.add_param(recovery, "Recovery rate");
11654 
11655  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
11656  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname);
11657  virus.set_status(1,0,0);
11658 
11659  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Infection rate"));
11660  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Recovery rate"));
11661  virus.set_prob_death(0.0);
11662 
11663  model.add_virus(virus, prevalence);
11664 
11665  return;
11666 
11667 }
11668 
11669 template<typename TSeq>
11670 inline ModelSIS<TSeq>::ModelSIS(
11671  std::string vname,
11672  epiworld_double prevalence,
11673  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11674  epiworld_double recovery
11675  )
11676 {
11677 
11678  ModelSIS<TSeq>(
11679  *this,
11680  vname,
11681  prevalence,
11682  infectiousness,
11683  recovery
11684  );
11685 
11686  return;
11687 
11688 }
11689 
11690 #endif
11691 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11693 
11694  End of -include/epiworld//models/sis.hpp-
11695 
11698 
11699 
11700 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11702 
11703  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sir.hpp-
11704 
11707 
11708 
11709 #ifndef EPIWORLD_SIR_H
11710 #define EPIWORLD_SIR_H
11711 
11721 template<typename TSeq = int>
11722 class ModelSIR : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
11723 {
11724 public:
11725 
11726  ModelSIR() {};
11727 
11728  ModelSIR(
11729  ModelSIR<TSeq> & model,
11730  std::string vname,
11731  epiworld_double prevalence,
11732  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11733  epiworld_double recovery
11734  );
11735 
11736  ModelSIR(
11737  std::string vname,
11738  epiworld_double prevalence,
11739  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11740  epiworld_double recovery
11741  );
11742 
11743 };
11744 
11745 template<typename TSeq>
11746 inline ModelSIR<TSeq>::ModelSIR(
11747  ModelSIR<TSeq> & model,
11748  std::string vname,
11749  epiworld_double prevalence,
11750  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11751  epiworld_double recovery
11752  )
11753 {
11754 
11755  // Adding statuses
11756  model.add_status("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
11757  model.add_status("Infected", epiworld::default_update_exposed<TSeq>);
11758  model.add_status("Recovered");
11759 
11760  // Setting up parameters
11761  model.add_param(recovery, "Prob. of Recovery");
11762  model.add_param(infectiousness, "Infectiousness");
11763 
11764  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
11765  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname);
11766  virus.set_status(1,2,2);
11767 
11768  virus.set_prob_recovery(&model("Prob. of Recovery"));
11769  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Infectiousness"));
11770 
11771  model.add_virus(virus, prevalence);
11772 
11773  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Recovered (SIR)");
11774 
11775  return;
11776 
11777 }
11778 
11779 template<typename TSeq>
11780 inline ModelSIR<TSeq>::ModelSIR(
11781  std::string vname,
11782  epiworld_double prevalence,
11783  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11784  epiworld_double recovery
11785  )
11786 {
11787 
11788  ModelSIR<TSeq>(
11789  *this,
11790  vname,
11791  prevalence,
11792  infectiousness,
11793  recovery
11794  );
11795 
11796  return;
11797 
11798 }
11799 
11800 #endif
11801 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11803 
11804  End of -include/epiworld//models/sir.hpp-
11805 
11808 
11809 
11810 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11812 
11813  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seir.hpp-
11814 
11817 
11818 
11819 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
11820 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIR_HPP
11821 
11831 template<typename TSeq = int>
11832 class ModelSEIR : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
11833 {
11834 private:
11835  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
11836  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
11837  static const int INFECTED = 2;
11838  static const int REMOVED = 3;
11839 
11840 public:
11841 
11842  ModelSEIR() {};
11843 
11844  ModelSEIR(
11845  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
11846  std::string vname,
11847  epiworld_double prevalence,
11848  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11849  epiworld_double incubation_days,
11850  epiworld_double recovery
11851  );
11852 
11853  ModelSEIR(
11854  std::string vname,
11855  epiworld_double prevalence,
11856  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11857  epiworld_double incubation_days,
11858  epiworld_double recovery
11859  );
11860 
11861  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_exposed_seir = [](
11862  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
11863  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
11864  ) -> void {
11865  // Does the agent become infected?
11866  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(*m->p1))
11867  p->change_status(ModelSEIR<TSeq>::INFECTED);
11868 
11869  return;
11870  };
11871 
11872 
11873  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected_seir = [](
11874  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
11875  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
11876  ) -> void {
11877  // Does the agent recover?
11878  if (m->runif() < (*m->p2))
11879  p->rm_virus(0);
11880 
11881  return;
11882  };
11883 
11884 };
11885 
11886 
11887 template<typename TSeq>
11888 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
11889  ModelSEIR<TSeq> & model,
11890  std::string vname,
11891  epiworld_double prevalence,
11892  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11893  epiworld_double incubation_days,
11894  epiworld_double recovery
11895  )
11896 {
11897 
11898  // Adding statuses
11899  model.add_status("Susceptible", epiworld::default_update_susceptible<TSeq>);
11900  model.add_status("Exposed", model.update_exposed_seir);
11901  model.add_status("Infected", model.update_infected_seir);
11902  model.add_status("Removed");
11903 
11904  // Setting up parameters
11905  model.add_param(infectiousness, "Infectiousness");
11906  model.add_param(incubation_days, "Incubation days");
11907  model.add_param(recovery, "Immune recovery");
11908 
11909  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
11910  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname);
11911  virus.set_status(ModelSEIR<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED, ModelSEIR<TSeq>::REMOVED);
11912 
11913  virus.set_prob_infecting(&model("Infectiousness"));
11914 
11915  // Adding the tool and the virus
11916  model.add_virus(virus, prevalence);
11917 
11918  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR)");
11919 
11920  return;
11921 
11922 }
11923 
11924 template<typename TSeq>
11925 inline ModelSEIR<TSeq>::ModelSEIR(
11926  std::string vname,
11927  epiworld_double prevalence,
11928  epiworld_double infectiousness,
11929  epiworld_double incubation_days,
11930  epiworld_double recovery
11931  )
11932 {
11933 
11934  ModelSEIR<TSeq>(
11935  *this,
11936  vname,
11937  prevalence,
11938  infectiousness,
11939  incubation_days,
11940  recovery
11941  );
11942 
11943  return;
11944 
11945 }
11946 
11947 
11948 
11949 #endif
11950 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11952 
11953  End of -include/epiworld//models/seir.hpp-
11954 
11957 
11958 
11959 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
11961 
11962  Start of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
11963 
11966 
11967 
11968 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
11969 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SURVEILLANCE_HPP
11970 
11971 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
11972 class ModelSURV : public epiworld::Model<TSeq> {
11973 
11974 private:
11975  // Status
11976  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
11977  static const int LATENT = 1;
11978  static const int SYMPTOMATIC = 2;
11979  static const int SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 3; // sampled and discovered
11980  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC = 4;
11981  static const int ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED = 5;
11982  static const int RECOVERED = 6;
11983  static const int REMOVED = 7;
11984 
11985 public:
11986 
12028  ModelSURV() {};
12029 
12030  ModelSURV(
12031  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
12032  std::string vname,
12033  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
12034  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
12035  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
12036  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
12037  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
12038  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
12039  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
12040  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
12041  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
12042  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
12043  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
12044  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
12045  );
12046 
12047  ModelSURV(
12048  std::string vname,
12049  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence = 50,
12050  epiworld_double efficacy_vax = 0.9,
12051  epiworld_double latent_period = 3u,
12052  epiworld_double infect_period = 6u,
12053  epiworld_double prob_symptoms = 0.6,
12054  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated = 0.25,
12055  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm = 0.5,
12056  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect = 0.5,
12057  epiworld_double surveillance_prob = 0.001,
12058  epiworld_double prob_transmission = 1.0,
12059  epiworld_double prob_death = 0.001,
12060  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect = 0.9
12061  );
12063 
12064 };
12065 
12066 template<typename TSeq>
12067 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
12068  ModelSURV<TSeq> & model,
12069  std::string vname,
12070  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
12071  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
12072  epiworld_double latent_period,
12073  epiworld_double infect_period,
12074  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
12075  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
12076  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
12077  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
12078  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
12079  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12080  epiworld_double prob_death,
12081  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
12082  )
12083 {
12084 
12085  EPI_NEW_UPDATEFUN_LAMBDA(surveillance_update_susceptible, TSeq) {
12086 
12087  // This computes the prob of getting any neighbor variant
12088  epiworld_fast_uint nvariants_tmp = 0u;
12089  for (auto & neighbor: p->get_neighbors())
12090  {
12091 
12092  for (size_t i = 0u; i < neighbor->get_n_viruses(); ++i)
12093  {
12094 
12095  auto & v = neighbor->get_virus(i);
12096 
12097  /* And it is a function of susceptibility_reduction as well */
12098  epiworld_double tmp_transmission =
12099  (1.0 - p->get_susceptibility_reduction(v)) *
12100  v->get_prob_infecting() *
12101  (1.0 - neighbor->get_transmission_reduction(v))
12102  ;
12103 
12104  m->array_double_tmp[nvariants_tmp] = tmp_transmission;
12105  m->array_virus_tmp[nvariants_tmp++] = &(*v);
12106 
12107  }
12108  }
12109 
12110  // No virus to compute on
12111  if (nvariants_tmp == 0)
12112  return;
12113 
12114  // Running the roulette
12115  int which = roulette(nvariants_tmp, m);
12116 
12117  if (which < 0)
12118  return;
12119 
12120  p->add_virus(*m->array_virus_tmp[which]);
12121  return;
12122 
12123  };
12124 
12125 
12126  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> surveillance_update_exposed =
12127  [](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
12128  {
12129 
12130  epiworld::VirusPtr<TSeq> & v = p->get_virus(0u);
12131  epiworld_double p_die = v->get_prob_death() * (1.0 - p->get_death_reduction(v));
12132 
12133  epiworld_fast_uint days_since_exposed = m->today() - v->get_date();
12134  epiworld_fast_uint status = p->get_status();
12135 
12136  // Figuring out latent period
12137  if (v->get_data().size() == 0u)
12138  {
12139  epiworld_double latent_days = m->rgamma(*m->p0, 1.0);
12140  v->get_data().push_back(latent_days);
12141 
12142  v->get_data().push_back(
12143  m->rgamma(*m->p1, 1.0) + latent_days
12144  );
12145  }
12146 
12147  // If still latent, nothing happens
12148  if (days_since_exposed <= v->get_data()[0u])
12149  return;
12150 
12151  // If past days infected + latent, then bye.
12152  if (days_since_exposed >= v->get_data()[1u])
12153  {
12154  p->rm_virus(0);
12155  return;
12156  }
12157 
12158  // If it is infected, then it can be asymptomatic or symptomatic
12159  if (status == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
12160  {
12161 
12162  // Will be symptomatic?
12163  if (EPI_RUNIF() < MPAR(2))
12164  p->change_status(ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC);
12165  else
12166  p->change_status(ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC);
12167 
12168  return;
12169 
12170  }
12171 
12172  // Otherwise, it can be removed
12173  if (EPI_RUNIF() < p_die)
12174  {
12175  p->change_status(ModelSURV<TSeq>::REMOVED, -1);
12176  return;
12177  }
12178 
12179  return;
12180 
12181  };
12182 
12183  std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exposed_status = {
12184  SYMPTOMATIC,
12185  SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
12186  ASYMPTOMATIC,
12187  ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED,
12188  LATENT
12189  };
12190 
12191  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> surveillance_program =
12192  [exposed_status](
12193  epiworld::Model<TSeq>* m
12194  ) -> void
12195  {
12196 
12197  // How many will we find
12198  std::binomial_distribution<> bdist(m->size(), m->par("Surveilance prob."));
12199  int nsampled = bdist(*m->get_rand_endgine());
12200 
12201  int to_go = nsampled + 1;
12202 
12203  epiworld_double ndetected = 0.0;
12204  epiworld_double ndetected_asympt = 0.0;
12205 
12206  auto & pop = *(m->get_agents());
12207  std::vector< bool > sampled(m->size(), false);
12208 
12209  while (to_go-- > 0)
12210  {
12211 
12212  // Who is the lucky one
12213  epiworld_fast_uint i = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(std::floor(EPI_RUNIF() * m->size()));
12214 
12215  if (sampled[i])
12216  continue;
12217 
12218  sampled[i] = true;
12219  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p = &pop[i];
12220 
12221  // If still exposed for the next term
12222  if (epiworld::IN(p->get_status(), exposed_status ))
12223  {
12224 
12225  ndetected += 1.0;
12226  if (p->get_status() == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC)
12227  {
12228  ndetected_asympt += 1.0;
12229  p->change_status(ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
12230  }
12231  else
12232  {
12233  p->change_status(ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED);
12234  }
12235 
12236  }
12237 
12238  }
12239 
12240  // Writing the user data
12241  std::vector< int > totals;
12242  m->get_db().get_today_total(nullptr,&totals);
12243  m->add_user_data(
12244  {
12245  static_cast<epiworld_double>(nsampled),
12246  ndetected,
12247  ndetected_asympt,
12248  static_cast<epiworld_double>(totals[ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC])
12249  }
12250  );
12251 
12252 
12253  };
12254 
12255  model.add_status("Susceptible", surveillance_update_susceptible);
12256  model.add_status("Latent", surveillance_update_exposed);
12257  model.add_status("Symptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
12258  model.add_status("Symptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
12259  model.add_status("Asymptomatic", surveillance_update_exposed);
12260  model.add_status("Asymptomatic isolated", surveillance_update_exposed);
12261  model.add_status("Recovered");
12262  model.add_status("Removed");
12263 
12264  // General model parameters
12265  model.add_param(latent_period, "Latent period");
12266  model.add_param(infect_period, "Infect period");
12267  model.add_param(prob_symptoms, "Prob of symptoms");
12268  model.add_param(surveillance_prob, "Surveilance prob.");
12269  model.add_param(efficacy_vax, "Vax efficacy");
12270  model.add_param(prop_vax_redux_transm, "Vax redux transmission");
12271  model.add_param(prob_transmission, "Prob of transmission");
12272  model.add_param(prob_death, "Prob. death");
12273  model.add_param(prob_noreinfect, "Prob. no reinfect");
12274 
12275  // Virus ------------------------------------------------------------------
12276  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> covid("Covid19");
12277  covid.set_status(LATENT, RECOVERED, REMOVED);
12278  covid.set_post_immunity(&model("Prob. no reinfect"));
12279  covid.set_prob_death(&model("Prob. death"));
12280 
12281  epiworld::VirusFun<TSeq> ptransmitfun = [](
12282  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p,
12283  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> & v,
12284  epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
12285  ) -> epiworld_double
12286  {
12287  // No chance of infecting
12288  epiworld_fast_uint s = p->get_status();
12289  if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::LATENT)
12290  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
12291  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::SYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
12292  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
12293  else if (s == ModelSURV<TSeq>::ASYMPTOMATIC_ISOLATED)
12294  return static_cast<epiworld_double>(0.0);
12295 
12296  // Otherwise
12297  return MPAR(6);
12298  };
12299 
12300  covid.set_prob_infecting_fun(ptransmitfun);
12301 
12302  model.add_virus_n(covid, prevalence);
12303 
12304  model.set_user_data({"nsampled", "ndetected", "ndetected_asympt", "nasymptomatic"});
12305  model.add_global_action(surveillance_program,-1);
12306 
12307  // Vaccine tool -----------------------------------------------------------
12308  epiworld::Tool<TSeq> vax("Vaccine");
12309  vax.set_susceptibility_reduction(&model("Vax efficacy"));
12310  vax.set_transmission_reduction(&model("Vax redux transmission"));
12311 
12312  model.add_tool(vax, prop_vaccinated);
12313 
12314  model.set_name("Surveillance");
12315 
12316  return;
12317 
12318 }
12319 
12320 template<typename TSeq>
12321 inline ModelSURV<TSeq>::ModelSURV(
12322  std::string vname,
12323  epiworld_fast_uint prevalence,
12324  epiworld_double efficacy_vax,
12325  epiworld_double latent_period,
12326  epiworld_double infect_period,
12327  epiworld_double prob_symptoms,
12328  epiworld_double prop_vaccinated,
12329  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_transm,
12330  epiworld_double prop_vax_redux_infect,
12331  epiworld_double surveillance_prob,
12332  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12333  epiworld_double prob_death,
12334  epiworld_double prob_noreinfect
12335  )
12336 {
12337 
12338  ModelSURV(
12339  *this,
12340  vname,
12341  prevalence,
12342  efficacy_vax,
12343  latent_period,
12344  infect_period,
12345  prob_symptoms,
12346  prop_vaccinated,
12347  prop_vax_redux_transm,
12348  prop_vax_redux_infect,
12349  surveillance_prob,
12350  prob_transmission,
12351  prob_death,
12352  prob_noreinfect
12353  );
12354 
12355  return;
12356 
12357 }
12358 
12359 #endif
12360 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12362 
12363  End of -include/epiworld//models/surveillance.hpp-
12364 
12367 
12368 
12369 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12371 
12372  Start of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
12373 
12376 
12377 
12378 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
12379 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SIRCONNECTED_HPP
12380 
12381 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
12382 class ModelSIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
12383 {
12384 private:
12385  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
12386  static const int INFECTED = 1;
12387  static const int RECOVERED = 2;
12388 
12389 public:
12390 
12391  ModelSIRCONN() {
12392 
12393  tracked_agents_infected.reserve(1e4);
12394  tracked_agents_infected_next.reserve(1e4);
12395 
12396  };
12397 
12398  ModelSIRCONN(
12399  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
12400  std::string vname,
12401  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12402  epiworld_double prevalence,
12403  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12404  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12405  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12406  );
12407 
12408  ModelSIRCONN(
12409  std::string vname,
12410  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12411  epiworld_double prevalence,
12412  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12413  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12414  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12415  );
12416 
12417  // Tracking who is infected and who is not
12418  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq>* > tracked_agents_infected = {};
12419  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<TSeq>* > tracked_agents_infected_next = {};
12420 
12421  bool tracked_started = false;
12422  int tracked_ninfected = 0;
12423  int tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12424  epiworld_double tracked_current_infect_prob = 0.0;
12425 
12426 };
12427 
12428 
12439 template<typename TSeq>
12440 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
12441  ModelSIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
12442  std::string vname,
12443  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12444  epiworld_double prevalence,
12445  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12446  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12447  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12448  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
12449  )
12450 {
12451 
12452  auto * _tracked_started = &model.tracked_started;
12453  auto * _tracked_ninfected = &model.tracked_ninfected;
12454  auto * _tracked_ninfected_next = &model.tracked_ninfected_next;
12455  auto * _tracked_current_infect_prob = &model.tracked_current_infect_prob;
12456  auto * _tracked_agents_infected = &model.tracked_agents_infected;
12457  auto * _tracked_agents_infected_next = &model.tracked_agents_infected_next;
12458 
12459  std::function<void(epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m)> tracked_agents_check_init = [
12460  _tracked_started,
12461  _tracked_agents_infected,
12462  _tracked_ninfected,
12463  _tracked_current_infect_prob
12464  ](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
12465  {
12466 
12467  if (*_tracked_started)
12468  return;
12469 
12470  /* Checking first if it hasn't */
12471  if (!*_tracked_started)
12472  {
12473 
12474  /* Listing who is infected */
12475  for (auto & p : *(m->get_agents()))
12476  {
12477  if (p.get_status() == ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
12478  {
12479 
12480  _tracked_agents_infected->push_back(&p);
12481  *_tracked_ninfected = *_tracked_ninfected + 1;
12482 
12483  }
12484  }
12485 
12486  for (auto & p: *_tracked_agents_infected)
12487  {
12488  if (p->get_n_viruses() == 0)
12489  throw std::logic_error("Cannot be infected and have no viruses.");
12490  }
12491 
12492  *_tracked_started = true;
12493 
12494  // Computing infection probability
12495  *_tracked_current_infect_prob = 1.0 - std::pow(
12496  1.0 - (*m->p0) * (*m->p1) / m->size(),
12497  *_tracked_ninfected
12498  );
12499 
12500  }
12501 
12502  };
12503 
12504  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible =
12505  [
12506  tracked_agents_check_init,
12507  _tracked_ninfected,
12508  _tracked_current_infect_prob,
12509  _tracked_agents_infected_next,
12510  _tracked_ninfected_next,
12511  _tracked_agents_infected
12512  ](
12513  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
12514  ) -> void
12515  {
12516 
12517  tracked_agents_check_init(m);
12518 
12519  // No infected individual?
12520  if (*_tracked_ninfected == 0)
12521  return;
12522 
12523  if (m->runif() < *_tracked_current_infect_prob)
12524  {
12525 
12526  // Adding the individual to the queue
12527  _tracked_agents_infected_next->push_back(p);
12528  *_tracked_ninfected_next = *_tracked_ninfected_next + 1;
12529 
12530  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
12531  epiworld_fast_uint which = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
12532  std::floor(*_tracked_ninfected * m->runif())
12533  );
12534 
12535  // Infecting the individual
12536  p->add_virus(
12537  _tracked_agents_infected->operator[](which)->get_virus(0u)
12538  );
12539 
12540  return;
12541 
12542  }
12543 
12544  return;
12545 
12546  };
12547 
12548  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected =
12549  [
12550  tracked_agents_check_init,
12551  _tracked_ninfected_next,
12552  _tracked_agents_infected_next
12553  ](
12554  epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m
12555  ) -> void
12556  {
12557 
12558  tracked_agents_check_init(m);
12559 
12560  // Is recovering
12561  if (m->runif() < (*m->p2))
12562  {
12563 
12564  *_tracked_ninfected_next -= 1;
12565  epiworld::VirusPtr<int> v = p->get_virus(0u);
12566  p->rm_virus(0);
12567  return;
12568 
12569  }
12570 
12571  // Will be present next
12572  _tracked_agents_infected_next->push_back(p);
12573 
12574  return;
12575 
12576  };
12577 
12578  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> global_accounting =
12579  [
12580  _tracked_started,
12581  _tracked_agents_infected,
12582  _tracked_agents_infected_next,
12583  _tracked_ninfected,
12584  _tracked_ninfected_next,
12585  _tracked_current_infect_prob
12586  ](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
12587  {
12588 
12589  // On the last day, also reset tracked agents and
12590  // set the initialized value to false
12591  if (static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(m->today()) == (m->get_ndays() - 1))
12592  {
12593 
12594  *_tracked_started = false;
12595  _tracked_agents_infected->clear();
12596  _tracked_agents_infected_next->clear();
12597  *_tracked_ninfected = 0;
12598  *_tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12599  *_tracked_current_infect_prob = 0.0;
12600 
12601  return;
12602  }
12603 
12604  std::swap(*_tracked_agents_infected, *_tracked_agents_infected_next);
12605  _tracked_agents_infected_next->clear();
12606 
12607  *_tracked_ninfected += *_tracked_ninfected_next;
12608  *_tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12609 
12610  *_tracked_current_infect_prob = 1.0 - std::pow(
12611  1.0 - (*m->p0) * (*m->p1) / m->size(),
12612  *_tracked_ninfected
12613  );
12614 
12615  };
12616 
12617  // Status
12618  model.add_status("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
12619  model.add_status("Infected", update_infected);
12620  model.add_status("Recovered");
12621 
12622  // Setting up parameters
12623  model.add_param(reproductive_number, "Beta");
12624  model.add_param(prob_transmission, "Prob. Transmission");
12625  model.add_param(prob_recovery, "Prob. Recovery");
12626  // model.add_param(prob_reinfection, "Prob. Reinfection");
12627 
12628  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
12629  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname);
12630  virus.set_status(1, 2, 2);
12631 
12632  model.add_virus(virus, prevalence);
12633 
12634  // Adding updating function
12635  model.add_global_action(global_accounting, -1);
12636 
12637  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
12638 
12639  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
12640 
12641  model.set_name("Susceptible-Infected-Removed (SIR) (connected)");
12642 
12643  return;
12644 
12645 }
12646 
12647 template<typename TSeq>
12648 inline ModelSIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSIRCONN(
12649  std::string vname,
12650  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12651  epiworld_double prevalence,
12652  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12653  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12654  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12655  )
12656 {
12657 
12658  ModelSIRCONN(
12659  *this,
12660  vname,
12661  n,
12662  prevalence,
12663  reproductive_number,
12664  prob_transmission,
12665  prob_recovery
12666  );
12667 
12668  return;
12669 
12670 }
12671 
12672 
12673 #endif
12674 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12676 
12677  End of -include/epiworld//models/sirconnected.hpp-
12678 
12681 
12682 
12683 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
12685 
12686  Start of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
12687 
12690 
12691 
12692 #ifndef EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
12693 #define EPIWORLD_MODELS_SEIRCONNECTED_HPP
12694 
12695 template<typename TSeq = EPI_DEFAULT_TSEQ>
12696 class ModelSEIRCONN : public epiworld::Model<TSeq>
12697 {
12698 public:
12699 
12700  static const int SUSCEPTIBLE = 0;
12701  static const int EXPOSED = 1;
12702  static const int INFECTED = 2;
12703  static const int RECOVERED = 3;
12704 
12705 
12706  ModelSEIRCONN() {
12707 
12708  tracked_agents_infected.reserve(1e4);
12709  tracked_agents_infected_next.reserve(1e4);
12710 
12711  };
12712 
12713  ModelSEIRCONN(
12714  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
12715  std::string vname,
12716  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12717  epiworld_double prevalence,
12718  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12719  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12720  epiworld_double incubation_days,
12721  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12722  );
12723 
12724  ModelSEIRCONN(
12725  std::string vname,
12726  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12727  epiworld_double prevalence,
12728  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12729  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12730  epiworld_double incubation_days,
12731  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12732  );
12733 
12734  // Tracking who is infected and who is not
12735  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<>* > tracked_agents_infected = {};
12736  std::vector< epiworld::Agent<>* > tracked_agents_infected_next = {};
12737 
12738  bool tracked_started = false;
12739  int tracked_ninfected = 0;
12740  int tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12741 
12742 };
12743 
12754 template<typename TSeq>
12755 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
12756  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq> & model,
12757  std::string vname,
12758  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12759  epiworld_double prevalence,
12760  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12761  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12762  epiworld_double incubation_days,
12763  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12764  // epiworld_double prob_reinfection
12765  )
12766 {
12767 
12768  auto * _tracked_agents_infected = &model.tracked_agents_infected;
12769  auto * _tracked_agents_infected_next = &model.tracked_agents_infected_next;
12770  auto * _tracked_started = &model.tracked_started;
12771  auto * _tracked_ninfected = &model.tracked_ninfected;
12772  auto * _tracked_ninfected_next = &model.tracked_ninfected_next;
12773 
12774  std::function<void(epiworld::Model<TSeq> *)> tracked_agents_check_init =
12775  [
12776  _tracked_started,
12777  _tracked_agents_infected,
12778  _tracked_ninfected
12779  ](epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m)
12780  {
12781 
12782  if (*_tracked_started)
12783  return;
12784 
12785  /* Checking first if it hasn't */
12786  if (!*_tracked_started)
12787  {
12788 
12789  /* Listing who is infected */
12790  for (auto & p : *(m->get_agents()))
12791  {
12792  if (p.get_status() == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
12793  {
12794 
12795  _tracked_agents_infected->push_back(&p);
12796  *_tracked_ninfected += 1;
12797 
12798  }
12799  }
12800 
12801  for (auto & p: *_tracked_agents_infected)
12802  {
12803  if (p->get_n_viruses() == 0)
12804  throw std::logic_error("Cannot be infected and have no viruses.");
12805  }
12806 
12807  *_tracked_started = true;
12808 
12809  }
12810 
12811  };
12812 
12813  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_susceptible =
12814  [
12815  tracked_agents_check_init,
12816  _tracked_ninfected,
12817  _tracked_agents_infected
12818  ](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
12819  {
12820 
12821  tracked_agents_check_init(m);
12822 
12823  // No infected individual?
12824  if (*_tracked_ninfected == 0)
12825  return;
12826 
12827  // Computing probability of contagion
12828  // P(infected) = 1 - (1 - beta/Pop * ptransmit) ^ ninfected
12829  epiworld_double prob_infect = 1.0 - std::pow(
12830  1.0 - (*m->p0) * (*m->p1) / m->size(),
12831  *_tracked_ninfected
12832  );
12833 
12834  if (m->runif() < prob_infect)
12835  {
12836 
12837  // Now selecting who is transmitting the disease
12838  epiworld_fast_uint which = static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(
12839  std::floor(*_tracked_ninfected * m->runif())
12840  );
12841 
12842  // Infecting the individual
12843  #ifdef EPI_DEBUG
12844  if (_tracked_agents_infected->operator[](which)->get_n_viruses() == 0)
12845  {
12846 
12847  printf_epiworld("[epiworld-debug] date: %i\n", m->today());
12848  printf_epiworld("[epiworld-debug] sim#: %i\n", m->get_n_replicates());
12849 
12850  throw std::logic_error(
12851  "[epiworld-debug] The agent " + std::to_string(which) + " has no "+
12852  "virus to share. The agent's status is: " +
12853  std::to_string(_tracked_agents_infected->operator[](which)->get_status())
12854  );
12855  }
12856  #endif
12857  p->add_virus(
12858  _tracked_agents_infected->operator[](which)->get_virus(0u),
12859  ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED
12860  );
12861 
12862  return;
12863 
12864  }
12865 
12866  return;
12867 
12868  };
12869 
12870  epiworld::UpdateFun<TSeq> update_infected =
12871  [
12872  tracked_agents_check_init,
12873  _tracked_agents_infected_next,
12874  _tracked_ninfected_next
12875 
12876  ](epiworld::Agent<TSeq> * p, epiworld::Model<TSeq> * m) -> void
12877  {
12878 
12879  tracked_agents_check_init(m);
12880  auto status = p->get_status();
12881 
12882  if (status == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED)
12883  {
12884 
12885  // Does the agent become infected?
12886  if (m->runif() < 1.0/(*m->p3))
12887  {
12888  // Adding the individual to the queue
12889  _tracked_agents_infected_next->push_back(p);
12890  *_tracked_ninfected_next += 1;
12891 
12892  p->change_status(ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED);
12893 
12894  return;
12895 
12896  }
12897 
12898 
12899  } else if (status == ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::INFECTED)
12900  {
12901 
12902  if (m->runif() < (*m->p2))
12903  {
12904 
12905  *_tracked_ninfected_next -= 1;
12906  p->rm_virus(0);
12907  return;
12908 
12909  }
12910 
12911  _tracked_agents_infected_next->push_back(p);
12912 
12913  }
12914 
12915  return;
12916 
12917  };
12918 
12919  epiworld::GlobalFun<TSeq> global_accounting =
12920  [
12921  _tracked_started,
12922  _tracked_agents_infected,
12923  _tracked_agents_infected_next,
12924  _tracked_ninfected,
12925  _tracked_ninfected_next
12926  ](epiworld::Model<TSeq>* m) -> void
12927  {
12928 
12929  // On the last day, also reset tracked agents and
12930  // set the initialized value to false
12931  if (static_cast<epiworld_fast_uint>(m->today()) == (m->get_ndays() - 1))
12932  {
12933 
12934  *_tracked_started = false;
12935  _tracked_agents_infected->clear();
12936  _tracked_agents_infected_next->clear();
12937  *_tracked_ninfected = 0;
12938  *_tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12939 
12940  return;
12941  }
12942 
12943  std::swap(*_tracked_agents_infected, *_tracked_agents_infected_next);
12944  _tracked_agents_infected_next->clear();
12945 
12946  *_tracked_ninfected += *_tracked_ninfected_next;
12947  *_tracked_ninfected_next = 0;
12948 
12949  };
12950 
12951  // Setting up parameters
12952  model.add_param(reproductive_number, "Beta");
12953  model.add_param(prob_transmission, "Prob. Transmission");
12954  model.add_param(prob_recovery, "Prob. Recovery");
12955  model.add_param(incubation_days, "Avg. Incubation days");
12956 
12957  // Status
12958  model.add_status("Susceptible", update_susceptible);
12959  model.add_status("Exposed", update_infected);
12960  model.add_status("Infected", update_infected);
12961  model.add_status("Recovered");
12962 
12963 
12964  // Preparing the virus -------------------------------------------
12965  epiworld::Virus<TSeq> virus(vname);
12966  virus.set_status(ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::EXPOSED, ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED, ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::RECOVERED);
12967  model.add_virus(virus, prevalence);
12968 
12969  // Adding updating function
12970  model.add_global_action(global_accounting, -1);
12971 
12972  model.queuing_off(); // No queuing need
12973 
12974  // Adding the empty population
12975  model.agents_empty_graph(n);
12976 
12977  model.set_name("Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Removed (SEIR) (connected)");
12978 
12979  return;
12980 
12981 }
12982 
12983 template<typename TSeq>
12984 inline ModelSEIRCONN<TSeq>::ModelSEIRCONN(
12985  std::string vname,
12986  epiworld_fast_uint n,
12987  epiworld_double prevalence,
12988  epiworld_double reproductive_number,
12989  epiworld_double prob_transmission,
12990  epiworld_double incubation_days,
12991  epiworld_double prob_recovery
12992  )
12993 {
12994 
12995  ModelSEIRCONN(
12996  *this,
12997  vname,
12998  n,
12999  prevalence,
13000  reproductive_number,
13001  prob_transmission,
13002  incubation_days,
13003  prob_recovery
13004  );
13005 
13006  return;
13007 
13008 }
13009 
13010 #endif
13011 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13013 
13014  End of -include/epiworld//models/seirconnected.hpp-
13015 
13018 
13019 
13020 }
13021 
13022 #endif
13023 /*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
13025 
13026  End of -include/epiworld/models/models.hpp-
13027 
13030 
13031 
13032 
13033 }
13034 
13035 #endif

int get_id() const

epiworld::sampler::sample_virus_single
Virus< TSeq > * sample_virus_single(Agent< TSeq > *p, Model< TSeq > *m)
Sample from neighbors pool of viruses (at most one)
Definition: epiworld.hpp:9876
epiworld::sampler::make_sample_virus_neighbors
std::function< Virus< TSeq > *(Agent< TSeq > *, Model< TSeq > *)> make_sample_virus_neighbors(std::vector< epiworld_fast_uint > exclude={})
Make a function to sample from neighbors.

Functions for sampling viruses.
